World Wide Web, kán-lio̍k chò WWW, he̍k-chiá kiò Web, Hō-ló-ōe it-poaⁿ kóng bāng-lō͘, sī chi̍t khoán kiàn-li̍p tī Internet téng-bīn ê thong-sìn hêng-sek.
WAN (Eng-gí: Wide Area Network, "khoah-he̍k-bāng") sī tē-lí hoān-ûi chin khoah ê tiān-náu bāng-lō·, i ê kui-bô· phēng PAN, MAN, LAN ke chiok tōa.
NASDAQ Kó͘-phiò Chhī-tiûⁿ, sī Bí-kok chi̍t-ê tiān-chú-hoà ê kó͘-phiò kau-e̍k-só͘, kong-sī tī New York Chhī, sī sè-kài-siōng chóng kau-e̍k ta̍t siāng koân ê kó͘-phiò chhī-tiûⁿ.
Tī tiān-tî tiong, tiān-ke̍k sī tiān-kái-chit iông-e̍k hoat-seng sng-hòa hoân-goân hoán-èng ê só͘-chāi.
Hiuⁿ-lô͘ sī the̍h-lâi jiân-sio hiuⁿ-liāu ê iông-khì.
Peng-tháng sī chi̍t khoán thang léng-chông si̍t-liāu ia̍h ím-liāu ê siuⁿ-á.
Ūn-su khì-kū, ia̍h sī kóng kau-thong kang-kū, sī ūn-sàng lâng mi̍h ê ki-koan, pau-koat chū-lián-chhia, hoé-chhia, khin-khì-kiû, chûn, hui-hêng-ki téng lóng sǹg.
Ê-á sī chhēng tī kha ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ, tī hiān-tāi, chhián-thoa, liâng-ê, hia, mā sǹg-sī ê-á.
Sin-bûn-chóa, mā ū kóng sin-bûn ia̍h pò-chóa, sī choan-bûn pò-tō sin-bûn kap kî-tha siau-sit, kiam hō͘ lâng teng kóng-kò, pēng-chhiá tēng-sî hoat-chhut ê chi̍t lūi ìn-soat-phín.
Khí-ko sī lâng the̍h lâi kap khí-bín-á chò-hóe sé chhùi-khí iōng--ê 1 khoán ko.
Tiān-hong , tiān-sìⁿ iah-sī hong-sìⁿ (風扇) sī chi̍t khoán ki-hâi, it-poaⁿ ēng mó͘-tah tài-tōng sìⁿ-hio̍h tńg-sé, chè-chō khong-khì ê liû-tōng.
Lài-tah sī ēng lâi sán-seng hóe-iām ê chi̍t khoán sè-hāng ke-si.

Āu-liú, chi̍t khoán kū-sek ê hō-miâ sī hô͘-tia̍p, sī chi̍t khoán be-á-lìn-guh, ēng lâi kā nn̄g hāng mi̍h sio-chiap, it-poaⁿ thang chè-hān sio-tàu ê mi̍h chi kan ê ka-tō͘, kā chò-hóe kò͘-tēng tiām chi̍t tiâu chhia-sim téng-bīn, in-ê oa̍h-tāng to̍h tiâu tī chit chhia-sim téng-bīn, bē-tàng hiòng ki-tha ê hong-hiòng tńg-se̍h.
Phòng-phù (Ji̍t-gí: ポンプ, Hùn-lēng-sek: Ponpu. Eng-gí: pump) sī kò͘ ap-le̍k chhiūⁿ e̍k-thé, khì-thé--ê ki-hâi.
Iá-kiû-tiûⁿ, ia̍h pāng-kiû-tiûⁿ, sī iá-kiû ê pí-sài tiûⁿ-só͘, khôe-sìⁿ hêng-chōng.
Lôe / Lê, Gû-lôe / Gû-lê sī chi̍t-chióng choh-sit iōng ê lông-kū.
Ngó͘-kak Tōa-lâu (Eng-gí: The Pentagon "gō͘-kak-hêng") sī Bí-kok Kok-hông-pō͘ ê chóng-pō͘, tī Virginia ê Arlington koān, chiàm-tē 20000 m².
Chúi-tō-thâu he̍k-chiá chúi-chūn-thâu sī khòng-chè chúi-kóng lāi-bīn ê chúi lâu-chhut ia̍h-sī thêng-chí ê chūn-thâu. lēng-gōa mā ē-sái khòng-chè chúi-liû ê tōa-sè káng.

Tn̂g-siâⁿ, he̍k-chiá-sī kóng Bān-lí Tn̂g-siâⁿ, sī Tiong-kok kúi-ā tó͘ tn̂g-hêng siâⁿ-piah ê chóng-hō-miâ, khí-chō, têng-khí kap î-hō͘ ê sî-kan chin tn̂g, ùi kong-goân-chêng 5 sè-kí kàu kong-goân 16 sè-kí lóng ū toā-toā sè-sè ê kang-sū chìn-hêng, khí-chō ê bo̍k-tek sī beh pó-hō͘ ta̍k sî-tāi tī hiān-chhú-sî Tiong-kok ê tè-kok, thang phiah-bián pak-pêng bîn-cho̍k ê kong-ke̍k.
Kûn (裙) sī chi̍t khoán ho̍k-chong, tùi gōa-bīn lâi khòaⁿ sī kaⁿ-taⁿ chi̍t kháu chhun kha.
E-pú-lóng sī 1 chióng ho̍k-chong.
Siat-chuh (Eng-bûn: shirt) sī chi̍t khoán chhēng tī se-chong lāi-bīn ê saⁿ. iā ē-sái tan-to̍k chhēng.

Tian-kiû (電球), iā hō-chò tiān-hóe-kiû (電火球), tiān-chu (電珠), he̍k-chiá tiān-hóe-pho̍k-á, sī chi̍t-chióng thàu-kòe thong-tiān, lī-iōng tiān-chó͘ lâi ka-jia̍t pe̍h-sih, chìn-hêng hoat-kng ê teng-hóe chong-tì.
Kun-lām sī chò kun-sū lō·-iōng ê chûn, phó-thong tō-sī kóng hái-kun ê chûn-chiah.
Sin-niû-saⁿ ia̍h sin-niû-chong sī kiat-liân-lí pān kiat-hun tián-lé ê sî-chūn, sin-niû-á chhēng ê saⁿ.

column2: ['hêng-tōng tiān-ōe', '手机', '手机仔', '手機', '手機仔', '行动电话', '行動電話', 'chhiú-ki', 'chhiú-ki-á', 'hêng-tōng tiān-oē', 'hêng tōng tiān oē', 'hêngtōng tiānoē', 'mobile phone']
column3: Hêng-tōng tiān-oē (ta-ko-tah, chhiú-ki, chhiú-ōa) sī 1 khoán tiān-chú thong-sìn ho̍k-bū, kong-lêng chhin-chhiūⁿ thôan-thóng kò·-tēng sòaⁿ-lō· ê tiān-ōe, cheng-chha tiān-ōe ki-á ē-tit chah leh kiâⁿ, m̄-bián chiap tiān-ōe sòaⁿ.
Chín-só͘ (診所), mā hō-chò i-seng-koán (醫生館), sī kui-bô͘ pí pēⁿ-īⁿ sè ê i-liâu ki-kò͘, thong-siông kan-na ū mn̂g-chín ho̍k-bū kap io̍h-pâng.
Pēⁿ-īⁿ sī chi̍t khoán kiān-khong chiàu-kò͘ ki-koan, thê-kiong chiam-tùi tī-liâu hoān-chiá só͘ su-iàu ê choan-gia̍p i-ha̍k kap khàn-hō͘ jîn-oân kiam i-ha̍k chong-pī.
Bá-luh sī 1 chióng īng-lâi poe̍h teng-á ê ke-si.
Îⁿ-téng (dome) sī kiàn-tio̍k ê 1 ê te̍k-teng, khoàⁿ--khí-lâi chhiūⁿ poàⁿ-lia̍p kiû khǹg tī chhù-boé-téng.
Ko-sok chhiú-ki (high-speed handpiece) sī khí-kho beh thūn-chhùi-khí chìn-chêng the̍h-lâi boâ chiù-chhng ê ke-si, seⁿ-tiuⁿ bô-toā boâ ê sok-tō· chiâⁿ-kín.
Chiàn-tàu-ki sī kun-ki ê chi̍t-chióng, tī kun-sū siōng iū-koh kiò-chòe kan-bia̍t-ki (Tiong-bûn: 歼灭机), éng-kòe mā kiò-chòe khu-tio̍k-ki.
Chù-siā-chiam sī khang-khak ê kóng hêng chiam, chiap tī siā-tâng thâu.
Sé-saⁿ-ki (洗衫機), iā hō-chò sé-i-ki (洗衣機), sī chi̍t-chióng the̍h-lâi thōa saⁿ kap sé mô͘-kin téng-téng pháng-chit-phín ê ki-khì.
Khí-bó͘
Tiān-hóe (電火) sī lī-iōng tiān tòng-chòe lêng-goân ê chiàu-bêng siat-pī.
Po͘-thâu (埠頭), he̍k-chiá bé-thâu (碼頭), sī thê-kiong tō͘-lûn khò-hōaⁿ, iû-kheh kap hòe-bu̍t chiūⁿ-lo̍h chûn ê só͘-chāi.
Eng-gí ê castle, thang hoan-e̍k chò siâⁿ, sī chi̍t-khoán kiàn-tio̍k, sī Tiong-sè-kí ê hông-gī siat-si.
Chū-iû Tiau-siōng sī siat-tì Bí-kok New York Káng ê tâng-siōng.
Chúi-thah sī ēng-lâi chûn chúi ê thah, sī chúi-tō siat-si.
Pah-hòe kong-si, he̍k-chiá kóng pah-hòe-tiàm, sī chi̍t khoán sió-bē tiàm, i pún-sin tiāⁿ sī chē keng tiàm-bīn ê cho͘-ha̍p, bē chin choē bô-kâng chéng-lūi ê siong-phín.

column2: ['chhiau-kip chhī-tiûⁿ', '超市', '超級市場', '超级市场', 'chhiau-chhī']
column3: Chhiau-kip chhī-tiûⁿ, kán-chheng chhiau-chhī, sī chi̍t chióng tōa-hêng ê lêng-siū siong-tiàm.
galleon sī chi̍t-khoán toā-chiah, chē chân kap-pán ê phâng-chûn.Tī 16 kàu 18 sè-kí ê Europa kok-ka chiâⁿ-chē-lâng leh ēng.
Hâng-khong-bú-lām (Hàn-jī: 航空母艦. Eng-bûn: aircraft carrier) sī chi̍t-chióng choan-bûn teh tah-chài lām-chài-ki ê chok-chiàn kun-lām lūi-hêng. it-poaⁿ kán-chheng chòe hâng-lām á-sī hâng-bú.
Ji̍t-kong-teng sī chi̍t khoán tiān-hóe, lī-ēng chúi-gîn-khì hòng-tiān sán-seng êng-kong chè-chō kng-sòaⁿ.
Hip-siòng-ki, mā thang kiò choè hip-siōng-ki ia̍p-sī kha-mé-lah, sī ēng-lâi hip-siòng ê ki-khì.
Lia̍t-chhia he̍k-chiá hóe-chhia sī tī thih-lō͘ téng hêng-sú ê chhia-lióng.
LAN ("kio̍k-he̍k-bāng") sī tē-hng hoān-ûi ê sió-hêng tiān-náu bāng-lō·, it-poaⁿ siat tòa chhù--lìn, pān-kong-sek, sio-oá ê 1 cho· kiàn-tio̍k-bu̍t.

Hî-lûi sī hî-á hêng ê chúi-lûi, chú-iàu sú-iōng tī chúi-bīn ē-té, i tû-liáu tòa chà-io̍h ê thâu-pō͘ í-gōa, koh ū tàu thui-chìn-khì, ē-sài hiòng it-tēng ê hong-hiòng he̍k-chiá siū ín-chhōa tâu hiòng chúi-ni̍h ia̍h chúi-téng ê bo̍k-piau.
Ne-kut-tái sī chi̍t khoán hâⁿ tī ām-á-kún ê chong-sek, Se-iûⁿ-sek chheng-chhah ê chi̍t pō͘-hūn.
Hô-ho̍k (Hàn-jī: 和服. Khá-nah: わふく) sī Ji̍t-pún-lâng tùi in Ji̍t-pún pún-thó͘ bîn-cho̍k ho̍k-chong ê chheng-ho͘.
Su-lí-pah
Phòng-phù (Ji̍t-gí: ポンプ, Hùn-lēng-sek: Ponpu. Eng-gí: pump) sī kò͘ ap-le̍k chhiūⁿ e̍k-thé, khì-thé--ê ki-hâi.

column2: ['ōe-chheⁿ', 'jîn-chō oē-chhiⁿ', 'natural satellite', 'oē-chhiⁿ', 'thian-jiân oē-chheⁿ', 'thian-jiân oē-chhiⁿ', 'thian-jiân ōe-chheⁿ', 'ōe chheⁿ', 'ōechheⁿ']
column3: Thian-jiân ōe-chheⁿ, it-poaⁿ taⁿ hō ōe-chheⁿ, chun-chiàu it-tēng ê kúi-tō se̍h he̍k-chheⁿ ūn-hêng.
Ho͘-khip-khì, Tâi-gí phó͘-thong sī kóng ma-suh-kuh, sī siat-kè tì beh pó-hō͘ lâng mài suh ji̍p pau-koat khong-khì-tiong bî-seng-bu̍t, to̍k-khì, to̍k-chúi-khì téng lia̍p-chit-mi̍h ê siat-pī.
Thoân-pò͘ muî-thé (傳播媒體) sī thoân-pò͘ chu-sìn ê chài-thé, it-poaⁿ hō-chòe thoân-muî (傳媒), muî-thé (媒體) ia̍h-sī muî-kài (媒介).

Uái-phah (Eng-gí: windscreen wiper) sī chi̍t khoán kau-thong kang-khū lêng-kiāⁿ, nā chū-tōng-chhia lâi kóng, sī tàu tī thang-á hiòng chhiā-gōa ê hit bīn, tong thang-á bak chúi he̍k-chiá lâ-sâm ê sî-chūn, chiàu chhia-lāi ê chhau-chok piàⁿ chúi kiam chhit lù.
Chù-siā-tâng, tiāⁿ kóng siā-tâng, sī chù-siā khì-kū, phó͘-thong ê siā-tâng chiap chi̍t ki chù-siā-chiam.

Kó͘ sī ga̍k-khì lāi-té ê 1 chióng, kòng kó͘ ê sî, ū ê ēng chhiú, ū ê ēng kó͘-chhoê, bô-kâng ê im-ga̍k khoán-sek--ni̍h lóng ū khó-lêng sú-iōng kó͘, kó͘ pún-sin mā ē-tàng hō͘ im-ga̍k sán-seng bô-kâng ê kám-kak.
Ba̍k-kiàⁿ (目鏡) sī tì tī-leh ba̍k-chiu thâu-chêng ê chi̍t-siang thàu-kiàⁿ, it-poaⁿ the̍h-lâi chò sī-le̍k kiáu-chèng.
Tī, sī Tang-a, Tang-lâm-a bûn-hoà tiong thoân-thóng ê oáⁿ-tī, chi̍t thò tī hâm nn̄g ki chiâⁿ tùi ê tn̂g-tiâu koáiⁿ, it-poaⁿ ēng "chi̍t siang" chò tan-ūi.
Bān-liân-pit (萬年筆), ha̍k-chiá kǹg-pit (鋼筆), sī chi̍t chióng pit.
Chheh-kè (冊架), mā hō-chò chheh-tû (冊櫥), sī choan-bûn teh khǹg chheh ê tû-á
Bû-jîn hâng-khong-ki (無人航空機. unmanned aerial vehicle, UAV), sio̍k-chheng chò bû-jîn hui-hêng-ki (無人飛行機), sī m̄-bián ū hui-hêng-oân tī lāi-bīn kà-sú ê chi̍t chióng hui-hêng-ki ê lūi-hêng.
Seng-kàng-ki he̍k-chiá ki-koan-thui, ia̍h sī kóng liû-lông, tiān-thui, sī 1 chióng koân-kē tín-tāng ê ūn-su kang-khū, iōng lâi chài lâng sàng hòe.
Têng-á-kha sī chi̍t-chióng Hôa-lâm kap Tang-lâm-a te̍k-sek ê kiàn-tio̍k siat-kè.

column2: ['kong-kiōng ūn-su', 'kheh-ūn', 'kong-kiōng kau-thong', 'kong kiōng ūn su', 'kongkiōng ūnsu', 'public transport', 'tāi-chiòng ūn-su']
column3: Kong-kiōng ūn-su (public transport) sī lí-kheh bô sú-iōng ka-tī ê kau-thong kang-kū, tian-tò chò-hoé sú-iōng ūn-su kang-kū ê ūn-su hē-thóng, thong-siông sī kí thih-lō͘ ūn-su kap kong-lō͘ ūn-su, m̄-koh ū-sî mā pau-koat ū pâi kò͘-tēng chhia-pang-pió ê hui-lêng-ki, tō͘-chûn, kap kè-têng-chhia ūn-su.
Bí-ti-oh sī chi̍t lūi tiān-chú mûi-thé, ē-tàng hông lio̍k-iáⁿ, khó͘-pih, hòng-sàng kiam hián-sī.
CD sī 1 chióng ēng lâi té sò͘-ūi chu-liāu ê kng-ha̍k tia̍p-phìⁿ, thâu-khí-seng hoat-bêng lâi té sò͘-ūi-hoà siaⁿ-im.
Lio̍k-iáⁿ-tòa chi̍t jī it-poaⁿ sī kaⁿ-taⁿ chí VHS ia̍h Betamax.
Io̍h-ha̍k (藥學. Eng-bûn: pharmacy) sī kā kok-chióng kho-ha̍k chò ki-chhó͘, lâi chìn-hêng io̍h-bu̍t ê gián-kiù.
Chhu-peng-tiûⁿ (ice rink) sī chúi kian-peng ê 1 ê tiûⁿ-tē, ē-tit ēng lâi chhu-peng (ice skate), iah-sī chò koâⁿ-lâng ūn-tōng (winter sport).
Tō-tôaⁿ (导弹), 1-chióng ui-le̍k chin kiông ê kun-sū bú-khì, sī óa-khó pún-sin ê tōng-le̍k chong-pī hui-hêng, iû chè-tō hē-thóng (tō-ín hē-thóng) chū-tōng cháu-chhōe bo̍k-phiau.
Chàu-kha, iā hō-chò chàu-keng, tû-pâng, sī chò liāu-lí kap chhoân si̍t-bu̍t ê só͘-chāi.
Piān-só͘ (便所) mā thang kiò choè sái-ha̍k-á (屎礐仔), sī pâi-siat sái-jiō ê só͘-chāi.
Kàu-sek (教室) ia̍h-sī khò-sek (課室) sī ha̍k-seng siōng-khò ê tē-tiám, sī ha̍k-hāu tiōng-iàu ê chó͘-sêng pō͘-hūn.
Hoat-īⁿ
Bí-su̍t-koán (美術館) sī pó-chûn kap tián-sī gē-su̍t chok-phín ê siat-si, thong-siông sī í sī-kak gē-su̍t ûi tiong-sim.

Tōng-le̍k-chhia he̍k-chiá kóng mò͘-tah-chhia, sī óa-khò chū-sin tōng-le̍k thui-sak ê tō-lō͘ kiam lō͘ gōa ūn-su-khì, it-poaⁿ sī tàu lián-á--ê, jî-chhiáⁿ m̄-sī kiâⁿ thih-ki-lō͘, chú-iàu lō͘-ēng sī sú-iōng tī kok khoán tō-lō͘ leh chài lâng chài mi̍h.
Tiān-chiⁿ-thé (Eng-gí: transistor) sī chi̍t-chióng kò͘-thé poàn-tō-thé goân-kiāⁿ, ē-sái hòng-toā, khai-koan, ún-tēng tiān-ap, tiau-pian sìn-hō͘, í-kip chi̍t-koá kî-tha kong-lêng.
Ko-kè-kiô sī khí tī lio̍k-tē téng ê kiô.
Hông-khong-hô sī chi̍t chióng iōng-lâi hông-pī khong-si̍p kap pó-hō͘ pêng-bîn ê kun-sū kiàn-tio̍k.
Tī bûn-chiong-ha̍k, pîn-pâi
Hoè-chûn sī choân-bûn chài hoè-bu̍t, siong-phín ê chûn-chiah, sī sè-kài siong chú-iàu ê ūn-su kang-khu chi it.
Kó͘-bu̍t-siong sī chi̍t khoán choan-bûn siu-bé kó͘-bu̍t (kū-mi̍h, pháiⁿ-mi̍h he̍k-chiá tiong-kó͘ mi̍h) ê seng-lí-lâng.
Chhia-lián (Eng-bûn: wheel) sī chi̍t chióng ē-ēng siong-tùi chhia-sim se̍h îⁿ-kho͘ (soân-choán) ê îⁿ-hêng mi̍h-kiāⁿ.
Hàm-kiàⁿ sī 1 tè phòng-kiàⁿ (phòng-bīn-kiàⁿ), iōng lâi kā 1 ê mi̍h ê iáⁿ-siōng hòng-toā.
O˙-ta̍t-á (hàn-jī: 烏笛仔) sī 1 chióng se-iûⁿ ga̍k-khì, sio̍k-î bo̍k-kńg lūi, 1690 nî chiaⁿ-go̍eh 14 tī Tek-kok Nuremberg hoat-bêng.
Saxophone sī bo̍k-koán ga̍k-khì ka-cho̍k ê sêng-oân.
Tiā-tî sī lī-ēng tiān-hoà-ha̍k goân-lí lâi pó͘-chûn tiān-le̍k lêng-goân ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ.
Au-á, iā hō-chò poe-á, sī chi̍t chióng the̍h-lâi chng e̍k-thé ê khì-béng.
Kháu-khîm, ia̍h-sī kiò choè ha-mó͘-ní-khah, sī 1 chióng ga̍k-khì.
O͘-lín-gió sī si̍t-thé kui sian ê lâng-hêng ang-á, ia̍h chio̍h sī lâng bô͘-iūⁿ ê chhāi-mi̍h he̍k-chiá thit-thô-mi̍h.

column2: ['ka-pi-tiàm', '咖啡厅', '咖啡廳', '咖啡館', '咖啡馆', 'ka-pi-koán', 'ka-pi-thiaⁿ', 'ka pi tiàm', 'kapitiàm']
column3: Ka-pi-tiàm, he̍k-chiá ka-pi-thiaⁿ, sī lêng-siū ka-pi ím-liāu ê tiàm-thâu, it-poaⁿ mā ē tah-phòe bē chhin-chhiūⁿ ke-nn̄g-ko ê tiⁿ-tiám. lēng-goā ū chi̍t-koá ka-pi-tiàm mā ū bē tê ím-liāu.
Hó-kiû (好球. Strike) sī chi̍t-ê iá-kiû ê su̍t-gí.
Hui-hêng-chûn sī chi̍t khoán khì-seng-ki ia̍h sī kóng pí khong-khì khah khin ê hâng-khong-ki, ē-tàng lī-ēng khong-khì kap pún-sin ê tōng-le̍k sûn-hâng.
Piān-lī kám-á-tiàm sī châi-thoân khui ê kám-á-tiàm.
Kám-á-tiàm sī chi̍t-chióng sió-bē ê tiàm-thâu, choan-bûn bē seng-oa̍h iōng-phín, chia̍h-mi̍h, koàn-thâu, sì-siù-á, lâm-pak-hòe, hun, chiú, cha̍p-sè téng-téng.
Gá-suh-lô͘ sī chi̍t khoán ēng gá-suh chò jiân-liāu lâi ín-hóe ê lô͘.
Kǹg-khîm sī 1 chióng ga̍k-khì, mā kiò-chò phi-á-no͘h, iûⁿ-hiân-khîm, se-iûⁿ-khîm iah-sī tâng-soàⁿ-khîm.
Gì-tah sī chi̍t-khoán ū hiân ê ga̍k-khì.
Thah ki-pún-tek lâi kóng, sī kí kap chiàm-tē bīn-chek pí--khí-lâi, koân-tō͘ ke chin chē ê kò͘-chō-bu̍t iah kiàn-tio̍k-bu̍t.
Kiàn-tio̍k-bu̍t sī khu-keh khong-kan ê kiat-kò, ū jia-khàm, chi-chhî téng ēng-to͘.
Chǹg-chúi-théng, sī 1 chióng choan-tô͘ chhàng tī chúi--ni̍h sái ê chûn.
Chhat-liāu sī ūi-tio̍h pó-hō͘ ia̍h bí-hoà téng bo̍k-tek só͘ boah tī mi̍h-kiāⁿ téng-bīn ê châi-liāu.
A-phá-tò, he̍k-chiá kong-gū, sī chi̍t chióng chi̍p-ha̍p chū-the̍h, sī tī siâⁿ-chhī chiâⁿ chia̍p-khoàⁿ ê te̍k-iú hiān-siōng.
Tiān-iáⁿ-īⁿ sī hòng-sàng tiān-iáⁿ ê êng-gia̍p tiûⁿ-só͘.
Teng-á sī kim-sio̍k chò ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ, ū pêⁿ-pêⁿ ê thâu kap tn̂g-tn̂g chiam-chiam ê boa̍t-toan.
Sak-khuh sī pī-īn ê ke-si, mā ōe-tàng ū-hông khì òe-tio̍h sèng-pīⁿ.
Sî-cheng, kán-chheng cheng, sī chi̍t chióng the̍h-lâi teh niû, tha̍k kap piau-sī sî-kan ê gî-khì.

Teng-thah (lighthouse) sī chhin-chhiūⁿ thah (tower) hit khoán ê kiàn-tio̍k-bu̍t, i ēng teng, hoé, iah-sī thaù-kiàⁿ (lens) kā kng sàng--chhut-khì, hia̍p-chō͘ chûn-chiah tī hái--nih kiâⁿ, ta̍t kaù tō-hông (navigation) kap léng-hông (pilotage) ê kong-lêng.
Pùn-sò-chhia sī choan-bûn siu pùn-sò ê chū-tōng-chhiā, hiān-tāi sú-iōng it-poaⁿ sī te̍k-sû siat-kè lâi chhù-lí pùn-sò ê tho͘-lá-kuh.
Uzi sī chi̍t ê tī Iran Islam Kiōng-hô-kok Tang Azerbaijan Séng Kaleybar Kūn Tiong-iong Koān Peyghan Chayi Hiong ê chng-thâu.
Stanford Tāi-ha̍k (Eng-gí: Stanford University, choân-miâ Leland Stanford Junior University), tī Bí-kok California ê Stanford, sī 1891 nî chhòng-li̍p ê su-li̍p tāi-ha̍k.
Yale Tāi-ha̍k sī Bí-kok ê su-li̍p tāi-ha̍k, siat tī Connecticut ê New Haven, 1701 nî khí-chō, sī thong sè-kài siāng jió-to ê tāi-ha̍k chi it.
Oxford Tāi-ha̍k sī Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok ê chi̍t keng tāi-ha̍k, só͘-chāi tī Oxford, sī thong-sè-kài hiān-chûn siāng kó͘ ê tāi-ha̍k chi it.
Harvard Tāi-ha̍k sī Bí-kok ê su-li̍p tāi-ha̍k, siat tī Massachusetts ê Cambridge, 1636 nî khí-chō, sī thong sè-kài siāng jió-to ê tāi-ha̍k chi it.

column2: ['bá-suh', 'kong-kiōng-khì-chhia', '公共汽車', '公共汽车', '公車', '公车', '巴士', 'bà-suh', 'kong-chhia', 'kong-kau-chhia']
column3: Bá-suh sī chi̍t khoán thang chài chē lâng ê tō-lō͘ ūn-su khì-kū.
Kiù-hō͘-chhia sī chi̍t khoán kau-thong kang-khū, lāi-té it-poaⁿ ū chi̍t koá ki-pún ê i-liâu siat-pī, choan-bûn ùn-sàng phoà-pēⁿ kap siū-siong ê lâng, iû-kî sī su-iàu kip-kiù ê hoān-chiá.
Saⁿ-lián-chhia (三輪車) sī chi̍t-chióng iû saⁿ-ê lián-á chó͘-sêng ê kha-ta̍h-chhia, it-poaⁿ iōng jîn-le̍k lâi khu-tōng, tān-sī mā ū ki-tōng kap tiān-tōng ê saⁿ-lián-chhia.
Chûn sī kiâⁿ tī chúi téng ê kau-thong kang-khu.
Phâng-chûn sī iōng hong-la̍t chò thui-sak-la̍t ê chûn.
Keng sī 1 chióng bú-khì, i lī-iōng keng-pán kap keng-chìⁿ-hiân keng--khí-lâi ê la̍t lâi siā chìⁿ.
Chhèng (銃) sī lī-iōng hóe-io̍h jiân-khì hoat-siā chhèng-chí ê siā-ke̍k bú-khì.
Sò·-kó sī iû tan sim-phôe ê chú-pâng hoat-io̍k--lâi-ê, lāi-té ū 1 lia̍p chéng-chí. kó-phôe kap chéng-phôe hun-lî, m̄-koh kó-phôe kā chéng-phôe pau kah ân-ân-ân, lióng-chiá bô hiah iông-ī pak hun-lî.
Tiam sī chi̍t chióng chàu-kha ê tiōng-iàu ke-si. it-poaⁿ lóng hām chhài-to tàu-tīn sú-iōng, the̍h-lâi chhiat bah, tok hî, sià kóe-chí.
Pha-phú-liàn-chih
Thoa-pò͘, iā hō-chò pò͘-thoa-á, sī chi̍t-chióng the̍h-lâi piàⁿ-sàu ê ke-si.
Kiô sī chi̍t-chióng kau-thong siat-si.
Ti̍t-seng-ki kap si̍t-á kò·-teng ê hui-hêng-ki bô-kâng, sī lī-iōng chú-soân-e̍k ê ko-sok soân-chóan lâi tit-tio̍h seng-le̍k.
Khong-káng ia̍h hâng-khong-chām sī tàu koan-liân si-siat ê hui-hêng-tiûⁿ, tōa-pō͘-hūn sī ūi siong-gia̍p khong-tiong kau-thong khí--ê.
Louvre (Hoat-gí: Musée du Louvre) sī Paris Seine Kang piⁿ ê phok-bu̍t-kóan, goân-lâi sī Hoat-kok ê ông-kiong.
Chhit-thô-mi̍h, Tâi-oân-ōe ū kóng o͘-mo͘h-chiah, sī ū thit-thô ēng-tô͘ ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ.
Hûi mā kiò-chòe tô-chû, sī tô kah chû ê thóng-chheng.
Khí-lông he̍k khí-thò, chèng-sek miâ-chheng sī kò·-tēng kio̍k-pō· ké-chhùi-khí (fixed partial denture), sī khí-kho-i siat-kè kap khí-bô· ki-su̍t-goân chè-chō ê ké-chhùi-khí.
Tho͘-lá-kuh, khah-chhia, ia̍h hòe-chhia sī chi̍t khoán tōng-le̍k-chhia, choan-bûn siat-kè beh chài-hòe.
Pó͘-thâu sī iōng lâi chhò chhâ ê ke-si.
Galvani tiān-tî, he̍k-chiá Volta tiān-tî, sī ē-tàng thê-kiong tiān-lêng ê tiān-hòa-ha̍k tiān-tî. chìn-hêng sng-hòa hoân-goân hoán-èng kā hòa-ha̍k-lêng choán chò tiān-lêng.
Tiān-iông-khì (Hàn-jī: 電容器. Eng-bûn: capacitor) sī nn̄g ê kim-sio̍k pán chi-kan chûn-chāi choa̍t-iân kài-chit ê chi̍t chióng tiān-chú goân-kiāⁿ.

Thán-kek (Eng-gí:Tank, Hàn-jī:坦克) sī chi̍t-chióng chiàn-chhia, Tī Tiong-kok kó·-tāi ê chiàn-cheng tang-tiong, chiàn-chhia to̍h hō·-lâng tòng-chòe 1-chiòng tiōng-iàu ê tu̍t-kì (Hàn-jī : 突击) chong-pī, siū-tio̍h kó·-chá lâng ê tiōng-sī.
Siá-jī ke-si, siōng phó͘-thong ê sī kok khoán ê pit.
Iá-kiû pāng (baseball bat) sī chi̍t ki tī iá-kiû pí-sài tiong sú-iōng ê bo̍k-chè he̍k-chiá kim-sio̍k-chè ê ku̍t-liu kùn-á, the̍h-lâi kòng iû tâu-chhiú tâu-chhut ê iá-kiû.
Ke-si (tool) sī lán-lâng the̍h-teh tàu-choe khang-khè ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ.
Chhit-á, mā thang kiò-chò hú-á, sī chi̍t chióng the̍h-lâi siu-chèng iân-pit jī-jiah ê bûn-kū.
Hun-kong-khì sī chi̍t khoán kho-ha̍k khì-khū, goân-té ēng lâi kā kng hun chò chi̍t chhok hun-khui ê sek-tī, iā to̍h sī sek-lia̍t.
Tiān-oē, sī chi̍t khoán kau-thong siaⁿ-im ê tiān-sìn kang-khu kap hē-thóng.
Tiàu-kiàⁿ sī chi̍t khoán ē-sái koan-chhat hn̄g-tau ê ke-si.
Hián-bî-kiàⁿ sī chi̍t khóan ēng lâi koan-chhat ba̍k-chiu bô-hoat-tō͘ ti̍t-chiap iáⁿ tio̍h ê sòe-hāng mi̍h-kiāⁿ ê ke-si.
Sonar (ùi Eng-gí "sound navigation and ranging" lâi--ê) sī 1 chióng lī-iōng siaⁿ-im (sound) tī chúi--nih thoân-pò ê ki-su̍t, ēng lâi kiâⁿ-chûn (navigation) iah sī cheng-chhek pa̍t chiah chûn-chiah.
Ga̍k-khì sī 1 khoán chong-tì (device), ēng lâi chò im-ga̍k--ê.
Hoe-pân sī ēng-lâi chhah-hoe ê khì-kū.
Pothoek sī Hô-lân Overijssel séng Hof van Twente chū-tī-thé lāi-bīn ê chi̍t ê chng-thâu.

Chia̍t-ūn, Tē-hā-thih téng-téng ê miâ-sû it-poaⁿ lâi-kóng chí--ê sī tī khah tōa ê to·-chhī lāi, chia̍h tiān--ê, kiâⁿ thih-ki-lō·, ē-tàng chài chin-chōe lâng, sok-tō· mā chin-kín ê tiān-chhia hē-thóng.
Kng (light) sī pho-tn̂g (wavelength) ē-tit hō͘ ba̍k-chiu (eye) khoàⁿ--tio̍h ê tiān-chû-pho (electromagnetic radiation), khiā kóng khoàⁿ-ū-kng (visible light).
Chūn-thâu (拵頭. Eng-bûn: valve) sī khòng-chè liû-tōng liû-thé kài-chit ê liû-liōng, hong-hiòng, ap-le̍k, un-tō͘ téng-téng ê ki-hâi chong-tì.
Phín-siau sī koán-ga̍k-khì ê 1 lūi, chit-ê sû sī phín-á kap siau kap--khí-lâi ê chóng-hō-miâ.
Pîn-pâi, mā ū kóng tún, it-poaⁿ sī chi̍t tè chhiú gia̍h ia̍h sī tàu tī chhiú-ām, chhiú-āu-tiⁿ ê kò-jîn bú-chong.
Oáⁿ-tī (碗箸), ia̍h-sī chhan-kū (餐具) sī chia̍h-pn̄g sî-choeh ēng ê ke-si ê thóng-chheng.
Tiān-sī sī 1 chióng hn̄g-lō͘ ê thong-sìn hē-thóng, iōng lâi hòng-sàng kap siu-chiap ē tín-tāng ê iáⁿ kap siaⁿ.
Kang-tiûⁿ, ia̍h kang-chhiúⁿ, sī teh seng-sán hòe-bu̍t ê tōa-hêng kang-gia̍p kiàn-tio̍k-bu̍t.
Gû-á-khò͘ sī chi̍t chióng ēng Denim ia̍h-sī Dungaree pò͘-liāu só͘ thīⁿ ê tn̂g-khò͘.
Ho̍k-chong sī om sin-khu ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ, pêng-siông-sî mā kóng saⁿ (衫) he̍k-chiá saⁿ-á-khò͘, ē-tàng iōng mô͘-phôe he̍k-chiá pò͘ téng châi-liāu lâi chè-chò.
Cartridge sī chi̍t ê jī-sèⁿ.
Hia sī chi̍t khoán ê-á, ū khah tn̂g ê tháng-kóng, ē-tàng pó-hō͘ kha-ba̍k sīn-chí kha-thúi, jī-chhiá tiāⁿ ū koân-tah.
Chhâ-kia̍h, he̍k-chiá kóng ba̍k-kia̍h, sī êng chhâ chè-chō ê ê-á.
Lé-pài-tn̂g ia̍h-sī kàu-tn̂g sī Ki-tok-kàu chìn-hêng chong-kàu gî-sek ê só͘-chāi.
Sàu-chhiú sī chi̍t-chióng the̍h-lâi piàⁿ-sàu ê ke-si.

column2: ['kha-tián', '窗仔', '窗仔帘', '窗仔簾', '窗帘仔', '窗簾仔', 'curtain', 'kha tián', 'khatián', 'lî', 'mn̂g-lî', 'pò͘-lî']
column3: Lî choán kàu chhia.
Mô͘-hoat-pân sī chi̍t khoán kan-á, lī-ēng jia̍t keh-toān goân-lí, ē-tàng tn̂g sî-kan pó-chhî lāi-té-mi̍h siong-tùi kân-á gōa ê sio-thǹg ia̍h peng-léng.

column2: ['thih-bé', '动轮车', '動輪車', '单车', '單車', '孔明車', '孔明车', '独轮车', '獨輪車', '自行車', '自行车', '自輪車', '自轉車', '自转车', '自轮车', '跤踏車', '跤踏车', '鐵馬', '鐵馬仔', '铁马', '铁马仔', 'bicycle', 'chū-lián-chhia', 'kha-ta̍h-chhia', 'tan-chhia', 'to̍k-lián-chhia', 'to̍k-lûn-chhia']
column3: Thih-bé, mā-hō khóng-bêng-chhia, kha-ta̍h-chhia, chū-lián-chhia, to̍k-lián-chhia, sī chi̍t-khóan iōng kha ta̍h, khiâ tín-tāng ê kau-thong kang-khū, ki-pún lêng-kiāⁿ ū chhia-kè, chhia-chō, chi̍t-ê iōng liān-á chham ta̍h-pán liân-kiat ê chhia-lûn, kap chi̍t-ê iōng-lâi khòng-chè hong-hiòng ê chhia-lûn, jî-chhiáⁿ tōa-pō͘-hūn koh-ū chhiú-tòng.
Cembalo (Tek-gí miâ, Ji̍t-gí siá チェンバロ) sī chi̍t khoán khò kiàn-poâⁿ toâⁿ hiân hoat siaⁿ ê ga̍k-khì.
Khâm-páng, mā siá chò khâng-páng sī soan-thoân he̍k-chiá kóng-kò chok-iōng ê sek-gōa mi̍h-kiāⁿ, it-poaⁿ sī pêⁿ-bīn, siat tī bêng-hián só͘-chāi lâi ta̍t sêng bo̍k-te̍k.
Kite sī Bí-kok Georgia chiu Johnson kūn ê chi̍t ê chng-thâu (town).
Teng-nâ-á sī 1 chióng teng-hoé.
Iù-hûi-á (porcelain) sī tī chiok-koân ê un-tō· sio--chhut-lâi ê tô-chû.
Só-sî sī kap só phòe-ha̍p, thang kā phah-khui kiam só-tiâu ê ke-si.
Ski sī Nô͘-ui Akershus Kūn ê chi̍t-ê ki-chân chèng-koân.
Kiong-tiān thong-siông kóng-ê sī kun-chú teh tòa ê só͘-chāi.
Aswan sī Ai-ki̍p kok-lāi ê An-nil Hô (Eng-bûn: Nile) thâu-chi̍t-ê chúi-chhiâng hit kho͘-ûi-á ê 1 ê siâⁿ-chhī.
iû-chhái sī gân-liāu lām iû, ēng-lâi oē iû-chhái-oē ê thô͘-liāu.

Jiân-liāu tiān-tî sī chi̍t chióng chú-iàu thàu-kòe sng-sò͘ ia̍h-sī kî-thaⁿ sng-hòa-che chìn-hêng sng-hòa hoân-goân hoán-èng, kā jiân-liāu lāi ê hòa-ha̍k-lêng choán-ōaⁿ chò tiān-lêng ê hoat-tiān chong-tì.
Tiā-tî sī lī-ēng tiān-hoà-ha̍k goân-lí lâi pó͘-chûn tiān-le̍k lêng-goân ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ.
Bō-á ū pó-hō͘ lâng thâu, hoán-èng lâng ê tē-ūi, he̍k-chiá sī phòe-ha̍p tiûⁿ-ha̍p téng chok-iōng, tû-liáu sī ho̍k-chong chi̍t khoán, mā sī piáu-ta̍t sî-mo͘ ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ.

Bôa-chiam (Hàn-jī: 磨針. Eng-gí: burr) sī khí-kho sú-iōng lâi siu-bôa chhùi-khí ê ke-sī, ē-sái tī thūn-chhùi-khí ê sî-chūn the̍h-lâi bôa-tû chiù-chhng ,mā ē-sái tī beh chò ké-chhùi-khí ê sî-chūn iōng-lâi siū-hêng chún-pī chhùi-khí, he̍k sú-iōng tī kî-thaⁿ ū su-iàu bôa tio̍h chhùi-khí ê to·-ha̍p.
Koan-hē chi̍t khoán tì thâu-khak téng ê sió bō-á khoán chong-sek, khòaⁿ hatinator.
Hó-kiû (好球. Strike) sī chi̍t-ê iá-kiû ê su̍t-gí.
Khí-bín (齒抿) sī the̍h-lâi sé-chhùi lù chhùi-khí ê ke-si.
Boe̍h-á sī ti̍t-chiap long tī kha kap hā-chi ê ho̍k-chong.
Tē-lí siōng "chúi-tō" mā chí chúi-lō͘.
Tōng-bu̍t-hn̂g sī choan-bûn teh siu-chi̍p, gián-kiù kap tián-sī tōng-bu̍t ê siat-si.
Chhiú-khîm (手琴) mā kiò-chò bai-ó͘-lín (バイオリン), sio̍k-tī hiân-ga̍k-khì lāi-té ê e-hiân ga̍k-khì.
Tē-hā-sek sī kiàn-tio̍k-bu̍t ê tē-hā lâu-chàn.
Chú-ki-pán (主機板. motherboard "bú-pán") sī kò͘-sêng ho̍k-cha̍p tiān-chú hē-thóng pí-lūn tiān-chú kè-sǹg-ki ê tiong-sim ia̍h-sī tiān-lō͘-pán.
Sí-hêng-hoān sī hō͘ su-hoat soan-phoàⁿ ûi sí-hêng, tān-sī iáu-bōe pī chhú-koat ê hoān-lâng.
Hoan-á-hoé (番仔火), Hoan-kiáⁿ-hóe (番囝火) sī chi̍t-ki chi̍t-ki khí-hoé ê ke-si, iōng chi̍t-pái tio̍h tàn-tiāu.
Iû-éng-saⁿ sī chè-chok beh chhēng lâi siû-chúi, chìm-chúi, he̍k-chiá sī chúi-kîⁿ oa̍h-tāng ê ho̍k-chong.
Hang-lô͘ sī lī-iōng joa̍h khong-khì lâi liāu-lí si̍t-bu̍t ê chi̍t khóan chong-tì.
Kan-that sī that kan-á kháu, te̍k-pia̍t sī chiú-kan-á leh ēng ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ, ū ēng chhó chò--ê, mā ū chhiūⁿ po-lê ia̍h kî-tha châi-liāu.
Sî-khok-á sī sî-cheng ê chi̍t-chióng.
Hóe-chhia-thâu, kán-chheng chhia-thâu, mā ē-sái kiò-chòe hóe-chhia-chām, sī hóe-chhia kò͘-tēng thêng beh hō͘ lâng mi̍h chiūⁿ-lo̍h-chhia ê só͘-chāi.
Si̍t-bu̍t-hn̂g sī chi̍t chióng siu-chi̍p, seⁿ-thòaⁿ kap gián-kiù si̍t-bu̍t ê kho-ha̍k gián-kiù ki-koan, mā ūi siā-hōe thê-kiong siu-ióng kap kàu-io̍k ê ho̍k-bū.
Internet sī hoān-ûi pau-hâm thong sè-kài ê kong-kiōng tiān-náu bāng-lō͘, i ê chu-liāu iōng piau-chún ê Internet Protocol choán-sàng.
Leng-phè-á, mā thang kiò choè bū-lá-jià, sī kā cha-bó͘-lâng ê leng thiāⁿ leh ia̍h-sī am-khàm ê lāi-saⁿ pò͘.

Ti̍t-chōa he̍k-chiá kóng ti̍t-soàⁿ, tī sò͘-ha̍k kap kúi-hô-ha̍k tang-tiong ê ì-sù, sī pêng-bīn ia̍h khong-kan lāi-té tùi nn̄g-ê tiám tēng-gī chhut--lâi ê bô oan-khiau ê chōa, in bô tn̂g-tō͘ kap khoah-tō͘ ê sèng-chi̍t.

Khēng sī chí lo̍h-hō͘ liáu ū-sî ē chhut-hiān tī thiⁿ-piⁿ chhit chhái ê kéng-sek, he sī in-ūi khong-khì ê chúi-khì keng-kòe ji̍t-thâu chiò-kòe liáu-āu, ji̍t-kng hoán-siā ê kng-khian, têng-hiān âng, têng, n̂g, le̍k, nâ, tiān, chí chhit sek.
O͘-iáⁿ, sī but-thé chā tio̍h kng-sòaⁿ liáu-āu, ùi it-tēng hong-hiòng sán-seng chiò kng pí sì-ûi khah kiám ê chi̍t khu àm-sek só͘-chāi.
Kè-ōe ia̍h kè-e̍k sī chi̍t cho͘ pō͘-sò͘, tang-tiong kiam àn-sǹg sî-kan kap chu-goân ê lī-ēng, siat-kè beh goân-sêng chi̍t hāng tāi-chì.
Shire sī Eng-kok thoân-thóng ê chi̍t khoán tē-lí tan-ūi, kap "county" ê ì-sù beh kâng, chóng-sī chèng-sek sú-iông bô goân-choân kâng-khoán.
Romania sī Au-chiu tang-lâm-pō͘ ê kok-ka.
Yugoslavia sī í-chá 20 sè-kí ê sî tī Tang-lâm kiam Tiong-pō͘ Au-chiu ê kok-ka.
Bronx sī New York Chhī ê chi̍t-ê borough, hō-chòe The Bronx. mā-sī New York Chiu ê chi̍t-ê kūn, hō Bronx County.
Braunschweig sī Tek-kok Niedersachsen ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Firenze sī Italia pak-pō͘ siâⁿ-chhī, sī Toscana toā-khu kiam Firenze séng ê siú-hú.
Kiaⁿ-to͘-chhī (京都市. Kyôto-si) sī Ji̍t-pún Kiaⁿ-to͘-hú ê hú-thiaⁿ só͘-chāi-tē kap siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Kaunas sī Lietuva Kiōng-hô-kok Kaunas Kūn ê chi̍t ê chhī chū-tī-thé.
Lo̍k-iông-chhī (Hàn-jī: 洛陽市) sī Tiong-kok Hô-lâm-séng ê 1 ê tē-kip-chhī.
Lyon sī Hoat-kok tiong-tang-pō͘ Rhône tē-khu ê chi̍t-ê siâⁿ-chhī, chhī-khu jîn-káu 47 bān, to͘-hōe jîn-káu 178 bān, sī Hoat-kok tē-jī-toā ê to͘-hōe-khu.
Lâm-kiaⁿ-chhī (Hàn-jī: 南京市. Hàn-gú Pheng-im: Nánjīng Shì) sī Tiong-hôa Jîn-bîn Kiōng-hô-kok Kang-so͘-séng ê séng-hōe, mā sī Tiong-kok ê chi̍t-ê bûn-hòa bêng-siâⁿ.
Cambridge sī Bí-kok Wisconsin chiu Dane kūn ê chi̍t ê chng-thâu (village).
Bandung sī Ìn-nî Jawa ê 1-ê siâⁿ-chhī, Se Jawa ê siú-hú, jîn-kháu ū 2,364,312.
Bandung Chhī sī Ìn-tō͘-nî-se-a Kiōng-hô-kok Sai Jawa Séng ê chi̍t ê chhī.
Worcester sī chi̍t ê jī-sèⁿ.

Delhi (Hindi-gí: दिल्ली. Punjabi-gí: ਦਿੱਲੀ. Urdu-gí: دلی) sī Ìn-tō͘ tē-jī-tōa ê to͘-chhī, chôan-miâ Delhi Kok-ka Siú-to͘ Hat-khu (Eng-gí: National Capital Territory of Delhi), Ìn-tō͘ ê siú-to͘ New Delhi sī lāi-bīn ê chi̍t-ê hun-khu.
Sím-iông-chhī (Hàn-jī:瀋陽市. Boán-chiu-gí: Mukden /) sī Tiong-kok Liâu-lêng-séng ê séng-to͘.
Sioux City sī Bí-kok Iowa chiu Plymouth kūn ê chi̍t ê chng-thâu (city).
Ciudad Juárez sī Be̍k-se-ko Chihuahua siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī, khò-kīn Be̍k-se-ko pak-pō͘ pian-kài, kap Bí-kok Texas siâⁿ-chhī El Paso sio-oá, 2-ê siâⁿ tiong-ng sī Grande Hô.
City of Lancaster sī Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok Eng-lân Lancashire ē-kha ê chi̍t ê koān.
Hargeisa sī Somaliland ê siú-to͘.
Basel sī Sūi-se Basel-Stadt Chiu ê siú-hú kap siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Edirne sī Türkiye Edirne séng ê chi̍t ê koān.
Punta Arenas sī Chile Magalhães e Antártica Chilena khu Magalhães séng ê chi̍t ê chū-tī-thé (comuna).
Cincinnati sī Bí-kok Ohio tē-3 toā ê siâⁿ-chhī, pâi tī Columbus kap Cleveland āu-piah.
Sevastopol sī Lō͘-se-a Liân-pang ê 1 ê liân-pang ti̍t-hat-chhī.

column2: ['hồ chí minh chhī', 'ô͘-chì-bêng-chhī', 'ho chi minh city', 'saigon', 'se-kòng', 'se-kòng-chhī', 'sài gòn', 'ô͘ chì-bêng chhī']
column3: Hồ Chí Minh Chhī sī Oa̍t-lâm tē-it-tōa ê siâⁿ-chhī, jîn-kháu 642 bān.
Fresno sī Colombia Tolima séng ê chi̍t ê chū-tī-thé.
Marseille sī ūi-tī Hoat-kok Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur toā-khu Bouches-du-Rhône koān ê chi̍t ê commune.
Nice sī ūi-tī Hoat-kok Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur toā-khu Alpes-Maritimes koān ê chi̍t ê commune.
Leipzig sī Tek-kok Sachsen siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Nürnberg sī Tek-kok Bayern ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Daegu Kóng-he̍k-chhī (Hân-gí: 대구 광역시. 大邱 廣域市. Daegu-gwangyeoksi) sī Tāi-hân Bîn-kok ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Busan Kóng-e̍k-chhī (Hàn-jī: 釜山廣域市. Ko-lê-jī: 부산광역시), kán-chheng Busan, sī Hân-kok tē-2 tōa ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Lund sī Nô͘-ui Rogaland Kūn ê chi̍t-ê ki-chân chèng-koân.
Lo̍k-sam-ki, sok-siá L.A., sī Bí-kok California chham Bí-kok Se-pō͘ siōng-tōa ê siâⁿ-chhī, mā-sī Bí-kok tē-jī-tōa ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Hukuoka-chhī sī Ji̍t-pún Hukuoka Koān ê koān-thiaⁿ só͘-chāi-tē kap siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Tiông-kiâ-chhī sī Ji̍t-pún Nagasaki Koān ê koān-thiaⁿ só͘-chāi-tē kap siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Montréal sī ūi-tī Hoat-kok Languedoc-Roussillon toā-khu Aude koān ê chi̍t ê commune.
Stuttgart sī Tek-kok Baden-Württemberg ê siú-hú kap siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Pittsburgh sī Bí-kok Pennsylvania tē-2 toā ê siâⁿ-chhī, pâi tī Philadelphia āu-piah.
Wrocław (Pho-lân-bûn: Wrocław) sī Pho-lân Dolnośląskie séng ê chi̍t ê to͘-hōe kūn (powiat grodzkie).

column2: ['jerez de la frontera', 'jerez de la frontera, cádiz']
column3: Jerez de la Frontera sī tī Se-pan-gâ Andalucía siā-lí Cádiz séng ê chi̍t ê municipio.
Genève sī Sūi-se Genève Chiu ê chi̍t ê chū-tī-thé.
Tâi-tiong-chhī (Hàn-jī: 臺中市) tī Tâi-oân sai-hoāⁿ ê tiong-pō͘, 2010 nî í-chêng sī tó-siōng tē-3 tōa ê siâⁿ-chhī, sì-piⁿ lóng hō͘ Tâi-tiong-koān pau tiâu leh.
Omsk sī Lō͘-se-a Omsk Chiu ê chi̍t ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Sankt-Peterburg (Lō͘-se-a-gí: Санкт-Петербу́рг. lô-má-hòa: Sankt-Peterburg. IPA: [saŋkt pʲɪtʲɪrˈburk]) sī Lō͘-se-a ê siâⁿ-chhī, sī óa Pho-lô-tek-hái ê chi̍t-ê káng-kháu.
Pisa (Italia-gí: Comune di Pisa) sī Italia Tuscany Tōa-khu Pisa Séng ê chi̍t-ê comune (chhī-tìn).
Padova (Italia-bûn: Comune di Padova) sī Italia Veneto toā-khu Padova Séng ê chi̍t ê comune.
Verona sī Italia Veneto toā-khu ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Essen sī Tek-kok Nordrhein-Westfalen ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Makka, choân-miâ Makka al-Mukarrama ("Sèng-siâⁿ Makka"), sī Saud ê A-lá-pek ê siâⁿ-chhī, Makka Khu ê siú-hú.
Saskatoon sī Canada Saskatchewan siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Tiông-an sī sè-kài le̍k-sú siōng chi̍t ê hui-siông chhut-miâ ê to͘-siâⁿ, sī chit-má Tiong-kok Se-an-chhī ê kó͘-chá tē-miâ.
Se-an-chhī (Hàn-jī: 西安市. Hàn-gú Pheng-im: Xī'ān Shì) sī Tiong-kok Siám-sai-séng ê séng-to͘.
Abu Dhabi sī A-la-pek Liân-ha̍p Thâu-lâng-kok ê siú-to͘, mā sī i lāi-bīn Abu Dhabi Thâu-lâng-kok ê siú-to͘.
Hâng-chiu-chhī (Hàn-jī: 杭州市. Hàn-gú Pheng-im: Hángzhōu Shì) sī Tiong-kok Chiat-kang-séng ê séng-to͘.
Recife sī ūi-tī Pa-se Pernambuco chiu ê chi̍t ê chū-tī-thé (município).
Gdański (Pho-lân-bûn: Gdański) sī Pho-lân Pomorskie séng ê chi̍t ê to͘-hōe kūn (powiat grodzkie).
Würzburg sī Tek-kok Bayern ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Tamil Nadu sī Ìn-tō͘ ê chi̍t-ê Pang, siú-hú sī Chennai, 1956 nî chhòng-li̍p, tāi-iok ū 6488 bān ê jîn-kháu.
Oaxaca de Juárez sī Be̍k-se-ko Oaxaca ê siú-hú kap siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Orléans sī Hoat-kok Loiret ê siú-hú, tī Paris ê se-lâm.
Reading sī Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok Eng-lân Berkshire ē-kha ê chi̍t ê koān.
Hirosima-chhī sī Ji̍t-pún Hirosima Koān ê koān-thiaⁿ só͘-chāi-tē kap siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Köln sī Tek-kok Nordrhein-Westfalen siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.

column2: ['tiâu-sián bîn-chú-chú-gī jîn-bîn kiōng-hô-kok', 'tiâu-sián', 'dprk', 'north korea', 'pak-hân', 'pak-korea', 'pak-tiâu-sián', 'pak tiâu-sian', 'pak tiâu-sián', 'tiau-sián', 'tiâu-sian', 'tiâu-sian bîn-chú-chú-gī jîn-bîn kiōng-hô-kok', 'tiâu sián bîn chú chú gī jîn bîn kiōng hô kok', 'tiâusián bînchúchúgī jînbîn kiōnghôkok']
column3: Tiâu-sián ū kî-tha ê ì-sù, chhiáⁿ-khoàⁿ: Tiâu-sián Tiâu-sián Bîn-chú-chú-gī Jîn-bîn Kiōng-hô-kok, mā thang kiò chò Pak Tiâu-sián, ūi tī A-chiu tang-pō͘ Tiâu-sián Pòan-tó pak-pêng ê kok-ka.
Ná-ui, choân-miâ Ná-ui Ông-kok sī Pak Au ê 1 ê kok-ka.
Tāi-hân sī cheh-khùi chi it, Ji̍t-thaû se̍h kaù chhiah-keng 300° ~ 315° hit kúi kang.
O-lân, "Hô-lân", "Nî-tek-lân" choán kah chia.
Nova Scotia sī Canada Pak Tāi-se-iûⁿ hái-kîⁿ ê séng.
Lesotho Ông-kok (Eng-gí: Kingdom of Lesotho. Sesotho-gí: Mmuso wa Lesotho) sī lâm Hui-chiu ê 1 kok.
Ji̍t-pún, tiàm tī Tang A-chiu ê hái-tó kok-ka, tī Tiâu-sián Poàn-tó kap Thài-pêng-iûⁿ tiong-kan.
Monaco Thâu-lâng-kok (Hoat-gí: Principauté de Monaco) sī Au-chiu lâm-pō͘ chi̍t-ê oá Tē-tiong-hái ê kok-ka.
Samoa To̍k-li̍p-kok (Samoa-gí: Malo Sa'oloto Tuto'atasi o Samoa, Eng-gí: Independent State of Samoa) tiàm-tī lâm Thài-pêng-iûⁿ ê kûn-tó.

column2: ['tiong-hui kiōng-hô-kok', 'tiong hui-chiu', 'central african republic', 'tiong-hui', 'tiong hui kiōng hô kok', 'tionghui kiōnghôkok']
column3: Tiong-hui Kiōng-hô-kok (Hoat-gí: République Centrafricaine) tiàm-tī Hui-chiu ê loē-lio̍k kok-ka.

column2: ['tiong-hui kiōng-hô-kok', 'tiong hui-chiu', 'central african republic', 'tiong-hui', 'tiong hui kiōng hô kok', 'tionghui kiōnghôkok']
column3: Tiong Hui-chiu sī Hui-chiu tiong-pêng ê khu-he̍k.
Djibouti Kiōng-hô-kok (A-la-pek-gí: جمهورية جيبوتي, Hoat-gí: République de Djibouti) tiàm-tī Hui-chiu tang-pō·.

column2: ['má-lâi-se-a', '馬來西亞', '马来西亚', 'malaysia', 'má-lâi-se-a liân-pang', 'má-lâi-se-á', 'má lâi se a', 'málâisea']
column3: Má-lâi-se-a, tong-tē kán-chheng Tōa-má, Sin-ka-pho sio̍k-chheng Chiu-hú, sī Tang-lâm-a ê 1-ê kok-ka, i ê thó͘-tē hun-chòe 2 tōa pêng, tiong-ng keh Lâm Tiong-kok Hái.
Namibia Kiōng-hô-kok tiàm-tī Hui-chiu sai-lâm ("sai-lâm-hui"), Tāi-se-iûⁿ hái-hōaⁿ piⁿ--a.

column2: ['an-thí-gōa kap ba̍h-bú-tà', 'antigua kap barbuda', 'antigua and barbuda']
column3: Antigua kap Barbuda sī tiàm-tī Carib-hái tang-pêng kap Tāi-se-iûⁿ siō-kau-kài ê hái-tó kok-ka.
Mauritania Islam Kiōng-hô-kok (A-la-pek-gí: الجمهورية الإسلامية الموريتانية, Hoat-gí: République Islamique de Mauritanie) tiàm-tī Hui-chiu sai-pak-pêng.
Belize sī Tiong Bí-chiu ê kok-ka.
Guinea (khu-pia̍t-ia̍h) lia̍t chhut miâ chhin-chhiūⁿ ê bûn-chiuⁿ.

column2: ['saint kitts kap nevis', 'saint kitts and nevis']
column3: Saint Kitts kap Nevis Liân-pang sī tiàm-tī tī Carib-hái ê hái-tó kok-ka.
Comoros Liân-ha̍p, tiàm-tī Hui-chiu tang-lâm-pō͘ Mozambique Hái-tō tiong ê kiōng-hô-kok.
Dominica Kok, tī Carib-hái ê 1-ê kiōng-hô-kok.
Saint Lucia sī tiàm-tī Carib-hái tang-pêng kap Tāi-se-iûⁿ siō-kau-kài ê hái-tó kok-ka.

North Yorkshire sī England Yorkshire and the Humber khu-he̍k (region) ê chi̍t-ê kūn (county), sī chi̍t-ê hui-to͘-chhī-kūn (non-metropolitan county), kap piⁿ-á ê City of York, Redcar and Cleveland í-ki̍p Middlesbrough cho͘-ha̍p-sêng chi̍t-ê Ceremonial county.
Berkshire sī Eng-lân lâm-pō͘ tē-khu ê chi̍t-ê kūn, oá tī London ê se-pêng.
Eng-lân sī Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok ê chi̍t pō͘-hūn.

column2: ['pak ài-ní-lân', 'northern ireland', 'pak ireland', 'pak ài ní lân', 'pak àinílân']
column3: Pak Ài-ní-lân sī Ài-ní-lân pak-pêng, sio̍k Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok ê hit-pō͘-hūn.
Acapulco sī Be̍k-se-ko Guerrero siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.

column2: ['ìn-nî', 'ìn-tō͘-nî-se-a', 'hô-lân tang ìn-tō͘', 'ìn-tō͘-nî-se-a kiōng-hô-kok', '印尼', 'in-ni kiōng-hô-kok', 'indonesia', 'indonesia kiōng-hô-kok', 'ìn-nî kiōng-hô-kok', 'ìn nî', 'ìnnî']
column3: Ìn-nî, choân-chheng Ìn-tō͘-nî-se-a Kiōng-hô-kok, sī tī Tang-lâm-a poàn-tó kap Ò-chiu ê tiong-kan só͘-chai, mā tī Ìn-tō͘-iûⁿ kap Thài-pêng-iûⁿ tiong-kan ê kok-ka, sī sè-kài siōng toā ê kûn-tó.

column2: ['ìn-nî', 'ìn-tō͘-nî-se-a', 'hô-lân tang ìn-tō͘', 'ìn-tō͘-nî-se-a kiōng-hô-kok', '印尼', 'in-ni kiōng-hô-kok', 'indonesia', 'indonesia kiōng-hô-kok', 'ìn-nî kiōng-hô-kok', 'ìn nî', 'ìnnî']
column3: Hô-lân Tang Ìn-tō͘, ū kiò Hô-lân niá Tang Ìn-tō͘, kán-chheng Lân-ìn, sī Hô-lân ê si̍t-bîn-tē, siú-hú Batavia, 1949 nî siū sêng-jīm sêng-li̍p chú-khoân kok-ka Ìn-tō͘-nî-se-a.
Hi-lia̍p, mā ū kóng Hi-la̍h, chèng-sek hō Hi-lia̍p Kiōng-hô-kok, tī Au-chiu tang-lâm, Balkan Poàn-tó boé-liu ê kok-ka.
Ukraina, mā thang im-e̍k chò Ú-khek-lân, sī tang Au-chiu ê 1 ê kiōng-hô-kok.
Be̍k-se-ko Liân-pang-kok, ia̍h ū kóng Be̍k-kî-se-ko-kok, Bí-hi-ko, sī Pak Bí-chiu ê kok-ka.
Armenia Kiōng-hô-kok (Armenia-gí: Հայաստան. Lô-má-jī: Hayastani Hanrapetut’yun. Eng-gí: Armenia), tiàm-tī Sai-lâm-a ê kok-ka.
Iraq Kiōng-hô-kok sī tī Tiong-tang kap sai-lâm A-chiu ê 1 ê kok-ka.

column2: ['hân-kok', 'tāi-hân bîn-kok', 'lam-hân', 'lâm-hân', 'lâm hân', 'south korea', 'tāi-hân-bîn-kok', 'tāi hân bîn kok', 'tāihân bînkok']
column3: Hân-kok ū kî-tha ê ì-sù, chhiáⁿ-khoàⁿ: Hân-kok Tāi-hân Bîn-kok, mā hō-chò Hân-kok, Lâm-hân, sī chi̍t-ê ūi-tī tang-pak A-chiu Tiâu-sián Pòan-tó lâm-pō͘ ê kok-ka.

column2: ['hân-kok', 'tāi-hân bîn-kok', 'lam-hân', 'lâm-hân', 'lâm hân', 'south korea', 'tāi-hân-bîn-kok', 'tāi hân bîn kok', 'tāihân bînkok']
column3: Fürstenberg, Lower Saxony sī Tek-kok Niedersachsen Chiu Holzminden Kūn ê chi̍t-ê chhī-tìn.

column2: ['dominica kiōng-hô-kok', 'domingo kiōng-hô-kok', 'dominic', 'dominica kiōng hô kok', 'dominica kiōnghôkok', 'dominican kiōng-hô-kok', 'dominican republic', 'dominicana', 'dominicana kiōng-hô-kok', 'to-bêng-nî-ka kiōng-hô-kok']
column3: Dominica Kiōng-hô-kok (Se-pan-gâ-gí: República Dominicana), tiàm-tī Sió-se-pan-gâ tang-pêng ê kok-ka.
Gambia Kiōng-hô-Kok (Eng-gí: Republic of The Gambia) tiàm-tī sai Hui-chiu.
Ghana Kiōng-hô-Kok tiàm-tī Hui-chiu sai-pō͘, Benin-oan hù-kīn.
Nigeria Liân-pang Kiōng-hô-Kok (Eng-gí: Federal Republic of Nigeria) tiàm-tī Hui-chiu sai-pō͘, sī Hui-chiu jîn-kháu siāng chē ê kok-ka.
Côte d'Ivoire Kiōng-hô-kok, ia̍h-sī hoan-e̍k chò Chhiūⁿ-gê Hái-hoāⁿ, sī tī Se Hui-chiu ê kok-ka.
Liberia sī Costa Rica Guanacaste Séng ê chi̍t ê kūn.
Niger Kiōng-hô-Kok (République du Niger) tiàm-tī Hui-chiu sai-pō·.
Gabon Kiōng-hô-kok (Hoat-gí: République Gabonaise) tiàm-tī Hui-chiu ê kok-ka.

column2: ['congo kiōng-hô-kok', 'congo kiōng hô kok', 'congo kiōnghôkok', 'republic of the congo']
column3: Congo Kiōng-hô-kok tī Hui-chiu tiong-se-pō·.
Cameroon Kiōng-hô-kok (Hoat-gí: République du Cameroun. Eng-gí: Republic of Cameroon) tiàm-tī Hui-chiu ê kok-ka.
Guinea (khu-pia̍t-ia̍h) lia̍t chhut miâ chhin-chhiūⁿ ê bûn-chiuⁿ.
Senegal Kiōng-hô-Kok (Hoat-gí: République du Sénégal) tiàm-tī sai Hui-chiu, Senegal-hô ê lâm.
Hoat-kok, iā-sī kiò-chò Hu̍t-lân-se/Pu̍t-lân-se, Se-á-kok kap Hoat-lân-se, sī Au-chiu sai-pêng ê kiōng-hô-kok.

Bîn-siok sī lī-iōng ka-tī leh tòa ê chhù-the̍h pâng-keng, kiat-ha̍p tong-tē jîn-bûn, chū-jiân kéng-koan, seng-thāi, khoân-kéng chu-goân kap lông-gia̍p, lîm-gia̍p, hî-gia̍p, bo̍k-gia̍p seng-sán o̍ah-tōng, í ka-têng hù-gia̍p hong-sek keng-êng, thê-kiong lú-kheh chng-kha iá-gōa seng-o̍ah ê tòa-hioh chhù-só·.
Ecuador Kiōng-hô-kok tī Lâm Bí-chiu sai-pak-pêng.

column2: ['ài-ní-lân', 'ai-ní-lân', '愛耳蘭共和國', '爱耳兰共和国', 'ai-jíⁿ-lân', 'ireland-tó', 'ireland kiōng-hô-kok', 'poblacht na héireann', 'republic of ireland', 'ài-ní-lân-tó', 'ài-ní-lân tó', 'ài ní lân', 'àinílân', 'éire-kok', 'éire-lân', 'éire kiōng-hô-kok']

column3: Siông-gô sī Tiong-kok ê 1-ê sîn-ōe jîn-bu̍t.
Madagascar Kiōng-hô-kok (Madagascar-gí: Repoblikan'i Madagasikara) tī sai Ìn-tō͘-iûⁿ.
Maldives sī Ìn-tō͘-iûⁿ lāi-bīn ê hái-tó kok-ka, tī Ìn-tō͘ ê sai-lâm-pêng.
El Salvador Kiōng-hô-kok (Se-pan-gâ-gí: República de El Salvador) sī Tiong Bí-chiu oá Thài-pêng-iûⁿ ê chi̍t-ê kok-ka.

column2: ['hui-li̍p-pin', 'hui-lu̍t-pin', 'hui-li̍p-pin kiōng-hô-kok', 'hui-lu̍t-pin kiōng-hô-kok', '菲律宾', '菲律賓', 'hui-le̍k-pin', 'hui-lip-pin', 'hui-li̍p-pín', 'hui-li̍t-pin', 'hui li̍p pin', 'huili̍ppin', 'philippines']
column3: Hui-li̍p-pin ia̍h-sī im-e̍k chò Hui-lu̍t-pin, choân-chheng Hui-li̍p-pin Kiōng-hô-kok, tī A-chiu ê tang-pō͘, iû Thài-pêng-iûⁿ ê Hui-li̍p-pin Kûn-tó kah sì-kho͘-le̍ ê tó-sū, lóng-chóng 7500 gōa ê tōa-sió tó-sū cho͘-sêng.
Seychelles Kiōng-hô-kok (Hoat-gí: République des Seychelles, Eng-gí: Republic of Seychelles, Sesel-gí: Repiblik Sesel) tiàm-tī Ìn-tō͘-iûⁿ, léng-thó͘ iû chē-chē tó cho͘-sêng.
Chhī-gōa sī siâⁿ-chhī gōa-ûi ê ke-chhī, kau-gōa, he̍k-chiá sī hū-kīn pa̍t-ê chū-lo̍h.
Keh-to͘ (Hàn-jī: 隔都, Eng-gí: ghetto) sī siâⁿ-chhī lāi-té chi̍t khoán chió-sò͘ cho̍k-kûn teh khiā-khí ê khu-he̍k.
Blackpool sī Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok Eng-lân Blackpool ē-kha ê chi̍t ê koān.
Sūi-tián, choân-miâ Sūi-tián Ông-kok, sī Pak Au ê kok-ka, Pak-au kok-ka kî-tiong chi̍t-kok.
Verónica Michelle Bachelet Jeria /βeˈɾonika miˈʃɛl baʃˈle ˈçeɾja/ sī Chile Siā-hōe-tóng ê chèng-tī jîn-bu̍t.
Genova (Italia-bûn: Comune di Genova) sī Italia Liguria toā-khu Genova Séng ê chi̍t ê comune.
Vladivostok sī Lō͘-se-a Primorsky Pian-kiong-khu ê chi̍t ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Kuwait Chhī sī Kuwait ê siú-to͘ kap siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Siú-to͘ (kiaⁿ-siâⁿ) sī chèng-tī o̍ah-tōng ê tiong-sim siâⁿ-chhī, kok-ka-kip ê chèng-hú ki-koan lóng-ē siat-tiàm chia, chhin-chhiūⁿ kok-hōe, chóng-thóng-hú, hông-kiong, chòe-ko-hoat-īⁿ téng-téng.
Puerto Rico Chū-iû Kiat-ha̍p Kok (Se-pan-gâ-gí: Estado Libre Asociado de Puerto Rico. Eng-gí: Commonwealth of Puerto Rico), Bí-kok tiàm-tī Carib-hái ê léng-thó͘.
Liechtenstein Thâu-lâng-kok (Tek-gí: Fürstentum Liechtenstein) sī Au-chiu tiong-pō͘ ê chi̍t-ê lōe-lio̍k kok-ka.
Andorra Kong-kok sī Au-chiu sai-lâm-pêng ê 1 ê chiâⁿ sè ê kong-kok, khiā tī Pirineo Soaⁿ-lêng, giap tī Hoat-kok kap Se-pan-gâ tiong-kan.
Se Ò-chiu sī Ò-chiu ê chi̍t-ê chiu, siú-hú sī Perth, jîn-kháu ū 2,105,800 lâng.
Tennessee sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu, jîn-kháu tāi-iok ū 5,689,283, pâi-miâ tē 17.

Kansas sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu.
Vermont sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu.
Massachusetts sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu.
Rhode Island chiàⁿ-miâ State of Rhode Island and Providence Plantations, sī Bí-kok siāng sió ê chi̍t-ê chiu, jîn-kháu tāi-iok ū 1,048,319, pâi-miâ tē 43.
South Dakota sī Bí-kok tiong-se-pō͘ ê chi̍t-ê chiu, jîn-kháu tāi-iok ū 781,919, pâi-miâ tē 46.
Niedersachsen sī Tek-kok ê chi̍t-ê liân-pang-chiu, siú-hú sī Hannover, 1949 nî ka-ji̍p liân-pang, tāi-iok ū 799 bān ê jîn-kháu.
Alaska sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu.
Montana sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu.
Oregon sī Bí-kok Thài-pêng-iûⁿ hái-hōaⁿ ê chi̍t-ê chiu, jîn-kháu tāi-iok ū 3,421,399, pâi-miâ tē 27.
Louisiana sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu.
Lâm Ò-chiu sī Ò-chiu ê chi̍t-ê chiu, siú-hú sī Adelaide, jîn-kháu ū 1,581,400 lâng.
Oklahoma sī Bí-kok lâm-hong ê chi̍t-ê chiu, jîn-kháu tāi-iok ū 3,579,212, pâi-miâ tē 28.
Arkansas sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu.
Victoria sī Ò-chiu ê chi̍t-ê chiu, siú-hú sī Melbourne, jîn-kháu ū 5,188,100 lâng.
Florida sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu.
Chit-phiⁿ bûn-chiuⁿ siá ê sī Bí-kok ê chiu.
North Carolina sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu, jîn-kháu tāi-iok ū 8,049,313, pâi-miâ tē 10.
New Mexico sī Bí-kok sai-lâm ê chi̍t-ê chiu, jîn-kháu tāi-iok ū 2,499,481, pâi-miâ tē 35.
Arizona sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu.
Mississippi sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu.
South Carolina sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu, jîn-kháu tāi-iok ū 4,321,249, pâi-miâ tē 24.
Virginia sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu.
Idaho sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu.
Alabama sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu.
Hawaiʻi sī Bí-kok î-it tiàm-tī Thài-pêng-iûⁿ ê chiu.
Nevada sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu.
California sī Bí-kok se-hoāⁿ ê chi̍t-ê chiu.
Wyoming sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu.
Utah sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu.
Colorado sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu.
North Dakota sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu, jîn-kháu tāi-iok ū 642,200, pâi-miâ tē 48.
Bihar sī Ìn-tō͘ ê chi̍t-ê Pang, siú-hú sī Patna, 1936 nî chhòng-li̍p, tāi-iok ū 9412 bān ê jîn-kháu.
Sheffield sī Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok Eng-lân Sheffield ē-kha ê chi̍t ê koān.
Oman Ông-kok, Sai-lâm-a ê kok-ka.
Iran ê kūn hō-chò shahrestan sī jī-kip hêng-chèng-khu, tī it-kip hêng-chèng-khu ostan ê ē-kha.
Pak Léng-tó͘ (Eng-gí: Northern Territory. kán-siá: NT) sī Australia ê chi̍t-ê tāi-lio̍k niá-tē (internal territory), siú-hú sī Darwin, jîn-kháu ū 217,559 lâng.
Yukon sī Canada ê chi̍t-ê léng-thó͘, tiàm-tī Canada ê sai-pak-pō͘, oá Bí-kok ê Alaska Chiu.
Stratford-upon-Avon sī Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok Eng-lân Sai Midlands Tōa-khu Warwickshire Kūn ê chi̍t ê bîn-chèng kàu-khu.
Bí-kok léng Samoa, Bí-kok tiàm-tī lâm Thài-pêng-iûⁿ ê 1-tè léng-thó͘, tī Samoa-kok ê tang.

Lincolnshire sī England tang-pō͘ ê chi̍t-ê kūn (county), sì-chiu-ûi ū Norfolk, Cambridgeshire, Rutland, Leicestershire, Nottinghamshire, South Yorkshire kap East Riding of Yorkshire, chham Northamptonshire ia̍h-ū 19 kong-chhioh ê sio-chiap, siú-hú sī Lincoln.
Damascus sī Su-lī-a ê siú-to͘.
Zaragoza sī tī Se-pan-gâ Aragón chū-tī siā-lí Zaragoza séng ê chi̍t ê municipio.
Giza sī Ai-ki̍p ê tē-3 tōa siâⁿ-chhī, só͘-chāi tī Nî-lô-hô sai-hōaⁿ, siú-to͘ Cairo sai-lâm-pêng 20 kong-lí chó͘-iū, ū jîn-kháu 2,68 bān.
Kó͘-tāi ê Sparta mā kiò Lacedaemon, sī Hi-lia̍p ê siâⁿ-chhī kok-ka, só͘-chāi tī Laconia.
Alger sī Algeria Alger séng ê chi̍t ê chng-thâu.
Lazio sī Italia ê chi̍t-ê tōa-khu, siú-hú sī Roma, tāi-iok ū 5,561,000 ê jîn-kháu, thó͘-tē bīn-chek 17,207 km².
Kuwait, Sai-lâm-a ê kok-ka, oá Pho-su-oan.
Iok-tàn Ông-kok, Sai-lâm-a ê kok-ka, hái-hoāⁿ-soàⁿ chin-té, oá Aqaba-oan.

Se-chōng sī Chheng-Chōng ko-gôan kūn Nepal, Bhutan kap Ìn-tō͘ ê chi̍t-ê tē-khu, tû-liáu hiān-sî Tiong-kok ê Se-chōng Chū-tī-khu í-gōa, Chheng-hái, Sù-chhoan, Hûn-lâm, Kam-siok, kap hū-kūn kok-ka iā-ū pō͘-hūn sī Se-chōng bûn-hòa, ia̍h-sī Chōng-cho̍k khiā-khí hōan-ûi.
Se-chōng Chū-tī-khu (Hàn-jī: 西藏自治區. Chōng-gí: བོད་རང་སྐྱོང་ལྗོངས་) sī Tiong-kok Sai-lâm tē-khu ê chi̍t-ê chū-tī-khu, siú-hú sī Lhasa (Chōng-gí: ལྷ་ས་).
Lī-pa-lùn Kiōng-hô-kok, Sai-lâm-a ê kok-ka, hái-hoāⁿ oá Tē-tiong-hái.
Sin Lâm Wales (Eng-gí: New South Wales. kán-siá: NSW) sī Australia ê chi̍t-ê chiu (state), siú-hú sī Sydney, jîn-kháu ū 6,817,100 lâng.
Vaticano, Vaticano-chhī(-kok) (Latin-gí: Status Civitatis Vaticanæ. Í-tāi-lī-gí: Stato della Città del Vaticano), sè-kài bīn-chek siāng-sè jîn-kháu siāng-chió ê kok-ka.
Fiji Kûn-tó Kiōng-hô-kok (Fiji-gí: Matanitu Tu-Vaka-i-koya ko Viti) sī 1-ê tī Tāi-iûⁿ-chiu ê kok-ka.
Amsterdam sī Kē-tē-kok ê siú-hú ia̍h tē-it-toā siâⁿ-chhī, tī Pak Hô-lân tē-khu, chhī-khu jîn-kàu 74.7 bān, to͘-hōe-khu jîn-kàu 670 bān, sī Kē-tē-kok ê kim-iông tiong-sim.
Hō "Bristol" ê kî-tha só͘-chāi ia̍h chit jī pat khoán ì-sù, khòaⁿ Bristol (khu-pia̍t-ia̍h).
Bristol sī Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok Eng-lân Avon ē-kha ê chi̍t ê koān.
Kraków (Pho-lân-bûn: Kraków) sī Pho-lân Małopolskie séng ê chi̍t ê to͘-hōe kūn (powiat grodzkie).
Nijmegen (Hô-lân-bûn: Nijmegen) sī Hô-lân Gelderland Séng ê chi̍t-ê ki-chân chèng-koân.
Düsseldorf sī Tek-kok Nordrhein-Westfalen ê siú-hú.
Tāi-pán-chhī sī Ji̍t-pún Tāi-pán-hú ê hú-thiaⁿ só͘-chāi-tē kap siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Cabo Verde Kiōng-hô-kok (Phû-tô-gâ-gí: República de Cabo Verde), sī 1 ê Pak Tāi-se-iûⁿ kûn-tó ê kok-ka, tē-lí siōng sio̍k-î Se Hui-chiu.

column2: ['saint vincent kap grenadines', 'saint vincent and the grenadines']
column3: Saint Vincent kap Grenadines sī tiàm-tī Carib-hái tang-pêng kap Tāi-se-iûⁿ siō-kau-kài ê hái-tó kok-ka.
Bahrain Ông-kok, Sai-lâm-a ê hái-tó kok-ka, oá Pho-su-oan ê chio̍h-iû chhut-sán-kok.
Edward Ông-chú Tó sī Canada bīn-chek thōng sè, lâng mā thōng chió ê séng.
Vanuatu Kiōng-hô-kok (Bislama-gí: Ripablik blong Vanuatu, Eng-gí: Republic of Vanuatu, Hoat-gí: République du Vanuatu) tiàm-tī lâm Thài-pêng-iûⁿ, si̍t-bîn sî-tāi ê kū miâ kiò chò Sin Hebrides.
Kiribati Kiōng-hô-kok (Kiribati ê hoat-im sī /kiribas/) sī 1-ê tī Tāi-iûⁿ-chiu ê kok-ka.
Trinidad kap Tobago Kiōng-hô-kok sī tiàm-tī Carib-hái tang-lâm-pêng ê hái-tó kok-ka.
Peng-tó Kiōng-hô-kok tī pak Tāi-se-iûⁿ, So͘-kat-lân kap Greenland ê tiong-kan.
Grenada sī tiàm-tī tī Carib-hái tang-lâm-pêng ê hái-tó kok-ka.
São Paulo sī Pa-se tē-it toā ê siâⁿ-chhī, mā-sī thong-sè-kài siōng toā ê to͘-hōe khu-he̍k chi-it, sī São Paulo Chiu ê siú-hú.

Berlin, mā hō choè Pek-lîm, sī Tek-kok ê Liân-pang-siú-to͘ (Bundeshauptstadt) kap Chèng-hú-chē-chí (Regierungssitz), mā-sī chi̍t-ê Liân-pang-chiu (Bundesland), jî-chhiáⁿ sī Tek-kok siāng-tōa ê siâⁿ-chhī, ū 341 bān lâng.

Mbabane sī Eswatini ê siú-to͘ kap siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.

Pak-kiaⁿ-chhī (hàn-jī: 北京市) sī Tiong-hôa Jîn-bîn Kiōng-hô-kok Hôa-pak tē-khu ê chi̍t-ê ti̍t-hat-chhī kap Tiong-hôa Jîn-bîn Kiōng-hô-kok ê hú-siâⁿ, kú-tn̂g í-lâi mā sī Tiong-kok ê bûn-hòa kap chèng-tī tiong-sim.

Bo̍k-su-kho sī Lō͘-se-a Liân-pang ê siú-to͘ kap jîn-kháu siāng chē ê siâⁿ-chhī, ū tāi-io̍k 1260 bān lâng tòa tī siâⁿ-chhī kéng-lāi, 1700 bān lâng tòa tī chhī-khu lāi, 2000 bān tòa tī to͘-hōe-khu lāi.
Benin Kiōng-hô-Kok tiàm-tī sai Hui-chiu, Benin-oan hù-kīn.

Ulaanbaatar sī Bông-kó͘ ê siú-to͘ kap siāng-tōa ê siâⁿ-chhī, jîn-kháu kó͘-kè tāi-iok 774,000.

Bern (Tek-gí: Bern [bɛrn], Hoat-gí: Berne [bɛʀn], Italia-gí: Berna [ˈbɛrna], Rumantsch: Berna [ˈbɛrnə], Bern Tek-gí: Bärn [b̥æːrn]) sī Sūi-se ê Bundesstadt (liân-pang-chhī, de facto ê siú-to͘), mā sī Sūi-se te-5 toā ê siâⁿ-chhī, pâi tī Zürich, Genève, Basel kap Lausanne āu-piah.
Dushanbe sī Tajikistan ê siú-to͘ kap siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Ankara sī Thó͘-ní-kî ê siú-to͘ kap te-2 toā ê siâⁿ-chhī, pâi tī Istanbul āu-piah.
Tashkent sī Uzbekistan ê siú-to͘, mā sī Tashkent Séng ê hú-siâⁿ.
Melbourne sī Ò-chiu ê Victoria chiu lāi siāng-chē jîn-kháu ê siâⁿ-chhī kiam siú-hú, ia̍h sī choân kok jîn-kháu-sò͘ tē-jī ê siâⁿ.
Apia sī Samoa ê siú-to͘, tiàm tī Upolu Tó ê pak hái-hoāⁿ.
Kinshasa sī Congo Bîn-chú Kiōng-hô-kok ê siú-to͘ kap siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Naha-chhī sī Ji̍t-pún Okinawa Koān ê koān-thiaⁿ só͘-chāi-tē kap siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Valparaíso sī Chile Valparaíso khu Valparaíso séng ê chi̍t ê chū-tī-thé (comuna).
Rio de Janeiro sī Brasil ia̍h Lâm America ê tē-jī toā siâⁿ-chhī, sī Rio de Janeiro Chiu ê siú-hú, éng-pái ū chò-kòe Brasil chham Portugal, Pa-se kap Algarve Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok ê siú-to͘.
Québec-chhī sī Canada Québec ê siú-hú.
Mashhad sī chi̍t ê tī Iran Islam Kiōng-hô-kok Razavi Khorasan Séng Mashhad Kūn Tiong-iong Koān ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Sydney sī Ò-chiu siāng-tōa kap siāng-lāu ê siâⁿ-chhī.
İstanbul (Thó͘-ní-kî-gí: İstanbul) sī Thó͘-ní-kî İstanbul Séng ê siú-hú, mā-si Thó͘-ní-kî siāng-toā ê siâⁿ-chhī kap káng-kháu.
Detroit sī Bí-kok Michigan siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Saint Louis sī Bí-kok Missouri tē-2 toā ê siâⁿ-chhī, pâi tī Kansas City āu-piah.

column2: ['new york chhī', '紐約', '紐約州', '纽约', '纽约州', 'new york city']
column3: New York Chhī (New York City. chèng-sek tē-miâ: The City of New York) mā kóng New York, tī Tâi-oân-ōe ū kiò Niú-iok (紐約) ia̍h Niu-iok-kuh (Ji̍t-gí: ニューヨーク), sī Bí-kok tang-pak ê chi̍t-ê siâⁿ-chhī, sī New York Chiu ê chi̍t-pō͘-hūn, hūn-chòe 5-ê borough, pau-hâm The Bronx, Brooklyn, Manhattan, Queens kap Staten Island.
Philadelphia sī Bí-kok Pennsylvania siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Houston sī Bí-kok Mississippi chiu Chickasaw kūn ê chi̍t ê chng-thâu (city).
Tripoli sī Libya ê siú-to͘ kap siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.

Pa-se (巴西), ia̍h-sī kiò chò Peh-la̍t-se-ní (伯剌西爾), choân-miâ Pa-se Liân-pang Kiōng-hô-kok (Portugal-gí: República Federativa do Brasil), sī Lâm Bí-chiu siāng tōa ê kok-ka, tī Lâm-bí tāi-lio̍k ê tang-pak-pêng.
Québec sī Canada bīn-chek thōng toā ê séng, tiàm tī Canada ê tang-pō͘.
Toronto sī Canada siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī, 2004-nî sî jîn-kháu 2,518,772 lâng.
﻿Charlottetown sī Canada Edward Ông-chú Tó ê siú-hú kap siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Regina sī Canada Saskatchewan ê siú-hú.
Fredericton sī Canada New Brunswick Séng ê siú-hú, tiàm tī New Brunswick ê sai-lâm-pō͘.
L'Aquila sī Ì-tāi-lī Abruzzo Tōa-khu L'Aquila Séng ê chi̍t-ê comune (chhī-tìn).
Venezia sī Italia pak-pō͘ ê siâⁿ-chhī, Veneto toā-khu ê siú-hú, hêng-chèng-khu jîn-kháu ū 27 bān.
Piemonte sī Italia ê chi̍t-ê tōa-khu (regione), siú-hú sī Torino, tāi-iok ū 4,401,000 ê jîn-kháu, thó͘-tē bīn-chek 25,399 km².
Siâⁿ-koan-khu sī Tiong-kok Se-chōng Chū-tī-khu Lhasa-chhī ê chi̍t ê chhī-hat-khu.
La Paz sī Be̍k-se-ko Baja California Sur ê siú-hú kap siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Pretoria sī Lâm-hui-kok ê hêng-chèng síu-to͘.
Cape Town sī Lâm-hui-kok ê li̍p-hoat siú-to͘ kap tē-2 toā ê siâⁿ-chhī, mā sī Western Cape Séng ê siú-to͘.
Texas sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t-ê chiu.
Den Haag, ia̍h 's-Gravenhage, sī Kē-tē-kok ê tē saⁿ toā siâⁿ-chhī, jîn-kháu 47.5 bān.
Commune, thang-chí ke-chng, it-poaⁿ hoan-e̍k chò kong-siā, sīm-chì sī siâⁿ-chhī, sī Hoat-kok ê chi̍t-ê hêng-chèng-khu chân-kip.
Phoenix sī Bí-kok Arizona ê siú-hú kap siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Denver sī Bí-kok Colorado ê siú-hú kap siāng toā ê siâⁿ-chhī.
Perth sī Ò-chiu ê Se Ò-chiu ê hú-siâⁿ kap siāng-tōa ê siâⁿ-chhī, 2007 nî ê thóng-kè jîn-kháu ū 1,554,769, mā-sī choân Ò-chiu tē 4 tōa ê siâⁿ-chhī, pâi tiàm Sydney, Melbourne kap Brisbane ê aū-piah.
Département sī Hoat-kok ê chi̍t khóan hêng-chèng-khu, ē-sái hoan-e̍k chòe "séng" ia̍h "koān", tē-hng chèng-hú hō-chòe chóng lí-sū-hōe (conseil général).
Provincia sī Lia̍p-teng-gú ê hêng-chèng khu-ōe hō-miâ, pún-té sī ēng tī Italia í-gōa ê siāng ko ki̍p ê khu-ōe hē-thóng, Hàn-gí ē-sài hoan-e̍k chò "séng" he̍k-chiá "hêng-séng", "séng-hūn".
Attica Tōa-khu sī Hi-lia̍p ê chi̍t ê tōa-khu. ū jîn-kháu 3,756,453 lâng, thó͘-tē bīn-chek 3,808.1 pêng-hong kong-lí.
Chè-tō͘ (制度) sī siā-hōe kho-ha̍k ê chi̍t-ê kài-liām. tāi-piáu lī-iōng kui-chek kap ūn-chok bô͘-sek lâi kui-hoān kò-thé hêng-tōng ê chi̍t-khoán siā-hōe kiat-kò͘.
Ge̍k-thāi sī 1-ê lâng kā pa̍t-lâng ia̍h tōng-bu̍t--ê sim-lí á-sī sin-khu siong-hāi--ê hêng-ûi.

Pek-hāi (迫害) sī jīm-hô lâng ia̍h-sī jīm-hô thoân-thé tī bó͘ chi̍t ê siā-kûn lāi-bin siū-tio̍h ê giâm-tiōng ê bô-pêng-téng ê tùi-thāi, pau-hâm giâm-tiōng ê kî-sī, bô-chèng-tong ê siā-hoē kui-hoān, í-ki̍p chē-chē khoán ê pō-le̍k.

column2: ['lô-má thài-pêng', 'pax romana', 'lô má thài pêng', 'lômá thàipêng']
column3: Lô-má Thài-pêng sī Lô-má Tè-kok chi̍t tōaⁿ khah hô-pêng khah bô tùi gōa chiàn-cheng ê sî-kî, sî-kan sī kong-goân 1 kàu 2 sè-kí, chêng Augustus hông-tè hit chūn, sòa 200 gōa tang kú.
Hô-pêng tāi-piáu bô chiàn-cheng, bô pō-le̍k hêng-uî ê chōng-thài.
McCarthy chú-gī (McCarthyism) sī tī bô chhiong-hun chèng-kù ê chêng-hêng hā lâi chí-khòng pa̍t-lâng put-tiong, tian-hok, poān-kok téng chōe.
Hòa-chio̍h sī tōng-bu̍t si̍t-bu̍t ûi chú seng-bu̍t-thé ê ûi-hâi kap hûn-jiah.

Koan-tê (捐題, Eng-gí: donation) iah-sī koan-iân (捐緣), kì-hù (kià-hù, Ji̍t-gí: 寄付 Kihu), koan-chō͘, sī kā kā-tī ū--ê mi̍h, kim-gîn, châi-sán, he̍k-chiá sī khì-koan sàng (iân) hō͘ pa̍t-lâng iah-sī pa̍t--ê thoân-thé chò kong-kiōng chû-siān--ê tāi-chì.
Chiúⁿ Keng-kok Chiat-kang Hōng-hòa lâng, Tiong-kok hiān-tāi tù-miâ chèng-tī-ka Chiúⁿ Kài-se̍k ê tióng-chú, Tiong-hôa Bîn-kok tē-6 kap tē-7 jīm chóng-thóng.
Hoē-lu̍t sī nn̄g khoán hoè-pè chi kan ē-sái hō͘-siōng kau-oāⁿ ê pí-lu̍t, it-poaⁿ sī ēng "1 kho͘" ê bó͘ chi̍t khoán hoè-pè ē-sái oāⁿ lēng-goā chi̍t khoán hoè-pè goā chē lâi piáu-sī.
Goân-chú-kà sī chi̍t-sia goân-chú ga̍h khî-tha ê goân-chú kiat-ha̍p ê sò͘-jī.
Goân-chú chit-liōng (Eng-gí: atomic mass), hû-hō ma, sī chi̍t lia̍p goân-chú ê chit-liōng.

Siong-tùi goân-chú chit-liōng, a̍h sī kóng goân-chú tāng-liōng sī chi̍t khoán thian-jiân chûn-chāi ê goân-sò͘ goân-chú, i pêng-kin bí lia̍p ê chit-liōng kap 12C goân-chú chit-liōng ê 1/12 chi kan ê pí-lē.
Goân-chú chit-liōng (Eng-gí: atomic mass), hû-hō ma, sī chi̍t lia̍p goân-chú ê chit-liōng.

Siong-tùi goân-chú chit-liōng, a̍h sī kóng goân-chú tāng-liōng sī chi̍t khoán thian-jiân chûn-chāi ê goân-sò͘ goân-chú, i pêng-kin bí lia̍p ê chit-liōng kap 12C goân-chú chit-liōng ê 1/12 chi kan ê pí-lē.
Hun-chú-liōng (分子量) sī hun-chú ê chit-liōng, eng-bûn hō-chòe molecular mass ia̍h-sī molecular weight.

Ìn-tō͘-kàu, sè-kài siōng khah chú-iàu ê chong-kàu chi-it, sìn-tô͘ tih-beh chhiau-kòe 10.5-ek lâng, kan-na su hō͘ ū 15-ek sìn-tô͘ ê Ki-tok-kàu kah 11-ek sìn-tô͘ ê Bo̍k-su-lîm-kàu, sǹg sī sè-kài tē-3 tōa ê chong-kàu.
Yoga sī chi̍t khoán sin-thé, sim-sèng kap cheng-sîn siōng ê Ìn-tō͘ sek chhau-liān.

Phín-chéng (-chióng), ū-sî kóng chéng, sī ka-thiok lāi-té gōa-piáu, hêng-ûi kap kî-tha sèng-chit kâng-khoán, jî-chhiá ê-tàng kap m̄ sio̍k pún phín-chéng ê kî-tha kâng bu̍t-chéng tōng-bu̍t ū it-tēng ê khu-pia̍t ê chi̍t kûn tōng-bu̍t.
Ki-lu̍t (機率. Eng-bûn: probability) sī chhek-liông sū-kiāⁿ hoat-seng ê khó-lêng-sèng.
Kū-lī, ia̍h sī kóng lō͘-thêng, tiō sī thong-sio̍k kóng ê hn̄g/kīn, sī siang-pêng mi̍h-kiāⁿ he̍k-chiá sī sò͘-ha̍k-siōng tiám chi kan sio lī-khui ê tn̂g-tō͘.
Phú-sek sī chi̍t lūi o͘-sek kap pe̍h-sek chi kan ê sek-tī, sī chi̍t lūi bô-chhái-sek (achromatic) ê sek-tī.
Thoân-kàu-sū-sek sī 1 khoán jîn-lūi nn̄g-sèng-loân sèng-kau ê chu-sè. che tāi-khài sī Se-hng siōng-chē-lâng chai-iáⁿ ê sèng-chu-sè.
sok-le̍k
Hiam sī chi̍t khoán chhì-kek ê khì-bī, i tī seng-lí-ha̍k siōng sī sio thiàⁿ kám-kak ín-khí--ê.

Chong-kàu sī in-ūi tùi sîn, Siōng-tè, chhiau-thoat ê chûn-chāi, sîn-sèng ê mi̍h téng-téng ê sìn-gióng, hō·-siōng kiat-ha̍p, saⁿ-kap oa̍h-tōng, sán-seng chè-tō· kap cho·-chit, che kui-ê thāi-tō·, koan-hē, cho·-chit ê chóng-chheng.
An-hioh-ji̍t hōe (Seventh-day Adventist Church) si Ki-tok Sin-kàu ê chi̍t-ê hui thôan-thóng kàu-phài.

Ka-pi-sek, ia̍h sī kóng chang-sek, tê-sek, sī cho͘-ha̍p sek-tī chi̍t khoán, chiàu CMYK ê thàu-sek goân-lí, ē-sái sī âng-sek, o͘-sek chham n̂g-sek ê saⁿ-lām. he̍k-chiá chúi-âng ka o͘-sek. ia̍h âng-sek n̂g-sek thàu nâ-sek.
It-sîn-lūn sī kóng sîn ka-ta chit-ê, he̍k-chiá sī chú-tiuⁿ sîn ê î-it sèng-chit ê sìn-gióng.
Chū-koat (自決) sī kun-kù Liân-ha̍p-kok Hiàn-chiong kap kok-chè-hoat kui-tēng ê chi̍t hāng chèng-tī khôan-le̍k, chú-tiuⁿ jîn-bîn ē-ēng chū-iû koat-tēng in ka-kī ê chèng-tī tē-ūi.
Put-téng-sek tī sò͘-ha̍k siōng sī 2-ê sò͘-ta̍t chi-kan ê chi̍t chióng koan-hē, piáu-sī in sī bô-kāng ê.
Ài-kok-chú-gī (Hàn-jī: 愛國主義) sī lī-iōng kek-hoat ài-kok sim-chêng lâi chìn-hêng chi̍p-thé hêng-tōng ia̍h-sī chèng-tī tōng-goân ê chi̍t khóan ì-sek hêng-thài.
Chhek-tēng sī tùi chi̍t chióng bu̍t-lí-liōng chìn-hêng chhek-liông.

column2: ['kéng-lāi seng-sán chóng-gia̍h', 'chiu-lāi seng-sán chóng-gia̍h', 'gdp', 'kok-lāi chóng seng-sán', 'kok-lāi seng-sán chóng-gia̍h']
column3: Kéng-lāi seng-sán chóng-gia̍h (Eng-gí: gross domestic product, GDP) sī chi̍t-ê kok-ka (ia̍h tē-khu) tī chi̍t toāⁿ sî-kan lāi, só͘-ū châi-hoè kap ho̍k-bū ê choè-āu seng-sán chóng kè-ta̍t.
Toā-kho͘ (Eng-gí: obesity) sī kóng jîn-lūi ia̍h pa̍t chióng chhī-leng tōng-bu̍t ê chi-hông cho͘-chit (adipose tissue) siuⁿ chē, chē kah ē siong-hāi kiān-khong, cheng-ka sí-bông-lu̍t (mortality).
pH sī ùi kheng lî-chú (H+) ê o̍ah-sèng lâi-khòaⁿ, tùi iông-e̍k sng-sèng ê chhek-liông.
Khoân-le̍k (權力) sī chi̍t chióng kóng-hoat chûn-chāi ê siā-hoē hiān-siōng, sī chèng-tī-ha̍k kap kok-chè-koan-hē-ha̍k ê hu̍t-sim kài-liām.
Liâm-tō͘ (黏度. viscosity) sī piáu-ta̍t bu̍t-chit liâm-sèng ê bu̍t-lí-liōng.
Zoroaster-kàu sī kun-kù in sian-ti Zoroaster kà-sī chò ki-chhó͘ ê chong-kàu, in kiò in-ê sîn Ahura Mazda.
Luther-phài, tī Hàn-gí mā kóng Sìn-gī-hōe, sī Sin-kàu ê chú-iàu kàu-phài chi it, chú-tiuⁿ Martin Luther ê sîn-ha̍k su-sióng.
Bu̍t-chit ê bi̍t-tō͘ sī i chit-liōng tùi thé-chek ê pí-lē.
Nâ ia̍h nâ-sek (blue) sī khoàⁿ-ū-kng pho-tn̂g iok-liōng 420-490 nm hiah-ê sek-chúi, mā hō chò lâm-sek.
Un-tō͘ (Hàn: 溫度. Eng: temperature) tī hông-koan sī the̍h-lâi piáu-sī bu̍t-thé sio-léng thêng-tō͘ ê bu̍t-lí-liōng, tī bî-koan sī piáu-ta̍t bu̍t-thé hun-chú ūn-tōng ê kín-bān thêng-tō͘.

Mormon-phài (Eng-gí: Mormonism), he̍k-chiá Mormon-kàu, sī Āu-kî Sèng-tô͘ ūn-tōng (Latter Day Saint movement) ê chú-liû, in kî-tiong tōa-hūn lóng sio̍k Brigham Young chhōa-thâu ê Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok Āu-kî Sèng-tô͘ Kàu-hōe, lēng-gōa mā ū kî-tha ê phài-pia̍t.
Piáu-biān-chek sī chi̍t ê li̍p-thé hêng-chōng ê só͘-ū piáu-biān ê biān-chek.
Sèng-kong-hoē (Eng-gí: Anglicanism) sī Ki-tok-kàu tī Eng-tē hoat-tián chhut-lâi ê chi̍t-ê phài-piat.
Sîn-tō (神道 / しんとう) sī Ji̍t-pún pún-thó͘-ê gôan-sí chong-kàu.
Chiàu kó͘-tián kí-hô-ha̍k ê kóng-hoat, 1 ê îⁿ (circle) iah kiû (sphere) ê 1 tiâu poàⁿ-kèng (半徑) tō sī 1 ê toan-tiám tī îⁿ-sim iah kiû-sim, 1 ê toan-tiám tī îⁿ iah kiû téng-koân ê soàⁿ-koe̍h.

column2: ['islam', '伊斯兰教', '伊斯蘭教', '回教', 'hoê-kàu', 'i-su-lân', 'i-su-lân kàu', 'islam-kàu']
column3: I-su-lân sóa kàu chia.
Iû-thài-kàu hêng-sêng tī kong-gôan-chêng 2000 nî ê Tiong-tang tē-khu, kiàn-li̍p Iu-thài-kàu ê bîn-cho̍k sī hit-tong-sî ê iû-bo̍k bîn-cho̍k Hi-pek-lâi-lâng.
Sek-un (Hàn: 室溫. Eng: room temperature) he̍k-chiá siông-un (常溫) it-poaⁿ ê tēng-gī sī Liap-sī 25-tō͘ (25°C).
Chū-iû ì-hiòng ê būn-tê sī teh thó-lūn jîn-lūi kám ū hoat-tō· khòng-chè in ka-tī ê kiâⁿ-pàng kap soán-te̍k.
Sèng-pia̍t, chiàu seng-bu̍t-ha̍k ì-gī, sī kun-kù seⁿ-thòaⁿ kong-lêng kiam siong-koan ê ûi-thoân téng seng-lí chha-pia̍t, tùi seng-bu̍t kò-thé só͘ chò ê khu-hun.
Chit-liōng (mass) sī 1 hāng mi̍h-kiāⁿ pau-hâm ê bu̍t-chit (matter) kap lêng-liōng.

Chheⁿ-sek (chhiⁿ-) ia̍h chheⁿ, sī sek-chúi chi̍t khoán, í le̍k-sek ûi-chú, ia̍h chiō sī pho-tn̂g iok-liōng 520-570 nm ê khoàⁿ-ū-kng, sī chū-jiân-kài phó͘-phiàn--ê sek-tī, te̍k-pia̍t sī ū ia̍p-le̍k-sò͘ (chlorophyll) ê si̍t-bu̍t chiō hoán chheⁿ-sek.
Sam-chhù-goân (三次元. 3D) sī tī ji̍t-siông seng-oa̍h tiong, ē-ēng iōng tn̂g, khoah kap koân 3 ê chhù-goân lâi kò͘-sêng ê khong-kan.
Ha̍p-lí-sèng nā tī tiat-ha̍k sī kóng lí-sèng ê tián-hiān, ia̍h tio̍h sī ū lí-iû ê khó-liông.
Bû-hān (infinity) sī piáu-sī bô chīn-pōng ê khài-liām, sîn-ha̍k, tiat-ha̍k, sò͘-ha̍k ham seng-oa̍h--nih lóng ū leh ēnĝ, m̄-koh ta̍k ê léng-he̍k ê tēng-gī bô chiâu siâng.
Pe̍h-sek ia̍h pe̍h tī kng-ha̍k siōng sī khoàⁿ-ū-kng choân-pō͘ ê pho-tn̂g lām chò-hoé, tī lâng ê jīn-ti siōng kā tòng-chò chi̍t khoán sek, he̍k-chiá sī bô sek-chúi tī--leh.
Ū chi̍t-ê Tiong-kok su-sióng-ka hō-chòe "Ô͘ Sek".
Âng-sek (red) ia̍h âng sī khoàⁿ-ū-kng pîn-lu̍t siōng kē ê sek-chúi, pho-tn̂g iok-liōng 630-760 nm.

Hâm-sò͘, ji̍t-pún hàn-jī taⁿ siá-chò koan-sò͘, sī chi̍t thò su-ji̍p kap khó-lêng ê su-chhut ê koan-hē, koh su-ji̍p ū it-tēng ê tùi-ēng su-chhut.
Hâm-sò͘, ji̍t-pún hàn-jī taⁿ siá-chò koan-sò͘, sī chi̍t thò su-ji̍p kap khó-lêng ê su-chhut ê koan-hē, koh su-ji̍p ū it-tēng ê tùi-ēng su-chhut.
Hái-poa̍t (海拔. altitude) sī chi̍t ê só͘-chāi chham hái-pêng-bīn ê koân-tō͘ chha-kī.
Saⁿ-kak hâm-sò͘ (三角函數) sī tī sò͘-ha̍k tiong chia̍p-chia̍p sú-iōng ê chi̍t chióng koan-î kak-tō͘ ê hâm-sò͘.
Hái-pêng-bīn sī tōa-hái ê pêng-kin koân-tō͘.
Tī sò͘-ha̍k tiong, ge̍k-hâm-sò͘ sī tùi chi̍t ê te̍k-tēng ê hâm-sò͘ chìn-hêng hoán-hiòng ūn-sǹg ê hâm-sò͘, iā thang hō-chò hoán-hâm-sò͘.
Tī sò͘-ha̍k siōng, chi̍t tiâu ti̍t-soàⁿ ê siâ-lu̍t (斜率. pe̍h: chhiâ-lu̍t) tī ta̍k-ê só͘-chāi lóng sio-kāng, i sī ti̍t-soàⁿ ê thán-khi thêng-tō͘ ê liông-tō͘.
Ōe-sò͘ sī sò͘-ūi ōe-siōng tang-tiong iáⁿ-siōng ê siāng sió tan-ūi, he̍k-chiá sī sit-thé to͘-ōe téng-bīn ê chi̍t-ê ìn-soat-tiám.
Tōng-bu̍t sin-kun téng ê lân sī seⁿ tī phoê-hu goā-têng ê sè-tè ngē phìⁿ, ū pó-hō͘ ia̍h hián sek ê chok-iōng.

Tī tōng-bu̍t kái-phoà-ha̍k (zootomy) kap phoê-hu i-ha̍k (dermatology), phoê-hu sī kí goā-phoê hē-thóng ê 1 ê khì-koan, ū kúi-ná chân ê siōng-phôe sè-pau (epithelium) seng-bu̍t cho͘-chit (biological tissues), ē-tàng pó-hō͘ sin-khu lāi-té ê kin-bah (muscle) kap khì-koan.

Afro tio̍h-sī Afro thâu ê kán-chheng, iā-hō-chò po̍k-chà-thâu, o͘-lâng-thâu, kap hui-chiu-thâu, sī-tī 1970 nî-tāi siōng-kài liû-hêng ê hoat-hêng, siōng te̍k-pia̍t ê só·-chāi tio̍h-sī he tōa koh khiû koh phòng ê thâu-mo·.
Khí-tái (齒滓. dental calculus, tartar) koh kiò-chò khí-chio̍h (齒石), sī chhùi-khí sé bô chheng-khì, khí-siôⁿ, chhùi-nōa, kap khòng-bu̍t-chit sio-kap chò-tīn kài-hòa ê kiat-kó.
Ū chi̍t kóa sèng-chit beh-kâng ê ha̍p-sêng châi-liāu mā kiò "chhó", pí-lūn PS, PE tt.
Chiáu-mn̂g, he̍k-chiá kóng ú-mô͘, sī seⁿ tī tōng-bu̍t gōa-phôe téng ê chi̍t khoán mi̍h, hoat tī chiáu-lūi kap í-keng bia̍t-choa̍t ê khióng-liông sin-ku téng.
Sió-he̍k-chheⁿ-toà (asteroid belt) chú-iàu sī kí Thài-iông-hē lāi-té, Hoé-chheⁿ kap Bo̍k-chheⁿ tiong-ng ê só͘-chāi, hia ū chin chē sió-he̍k-chheⁿ (asteroid) mā leh se̍h Ji̍t-thaû.
Chhiū-phôe sī bo̍k-chit si̍t-bu̍t siōng gōa-bīn ê pō͘-hūn.
Kûn (Eng-gí: group) chāi sò͘-ha̍k tiong sī chi̍t khoán tài-sò͘ kiat-kò͘ (algebraic structure), iā chiū sī chi̍t-ê kap sǹg-hoat (operation) kiat-ha̍p ê chi̍p-ha̍p (set).
Seng-chō, tī thian-bûn-ha̍k lāi-bīn, sī chí thiⁿ-téng sio-oá ê chi̍t-tui chheⁿ ê thóng-cheng.
Gū-chiá-chō, mā thang kiò chò Gū-hu-chō, sī hiān-tāi 88 seng-chō chi it.
Centaurus Chō, mā thang kiò chò poàn-jîn-má-chō, sī hiān-tāi 88 seng-chō chi it.
Káu-á-chō, mā thang kiò chò sió-khián-chō, sī hiān-tāi 88 seng-chō chi it.
Thian-gô-chō, mā thang kiò chò Pe̍h-chiáu-chō, sī hiān-tāi 88 seng-chō chi it.
Thâu-mn̂g-chō, mā thang kiò chò hiō-hoat-chō, sī hiān-tāi 88 seng-chō chi it.
Pegasus Chō, mā thang kiò chò thian-má-chō ia̍h-sī poe-má-chō, sī hiān-tāi 88 seng-chō chi it.
Bo̍k-hu-chō sī hiān-tāi 88 seng-chō chi it.
Chhâi-lông-chō, mā thang kiò chò lông-chō, sī hiān-tāi 88 seng-chō chi it.
Chúi-choâ-chō sī hiān-tāi 88 seng-chō chi it.
Hîm-á-chō, mā thang kiò chò Sió-hîm-chō, sī hiān-tāi 88 seng-chō chi it.
Tōa-káu-chō, mā thang kiò chò Tōa-khián-chō, sī hiān-tāi 88 seng-chō chi it.
Cepheus Chō, mā thang kiò chò sian-ông-chō, sī hiān-tāi 88 seng-chō chi it.
Poe-á-chō, mā thang kiò chò Crater-chō ia̍h-sī Kū-chiok-chō, sī hiān-tāi 88 seng-chō chi it.
Soaⁿ-iûⁿ-chō (山羊座) sī N̂g-tō cha̍p-jī seng-chō chi-chi̍t, tī Siā-chhiú-chō kap Chúi-pân-chō chi-kan.
Pok-tó͘ sī Chí-bî-hoân ê chi̍t ê seng-koan, ū 7 lia̍p chheⁿ.
Tōa-chhùi-chiáu-chō, mā thang kiò chò Tucana Chō ia̍h-sī Tō͘-koan-chō, sī hiān-tāi 88 seng-chō chi it.
Siang-hî-chō (雙魚座) sī N̂g-tō cha̍p-jī seng-chō chi-chi̍t, tī Chúi-pân-chō kap Bó͘-iûⁿ-chō chi-kan.
Giat-á-chō (蠍仔座) sī N̂g-tō cha̍p-jī seng-chō chi-chi̍t, tī Thian-pêng-chō kap Siā-chhiú-chō chi-kan.
It-lú-chō (乙女座) sī N̂g-tō cha̍p-jī seng-chō chi-chi̍t, tī Sai-á-chō kap Thian-pêng-chō chi-kan.
Hái-choâ-chō, mā thang kiò chò tn̂g-choâ-chō, sī hiān-tāi 88 seng-chō chi it.
Lâm-si̍p-jī-chō sī hiān-tāi 88 seng-chō chi it.
Hông-koan-chō, mā thang kiò chò Koan-chō ia̍h-sī Pak-bián-chō, sī hiān-tāi 88 seng-chō chi it.
Thian-khîm-chō, mā thang kiò chò Khîm-chō, in-ūi i ê 5 lia̍p khah kng ê chheⁿ pâi-lia̍t--khí-lâi nā-chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t-ê sū-khîm.
Thian-pêng-chō (天平座) sī N̂g-tō cha̍p-jī seng-chō chi-chi̍t, tī It-lú-chō kap Giat-á-chō chi-kan.
O͘-ah-chō, mā thang kiò chò Corvus-chō, sī hiān-tāi 88 seng-chō chi it.
Chîm-á-chō sī N̂g-tō cha̍p-jī seng-chō chi-chi̍t, tī Siang-seⁿ-chō kap Sai-á-chō chi-kan.
Bó͘-iûⁿ-chō (牡羊座) sī N̂g-tō cha̍p-jī seng-chō chi-chi̍t, tī Siang-hî-chō kap Kim-gû-chō chi-kan.
Cassiopeia Chō, mā thang kiò chò sian-hiō-chō, sī hiān-tāi 88 seng-chō chi it.
Sai-á-chō (獅仔座) sī N̂g-tō cha̍p-jī seng-chō chi-chi̍t, tī Hōe-á-chō kap It-lú-chō chi-kan.
Siang-seⁿ-chō (雙生座) sī N̂g-tō cha̍p-jī seng-chō chi-chi̍t, tī Kim-gû-chō kap Hōe-á-chō chi-kan.
Chúi-pân-chō (水瓶座) sī N̂g-tō cha̍p-jī seng-chō chi-chi̍t, tī Soaⁿ-iûⁿ-chō kap Siang-hî-chō chi-kan.
Sîn-ōe-ha̍k sī chi̍t chióng bîn-sio̍k-ha̍k, sī koan-î jîn-lūi kap sè-kài piàn-khian ê sîn-sèng kò͘-sū.
Hi-lia̍p sîn-oē sī Kó͘-tāi Hi-lia̍p ê sîn-oē kap thoân-soat thé-hē.
Ùi bu̍t-lí ê koan-tiám lâi kóng, ú-tiū sī só͘-ū tī-teh ê mi̍h ha̍p--khí-lâi ê choân-pō͘, mā sī só͘-ū ê sū-kiāⁿ hoat-seng ê khong-kan.
Jîn-bîn, chiàu tiûⁿ-ha̍p ū-sî kóng lâng ia̍h bîn-cho̍k, sī tāi-piáu lâng ê kûn-thé, chhin-chhiūⁿ bîn-cho̍k kah cho̍k-kûn.
Hôa-cho̍k, mā kiò-chó kùi-cho̍k.

Bû-sán-kai-kip : kin-kù Marx-chú-gī ê lūn-soat, tī Chu-pún-chú-gī siā-hōe lāi-té, ū-ê lâng bô ka-kī ê seng-sán chu-gôan, óa-khò chhut-bōe lô-tōng-le̍k teh seng-chûn, cho-siū tio̍h Chu-sán-kai-kip ê pak-siah.

Phín-chéng (-chióng), ū-sî kóng chéng, sī ka-thiok lāi-té gōa-piáu, hêng-ûi kap kî-tha sèng-chit kâng-khoán, jî-chhiá ê-tàng kap m̄ sio̍k pún phín-chéng ê kî-tha kâng bu̍t-chéng tōng-bu̍t ū it-tēng ê khu-pia̍t ê chi̍t kûn tōng-bu̍t.
Hoeh-hêng (血型) sī tùi hoeh-e̍k hun-luī ê hong-sek, it-poaⁿ sī âng-hoeh-kiû ê hun-hêng.
Chhī-tiûⁿ sī chò seng-lí bé-bē ê só͘-chāi.
Bîn-cho̍k sī chi̍t khoán lâng ê chi̍p-thé, siông-sè ì-sù chē khoán jî-chhiáⁿ toè sî-kan leh kái-piàn.
Hoat-kok-lâng sī chi̍t-ê bîn-cho̍k, hâm Hoat-kok pún-sin ê jîn-bîn, kap kî-tha chiàu hoat-lu̍t, le̍k-sú he̍k-chiá sī bûn-hòa koan-hē ū Hoat-kok-lâng sin-hūn ê kûn-thé.
Chu-sán-kai-kip, i sī Chu-pún-chú-gī siā-hōe ê thóng-tī kai-kip.
Chū-lo̍h ia̍h chi̍p-lo̍h, sī tē-lí-ha̍k, thóng-kè, ia̍h sī khó-kó͘ ê gián-kiù kiam khang-khòe tang-tiong só͘ kóng jîn-kûn chò-hóe seng-oa̍h ê siā-lí.
Kok-chè Su-hoat Hoat-īⁿ ia̍h Kok-chè Hoat-têng, 1945 nî sêng-li̍p tī Kē-tē-kok ê Den Haag, sī Liân-ha̍p-kok chú-iàu ê su-hoat kang-khū.
Su-hoān ha̍k-hāu sī pôe-io̍k su-chu ê ha̍k-hāu, it-poaⁿ lóng sī tāi-ha̍k chân-kip ê ko-téng kàu-io̍k.
Kong-bū-oân (公務員) sī chi̍t-chióng chit-gia̍p, chú-iàu tī chèng-hú ki-kò͘ kang-chok, chip-hêng hoat-tēng ê chit-bū koân-hān.
Bí-kok Kok-hōe (Eng-bûn: United States Congress) sī Bí-kok Hiàn-hoat kui-tēng ê li̍p-hoat ki-koan, uī-chāi Kok-hōe Tāi-hā.
Bîn-chiòng Īⁿ sī Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok Kok-hoē ê 1 pō͘-hūn.
To̍k-chiàm sī kóng chi̍t-ê lâng ia̍h chi̍t keng khì-gia̍p tan-to̍k khòng-chè liáu chi̍t hāng siong-phín ia̍h ho̍k-bū ê siau-lō͘
Cheng-sîn-pēⁿ ia̍h jīn-ti chiòng-gāi (cognitive dysfunction) ê ì-sù chin khoah, pau-hâm chêng-kám ia̍h chêng-sū bô ún-tēng, hêng-ûi bô hia̍p-tiau, jīn-ti ū chiòng-gāi ia̍h sún-siong, ...
Chū-pì-chèng (自閉症. autism) sī chi̍t chióng in-ūi náu-pō͘ ê hoat-io̍k chiòng-gāi só͘ chō-sêng ê chèng-thâu.
Si̍t-giām-sek sī chi̍t-chióng siōng kán-tan-ê hòa-ha̍k-sek ê piáu-sī hong-sek.
Ko-hoeh-ap (Eng-gí: hypertension) sī chí hoeh-ap tn̂g-kî lóng siuⁿ koè-thâu koân, khah chèng-sek ê miâ-chheng hō chò tōng-me̍h ko-hoeh-ap.
Mûi-to̍k (Eng-gí: syphilis) sī 1 khoán sèng-thoân-jiám-pēⁿ, khí-tì sī hō͘ sio̍k tī Spirochaetes mn̂g, hō chò Treponema pallidum ê sè-khún kám-jiám--tio̍h.
Sèng-thoân-jiám-pēⁿ (Eng-gí: sexually transmissible disease) sī chí in-ūi sèng-chiap-chhiok lâi thoân-jiám ê pēⁿ ê chóng-chheng.
Tēng-gī sī tùi chi̍t hāng piáu-tat ê ké-soeh kiam sán-seng che ké-soeh ê khang-khòe.

column2: ['chù-ì-le̍k put-chiok koè-tōng-chèng', 'adhd', 'chù-ì-le̍k put-chiok/koè-tōng-sèng sit-tiâu', 'chù-ì-le̍k put-chiok kè-tōng-chèng']
column3: Chù-ì-le̍k put-chiok koè-tōng-chèng (注意力不足過動症, Eng-gí: attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder, ADHD) sī chi̍t khoán cheng-sîn-pēⁿ, it-poaⁿ sī chí gín-á, sī kóng ū chù-ì-le̍k (attention), chhiong-tōng-sèng (衝動性, impulsivity) kap koè-tōng-sèng (過動性, hyperactivity) hong-bīn ê būn-tê.

Chhùi-khí tī go̍k-kut lāi-té in-ūi ūi-tì bô chèng-siông, bô-hoat-tō· chhut-khí he̍k chhut-khí mā-koh bô chèng-siông ê kā-ha̍p, án-ne kiò-chò bâi-ho̍k-khí he̍k chó·-seng-khí (埋伏齒, 阻生牙, impacted tooth, embedded tooth).
Phá-kìn-sng-pēⁿ sī chi̍t-chióng bān-sèng náu-kin thè-hoà ê chi̍t-pēⁿ, tiāⁿ-tiāⁿ ē hóng-gāi hoān-chiá ūn-tōng kap kóng-oē ê lêng-le̍k.
Khí-chiu-pēⁿ he̍k gê-chiu-pēⁿ (Eng-gí: periodontal disease) kán-tan kóng tō-sī chhùi-khí sì-chiu ê chi̍t-pēⁿ.
Thôan-jiám-pēⁿ sī 1-chióng chin phó·-piàn, sio̍k to-hoat-sèng ê chi̍t-pīⁿ.
Iûⁿ-hîn (Eng-gí: epilepsy), he̍k-chiá tian-pēⁿ, iông-kán, sī chi̍t khoán bān-sèng ê sîn-keng sit-tiâu, sī sîn-keng sè-pau bô chèng-siông ê oa̍h-tāng ín-khí.
Kiān-khong (健康. Eng-bûn: health) he̍k-chiá khong-kiān (康健) kóng-ê sī seng-bu̍t kò-thé ê kong-lêng-sèng hām tāi-siā hāu-lu̍t ê chúi-pêng.
Thian-hoa sī 1 chióng hō chò Variola vera ê pēⁿ-to̍k ín-khí ê thoân-jiám-pēⁿ, chin to̍k.
Hong-têng-sek sī hâm piàn-sò͘ chāi-lāi ê sò͘-ha̍k téng-sek.
Kám-mō͘, mā thang kiò chò hong-siâ, siong-hong, sī téng ho͘-khip hē-thóng khì hō͘ pēⁿ-to̍k oè--tio̍h ê 1 chióng thoân-jiám-pēⁿ.
Khùn he̍k-chiá bîn sī chi̍t pō͘-hūn tōng-bu̍t, iû-kî chek-chui tōng-bu̍t khah bô kám-kak mā khah bô oa̍h-tāng ê chōng-thài.
Tuì chhī-leng tōng-bu̍t lâi kóng, thu̍t-the sī chí sè-kiáⁿ bē-chêng chhut-sì, koāⁿ-kūi tō thê-chá chhé-soah.
Ek-sng, mā ū kóng ek-chhiah-sng, sio-sim iah hóe-sio-sim, sī kóng chi̍t khoán lâng kám-kak heng-kám he̍k-chiá nâ-âu ná hō͘ hóe sio--tio̍h ê chèng-thâu.

Teng-ki-chèng sī chi̍t chióng thê-kiong bîn-iōng hâng-khong sêng-kheh teng-ki chèng-bêng ê phiò-chèng, thong-siông sī tī sêng-kheh pān-lí liáu teng-ki pò-tò chhiú-sio̍k liáu-āu iû hâng-khong kong-si thê-kiong.
Boah-phang-keng hore sī siōng toā ê khí-keng, it-poaⁿ jīn-ûi sī chêng-kah-taⁿ Tē-kiû téng-koân siōng toā-chiah ê ū chhùi-khí ê tōng-bu̍t.
Sū-si̍t (事實) ē-sái tāi-piáu kòe-khì kap hiān-chāi pī giām-chèng jî-chhiáⁿ tiong-li̍p ê sìn-sit, tī kho-ha̍k sī ē-tàng chèng-bêng ê kài-liām.
HTTP sī Chhiau-bûn-pún Choán-sàng Hia̍p-tēng (Hypertext Transfer Protocol) ê Eng-gí kán-lio̍k.
Kóng-kò (廣告) tī siong-gia̍p hong-bīn sī chi̍t-chióng chhī-tiûⁿ-ha̍k ê hêng-siau hêng-ûi.
Si̍p-jī-gú (mā ū lâng kā hō-chò thiam-jī chhai) sī 1 khoán ioh oē-gú ê sû-lūi bē-chhai.
Hòa-ha̍k-sek sī the̍h-lâi piáu-sī hòa-ha̍p-bu̍t ê hong-sek.

Hong-sip-jia̍t (rheumatic fever) sī koên-téng ho͘-khip-tō khì hō͘ group A β hemolytic streptococcus oè--tio̍h só͘-lâi ín-khí ê chi̍t-chióng tî-hoat-sèng kap hui-hoà-lâng-sèng ê pēⁿ-piàn, pau-khoat sim-chōng, koan-chat, phoê-hā cho͘-chit, kap kî-thaⁿ chōng-khì chhiūⁿ náu, hì ê hoat-iām-sèng chi̍t-pēⁿ.
Koan-chōng tōng-me̍h sim-chōng-pēⁿ iā-sī koan-sim-chèng tio̍h-sī lán pō͘-pêng leh kóng ê sim-chōng-pēⁿ.
Bî-seng-bu̍t-ha̍k ê Gram ní-sek-hoat (Eng-gú: Gram staining, Hôa-gí: 革蘭氏染色法) sī 1 khoán ní sè-khún ê hong-hoat, ē-tàng khu-pia̍t 2 chióng chú-iàu ê sè-khún sè-pau-piah.
Iu-ut-chèng sī chi̍t khoán cheng-sîn-pēⁿ, sī kóng tn̂g-kî, choân-bīn-sèng ê sim-chêng, oa̍h-tāng-le̍k, hèng-chhù kē-lo̍h ê chêng-hêng.
Êng-ióng-put-liông sī chí chia̍h-si̍t (diet) ê liōng ia̍h chit bô sek-tong, chō-chiâⁿ kiān-khong chhut būn-tê.
Sū-si̍t (事實) ē-sái tāi-piáu kòe-khì kap hiān-chāi pī giām-chèng jî-chhiáⁿ tiong-li̍p ê sìn-sit, tī kho-ha̍k sī ē-tàng chèng-bêng ê kài-liām.
Pe̍h-chha̍t-ōe ia̍h-sī hau-siâu-ōe sī chi̍t toāⁿ chham sū-si̍t tian-tò-péng ê sìn-sit.

column2: ['kap-á-siû', '四跤仔泅', '水雞仔泅', '水雞泅', '水鸡仔泅', '水鸡泅', '田蛤仔泅', '蛤仔泅']
column3: Kap-á-siû sī bô͘-hóng kap-á siû-chúi ê chi̍t chióng siû-chúi chu-sè.
Tiâu-iok sī kok-ka iā-sī kok-chè cho͘-chit chi-kan chiàu kok-chè-hoat tông-ì, siá-hó lâi chhiam ê chèng-sek iok-sok.
É-lah sī bô chèng-khak ia̍h bô chún-khak ê hêng-tōng.
Sîn-keng-thiàⁿ (neuralgia) sī iân 1 tiâu ia̍h sò͘ tiâu siū-sún ia̍h pīⁿ-piàn sîn-keng lâi hun-pò͘ ê kek-lia̍t, tu̍t-hoat ê bān-sèng thàng-thiàⁿ.
Liû-hêng-sèng kám-mō͘, kám-chheng liû-kám, sī 1 khoán kùi-cheh-sèng ê thoân-jiám-pēⁿ, pēⁿ-in sī orthomyxoviridae-kho ê 1-ê RNA pēⁿ-to̍k.

Làu-thò͘-soa (Eng-gí: cholera) sī 1 chióng hō chò Vibrio cholerae ê sè-khún chō-chiâⁿ ê chúi-ūn-pēⁿ (water-borne disease), nā lim tio̍h bô chheng-khì ê chúi (contaminated water), iah sī chia̍h tio̍h chú bô hó-sè ê hî ia̍h lê-á (shellfish), hoān-sè tō òe ē tio̍h làu-thò͘-soa.

Chek-chhóe-hoe-pe̍h-chit-iām (脊髓灰白質炎, Eng-gí: poliomyelitis, kán-chheng polio), mā hō-chòe sió-jî bâ-pì (infantile paralysis), sī pēⁿ-to̍k ín-khí ê chi̍t-khoán thôan-jiám-pēⁿ, ē thàu-kòe hùn-kháu keng-lō͘ (fecal-oral route), tùi lâng thôan-jiám hō͘ lâng.
Siáu-káu-pēⁿ ia̍h kông-khián-pēⁿ (狂犬病), 1-chióng thoân-jiám-pēⁿ, put-sî tī-leh lâng kah tōng-bu̍t (te̍k-pia̍t sī cheng-seⁿ-á) chi-kan sio kòe sio òe.
Kyril jī sī chi̍t-cho͘ bûn-jī hē-thóng.
Ín-tit (Hàn-jī:引得) sī eng-gí tiong ê index ê ì-sù, mā kiò Sek-ín (索引).
Bî-hun hong-têng-sek (微分方程式) sī chi̍t-chióng pau-hâm hâm-sò͘ pún-sin kah bî-hun ê sò͘-ha̍k hong-têng-sek.
Pīⁿ (Pēⁿ) á chi̍t-pēⁿ (chi̍t-pīⁿ) sī tōng-bu̍t, lâng ê sin-thé ia̍h-sī cheng-sîn/sîn-tè chhut-hiān bô chèng-siông.
Dow Jones Kang-gia̍p Pêng-kin (Eng-gí: Dow Jones Industrial Average) sī Bí-kok Dow Jones Kong-si tùi kó͘-phiò chhī-tiûⁿ kéng chhut chi̍t koá chiūⁿ-chhī kong-sī ê kó͘-kè thóng-kè sán-seng ê chí-sò͘.
Lī-chi̍t (Eng-gí: dysentery) sī 1 khoán làu-sái (diarrhea) làu kah chin lī-hāi ê pēⁿ, tāi-piān (feces) lāi-té tiāⁿ ē ū hoeh, chit chióng chêng-hêng iū-koh hō chò hoeh-lī.
Thian-káu-jia̍t (Eng-gú: dengue fever. 登革热), mā ū-lâng kóng pan-soa, sī 1-chióng kòe-lū-sèng pēⁿ-to̍k ín-khí ê kip-sèng thôan-jiám-pēⁿ.
Ma-lá-lí-á sī 1 chióng goân-seng seng-bu̍t khí-tì ê thoân-jiám-pēⁿ, tī jia̍t-tài kap a-jia̍t-tài chin phó͘-phiàn.
Phang-o-chu he̍k kiò-chò phang-siū-eng (Hàn-jī: 蜂窩疽, 蜂岫癰. Hôa-gí: 蜂窩性組織炎. Eng-gí: cellulitis) sī phôe-hā cho·-chit ê kám-jiám.
Phīⁿ-iām sī 1 ê i-ha̍k bêng-sû biâu-siá phīⁿ ngāi-gio̍h kiam phīⁿ liâm-mo̍h hoat-iām ê chōng-hóng, ē-sái sī kip-sèng iah bān-sèng.
Pian-bé sī jī ê chi̍p-ha̍p kap lēng-gōa 1-ê chi̍p-ha̍p ê tùi-èng.
Chu-liāu-khò͘ sī tsi̍t-ê tiān-tsú-huà tóng-àn-khòo.
Gâm (Hàn-jī: 岩 ia̍h 巖, Eng-gí: cancer) sī sè-pau hun-lia̍t (cell division) bô chèng-siông lâi chō-chiâⁿ ê chin chē khoán pēⁿ.

Siā-kau put-an chiòng-gāi (社交不安障礙. Eng-bûn: Social Anxiety Disorder, SAD) sī chi̍t chióng tùi jīm-hô siā-kau kap kong-khai tiûⁿ-bīn lóng ē kám-siū tio̍h kiông-lia̍t put-an kap hoân-ló ê cheng-sîn-pēⁿ.
Chhim-khoân hêng-ûi sī mó͘-mí-lâng ûi-hoat chhim-hoān kî-thaⁿ lâng ê khoân-lī he̍k-chiá lī-ek ê hêng-ûi.
Giàn-phiah, he̍k-chiá giàn, kî-tha ê kóng-hoat ū tiòng-to̍k, tiâu--leh téng khoán, sī chi̍t khoán ūi kiû-chhú kiam lī-ēng io̍h-bu̍t kap kî-tha bu̍t-chit lâi kòe ê seng-oa̍h hong-sek.

Hek-sú-pēng iā Hek-un-e̍k (Eng-gí: Black Death) sī chí le̍k-sú-siōng tī Au-chiu hoat-seng ê thoân-liám-pēⁿ toā-liû-hêng, it-poaⁿ jīn-ûi sī chi̍t khoán chhí-e̍k chō-sêng, sî-kan tāi-io̍k sī 1347 nî kàu 1353 nî.

column2: ['bâ-hong', 'hansen pēⁿ', 'hansen ê pēⁿ', 'hansen ê pīⁿ', 'hàn-seng-pēⁿ', 'hàn-seng-pīⁿ', 'hàn-seng pēⁿ', 'hàn-seng pīⁿ', 'hàn-seng ê pēⁿ', 'thái-ko-pēⁿ', 'thái-ko-pīⁿ']
column3: Bâ-hong, mā sī Thái-ko-pīⁿ.
Ko-san-chèng chèng-chōng pau-koah chhiah-sim, áu-thò·, sim-thiàu piàn-kín, ì-sit kái-piàn, kóng-ōe tî-hoán, kap kiâⁿ-lō· kha-pō· bōe-ún téng-téng.
Pha tiān-ku.
Làu-sái (i-ha̍k kóng pak-sià) sī 1 khoán siau-hoà hē-thóng ê mô͘-pēⁿ.
Sek-kak ī-siông (色覺異常) ia̍h sī kiò choè sek-bông, sī chi̍t ê bô-hoat-tō͘ chèng-khak piān-pia̍t sek-chúi ê pīⁿ.
Chū-koat (自決) sī kun-kù Liân-ha̍p-kok Hiàn-chiong kap kok-chè-hoat kui-tēng ê chi̍t hāng chèng-tī khôan-le̍k, chú-tiuⁿ jîn-bîn ē-ēng chū-iû koat-tēng in ka-kī ê chèng-tī tē-ūi.
Chhàu-hīⁿ ia̍h sit-chhong, mā hō chhàu-hīⁿ-lâng
Kong-siat, iah-sī kóng kong-lí, sī 1 ê hē-thóng lāi-té bô chèng-bêng tō ká-siat sī chin--ê ê 1 kù oē, iah-sī bēng-tê (proposition).
Kong-siat, iah-sī kóng kong-lí, sī 1 ê hē-thóng lāi-té bô chèng-bêng tō ká-siat sī chin--ê ê 1 kù oē, iah-sī bēng-tê (proposition).
Hì-lô-pēⁿ (肺癆病, Hôa-gí: 肺結核. Eng-gí: Tuberculosis).
Ūi-iām sī ūi ê liâm-mo̍·h hoat-giām ê pēⁿ-lí piàn-hòa, it-poaⁿ pun kip-sèng ūi-iām kap bān-sèng ūi-iām 2 chióng.

Chèng-tī soan-thoân sī chi̍t chióng soan-thoân ê hong-sek, i-ê bo̍k-tek sī beh éng-hióng siā-hōe tāi-chiòng tùi bó͘ chi̍t ê chèng-hú ê li̍p-tiûⁿ kap thāi-tō͘, hō͘ te̍k-tēng jîn-sū kap thoân-thé ē-tàng ùi chia tit-tio̍h lī-ek.
Pì-kiat sī 1 khoán siau-hoà hē-thóng ê mô͘-pēⁿ.
Chheⁿ-mê ia̍h chhiⁿ-mî sī chí seng-lí iah sim-lí chhut būn-tê tì-sú sit-khì sī-kak, khoàⁿ bô mi̍h-kiāⁿ ê chōng-hóng.
Chhiúⁿ-kiap sī khò po̍k-le̍k he̍k-chiá khióng-hat lâi hiòng siū-hāi-chiá thó mi̍h-kiāⁿ ê hoān-choē hêng-ûi.

Hiàn-hoat, koh hō-chò hiàn-chiong, kin-pún-hoat he̍k-chiá hiàn-chè bûn-kiāⁿ, sī chi̍t ê chú-khoân kok-ka, chèng-tī si̍t-thé, chū-tī tē-khu, liân-pang-chè kok-ka ê liân-pang-chiu, ia̍h-sī kok-chè cho͘-chit ê siāng ki-pún hoat-lu̍t.
La Vall d'Uixó sī tī Se-pan-gâ Valencia siā-lí Castellón séng ê chi̍t ê municipio.
Bâ-chùi (anesthesia he̍k anaesthesia) thoân-thóng-siōng sī kí-kóng thiàⁿ-kak he̍k kî-thaⁿ kám-kak ê chó·-toān, chó·-chí i ê thoân-tó.
Sèng-kau-e̍k sī ài só͘-hùi ê sèng oa̍h-tāng, sī sèng kang-chok ê chi̍t khoán.
Hì-gâm (Eng-gí: lung cancer) sī tī hì--nih ū seⁿ ok-sèng (malignant) liû (tumour) ê 1 chióng gâm-chèng (cancer).
Chèng-tī-tek ê chū-iû sī kóng kò-jîn ê chū-chú-koân bô siū-tio̍h pa̍t-ê kò-jîn iah cho͘-chit ēng háⁿ-heh he̍k-chiá-sī po̍k-le̍k-tek ê chhiú-lō͘ lâi kan-sia̍p.
Thâu-thiàⁿ (頭疼. Eng-bûn: headache) sī chi̍t chióng hoat-seng tī jîn-thé ê thâu ia̍h-sī keng-kah í-siōng pō͘-ūi ê kio̍k-pō͘ thàng-thiàⁿ.
Chhàu-hīⁿ ia̍h sit-chhong, mā hō chhàu-hīⁿ-lâng
Chhái-phiò, mā hō-chò chhái-koàn ia̍h-sī thian-châi-phiò, sī poa̍h-kiáu ê chi̍t-chióng iû-hì.
Thiⁿ-khì ī-pò sī sú-iōng hiān-tāi kho-ha̍k ki-su̍t tùi bī-lâi bó͘ chi̍t tiám Tē-kiû tāi-khì-chân ê chōng-thài lâi chìn-hêng ī-chhek.
Chiú-cheng tiòng-to̍k sī chí chiú-cheng ím-liāu lim siūⁿ koè-thâu chē, tì-kàu cheng-sîn he̍k jio̍k-thé tī kò-jîn, ka-têng, siā-hoē, ia̍h khang-khoè chhut būn-tê.
Ūi-chia̍h-tō ge̍k-lâu chèng sī chi̍t khoán pēⁿ-chèng, kî-tiong ūi ê lōe-iông-bu̍t tò ek hiòng chia̍h-tō, ē siong-hāi chia̍h-tō, jî-chhiá ín-khí ek-sng kap kî-thai chèng-thâu.
He-ku sī 1-chóng pīⁿ
Jîn-kang liû-sán iah-sī phah-thoat-sin, táⁿ-thai, the̍h gín-á, tūi-thai, tō-thai, sī thiau-kang iōng jîn-ûi--ê chok-hoat lâi làu-tiāu gín-á-the, chhé-soah ū-sin--ê chōng-thāi.
Jiân-sio (燃燒. Eng-gí: combustion) sī jiân-liāu kap sng-hòa-che chi kan ê hoat-jia̍t hòa-ha̍k hoán-èng, sî-siông mā phòe-ha̍p hoat-kng ê hiān-siōng.
Change sī ūi-tī Hoat-kok Bourgogne toā-khu Saône-et-Loire koān ê chi̍t ê commune.
Kà-sú-lâng sī sái chhia ê lâng.
