An-lo̍k-sí sī chi̍t chióng hō͘ tio̍h choa̍t-chèng ê hoān-chiá, tī i-seng kap hoān-chiá siang-hong lóng tông-ì ê chêng-hêng hā, ūi-tio̍h kiám-kheng thòng-khó͘ só͘ jîn-ûi chìn-hêng ê thê-chá sí-bông.
Poa̍h-kiáu sī chhut châi-bu̍t ia̍h kî-tha sū-bu̍t lâi pí ioh chi̍t hāng bô khah-tēng ê tāi-chì ê hoat-seng kiat-kó.
Jîn-kháu sī 1-ê khu-he̍k lāi-té lâng ê chóng-sò͘.
Kûn-thé, he̍k-chiá kóng kò-thé-kûn, lēng-gōa ia̍h ū chéng-kûn, cho̍k-kûn, chi̍p-thoân téng kong-hoat, sī chi̍t-ê só͘-chāi tī kâng sî-kan lāi ê tan-it bu̍t-chéng só͘-ū seng-bu̍t-thé cho͘ sêng--ê.
Chú-chia̍h sī chún-pī chia̍h-mi̍h ê kang-gē, pau-koat kā chheⁿ mi̍h chú se̍k, he̍k-chiá an-pâi chheⁿ-si̍t téng-téng.

A-la-pek Jī-bó (A-la-pek-gí: الأَبْجَدِيَّة العَرَبِيَّة‎ al-abjadīyah al-ʻarabīyah á-sī الحُرُوف العَرَبِيَّة al-ḥurūf al-ʻarabīyah) sī A-la-pek-gí ēng--ê tùi chiàⁿ kàu tò ê jī-bó, Sī ùi A-lân Jī-bó (亞蘭-) kái--ê chú-im im-sò͘ bûn-jī (子音音素-, abjad), m̄-koh mā ū kî-thaⁿ--ê hû-hō piau bó-im, kap Hi-pek-lâi Jī-bó sio-siâng.
Hi-la̍h Jī-bó (Ελληνικό αλφάβητο, Ellinikó Alfávito) sī chi̍t thò tùi chêng 9 sè-kí tio̍h ū sú-ēng ê Hi-lia̍p-gí bûn-jī.

Hek-sú-pēng iā Hek-un-e̍k (Eng-gí: Black Death) sī chí le̍k-sú-siōng tī Au-chiu hoat-seng ê thoân-liám-pēⁿ toā-liû-hêng, it-poaⁿ jīn-ûi sī chi̍t khoán chhí-e̍k chō-sêng, sî-kan tāi-io̍k sī 1347 nî kàu 1353 nî.
Tī-an (治安) sī pó-hō͘ kò-jîn, châi-sán, bu̍t-phín bōe siū-tio̍h chai-hāi ia̍h-sī sū-kò͘ téng gûi-hiám ê ui-hia̍p.
Hóe-chòng, ia̍h hóe-hòa, sī chi̍t chióng chhú-lí si-thé ê hong-sek. ēng hóe kā si-thé sio chò hóe-hu.
O͘-se (烏紗) sī kò-jîn lī-iōng chit-bū siōng ê piān-lī, lâi sok-chhú he̍k-chiá siu-siū gōa-lâng châi-bū ê hêng-ûi.

Sat-khún, hām siau-to̍k lūi-sū, tān-sī koh-khah tui-kiû chheng-tû kap siau-bia̍t mi̍h-kiāⁿ piáu-bīn, e̍k-thé, io̍h-bu̍t kap pôe-ióng kài-chit téng-bīn ê jīm-hô hêng-sek ê bî-seng-bu̍t kap thoân-pò͘-sèng ê pēⁿ-goân-thé, chhin-chhiūⁿ chin-khún, sè-khún, pēⁿ-to̍k kap gê-pau téng-téng.
Tē-hng hun-koân sī kok-ka ê koân-le̍k i-hoat iû tiong-iong chèng-hú kap tē-hng chèng-hú hun-pia̍t hêng-sú ê chè-tō͘.
Hiān-si̍t (現實. reality) sī kheh-koan chûn-chāi ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ he̍k-chiá ha̍p-tī kheh-koan chêng-hêng ê tiâu-kiāⁿ.
Hiān-si̍t (現實. reality) sī kheh-koan chûn-chāi ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ he̍k-chiá ha̍p-tī kheh-koan chêng-hêng ê tiâu-kiāⁿ.
Châi-hù sī ū-kè-ta̍t ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ, pau-hâm chū-jiân châi-hù, bu̍t-chit châi-hù kap cheng-sîn châi-hù téng-téng.
Sàn-chhiah (Hàn-jī: 散赤) sī chi̍t-ê chin kóng-hoat ê koan-liām, pēng-bô cho̍at-tùi ê tēng-gī.
Thong-khîn (thong-khûn. 通勤) sī lâi-hôe chhù kap kang-chok tē-tiám ê hêng-ûi kap kòe-thêng.
Khì-hāu (氣候. Eng-bûn: climate) sī chi̍t ê te̍k-tēng só͘-chāi tn̂g-sî-kan ê thiⁿ-khì kui-lu̍t kap choán-piàn.
Chhī-tiûⁿ sī chò seng-lí bé-bē ê só͘-chāi.
Kià-kim he̍k-chia kià-gîn, sī gîn-hâng, lông-hōe, sìn-iōng ha̍p-chok-siā téng kim-hiông ki-koan ê chîⁿ-gîn kià-thok gia̍p-bū.
Hiat-iân sī khū-iú kiōng-tông chó͘-sian ûi te̍k-teng ê chhin-sio̍k koan-hē.
Chèng-tī, ia̍h sī kóng chèng-sū, sī thoân-thé chò koat-tēng ê koè-têng, it-poaⁿ sī ēng lâi kóng chèng-hú ê ūn-chok.
Chhin-chiâⁿ sī ióng-iú hiat-iân ia̍h-sī hun-in koan-hē ê lâng, iā thang hō-chò chhin-lâng, chhin-sio̍k ia̍h-sī chhin-cho̍k.
Sìn-iōng-khah (信用卡) sī chi̍t chióng hui hiān-kim kau-e̍k hù-khoán ê hong-sek, sī kán-tan ê sìn-chioh ho̍k-bū.
Sián (Eng: penny), mā hō-chò Lincoln Sián (Lincoln Cent), sī Bí-kok ê chi̍t chióng gîn-kak-á.
Gîn-kak-á sī 1 chióng chèng-lâng kong-jīn ū kò͘-tēng kè-ta̍t ê chîⁿ.
Gîn-phiò, koh kiò-chò chóa-phiò, chóa-lī, chóa-pè, sī chi̍t-chióng hòe-pè.
Kùi kim-sio̍k (貴金屬. Eng-bûn: precious metal) it-poaⁿ the̍h-lâi tāi-piáu kim, gîn, kap pe̍h-kim 3 chióng kè-siàu kùi-som-som, gōa-hêng bí-lē, hòa-ha̍k sèng-chit ún-tēng ê kim-sio̍k.
Chu-pún tī keng-chè-ha̍k, châi-bū kap koè-kè ū kúi-ā-ê sio-liâm-tì-toà ê ì-sù.
I-liâu pó-hiám (醫療保險) sī chi̍t chióng chin chia̍p-khoàⁿ ê pó-hiám lūi-hêng. chú-iàu sī thè tâu-pó-jîn èng-hù bô-hoat-tō͘ ū-chhek ê i-liâu ho̍k-bū su-kiû kap châi-bū hong-hiám.
Ki-kim (基金) sī ēng tī te̍k-tēng bo̍k-te̍k pēng-chhiáⁿ to̍k-li̍p he̍k-soàn ê chu-kim.
Edward It-sè (Eng-bûn: Edward I. 1239 nî 6 go̍eh 17 hō - 1307 nî 7 go̍eh 7 hō) sī Eng-kek-lân ê chi̍t tāi kok-ông.
Cimabue (tāi-iok 1240 nî - 1302 nî) sī Italia Firenze ê oē-ka.
Geoffrey Chaucer (1343 nî – 1400 nî 10 goe̍h 25 ji̍t) sī Eng-gí bûn-ha̍k ê tiōng-iàu sian-hêng-chiá, pī kóng-hoat jīm-ûi sī Tiong-sè siōng-kài úi-tāi ê Eng-gí si-jîn.
Richard 3-sè (Richard III, 1452 nî 10 goe̍h 2 ji̍t – 1485 nî 8 goe̍h 22 ji̍t) sī Eng-kok York ka-cho̍k ê chi̍t ê kok-ông, i chāi-ūi ê sî-kan tùi 1483 nî kàu 1485 nî.
Niccolò di Bernardo dei Machiavelli (1496 nî 5 goe̍h 3–1527 nî 6 goe̍h 21) sī Italia ê chèng-tī-tiat-ha̍k-ka chok-ka, i hō͘ lâng tòng-chò sī hiān-tāi chèng-tī-ha̍k ê khai-ki-chó͘.
Hernán Cortés de Monroy y Pizarro (1485 nî – 1547 nî 12 goe̍h 2 ji̍t) sī hoat-kiàn sî-tāi ê Se-pan-gâ cheng-ho̍k-chiá (conquistador).

Henry 8-sè (Henry VIII, 1491 nî 6 goe̍h 28 ji̍t – 1547 nî 1 goe̍h 28 ji̍t) sī tùi 1509 nî 4 goe̍h 21 chek-ūi kàu kòe-sin ê England Kok-ông, i mā-sī Ireland Léng-chú (Lord of Ireland) kap āu-lâi ê Ireland Kok-ông.

Richelieu Chhu-ki-kheng (Hoat-gí: Cardinal de Richelieu, 1585 nî 9 goe̍h 9 ji̍t – 1642 nî 12 goe̍h 4 ji̍t), choân-miâ Armand Jean du Plessis de Richelieu, sī Hoat-kok ê chi̍t ê chèng-tī-ka kap Thian-chú-kàu-hōe ê chhu-ki-kheng.
Louis 13-sè sī Hoat-kok Bourbon ka-cho̍k ê chi̍t ê kok-ông, i chāi-ūi ê sî-kan tùi 1610 nî kàu 1643 nî.
Louis 14-sè sī Hoat-kok tùi 1643 nî kàu i kòe-sin kî-kan ê kok-ông, sio̍k Bourbon ka-cho̍k.
Johann Sebastian Bach (Kok-chè Im-phiau: [ˈjoːhan zəˈbastjan ˈbax]) (1685 nî 3 goe̍h 21 O.S. – 1750 nî 7 goe̍h 28 N.S.) sī Tek-kok ê 1 ê chok-khek-ka kiam hong-khîm-su.

Georg Friedrich Händel (Eng-gí-sek: George Frideric Handel, 1685 nî 2 goe̍h 23 ji̍t - 1759 nî 4 goe̍h 14 ji̍t) sī tùi Brandenburg-Preußen (hiān-sî sio̍k Tek-kok) ê Halle chhut-sì ê Baroque sî-kî chok-khek-ka.
Voltaire sī François-Marie Arouet ê pit-miâ, i sī hoat-kok Khé-bông cho-ka, le̍k-sú-ka, thiat-ha̍k-ka.
Friedrich 2-sè sī Preußen Ông-kok tùi 1740 nî kàu 1786 nî ê kok-ông.
George 3-sè sī Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok ê kok-ông, chāi-ûi kî-kan sī 1801 nî 1 goe̍h 1 ji̍t kàu 1820 nî 1 goe̍h 29 ji̍t.
Donatien Alphonse François de Sade (1740 nî 6 goe̍h 2 ji̍t - 1814 nî 12 goe̍h 2 ji̍t), he̍k-chiá kóng Sade Hâu-chiok (marquis de Sade ia̍h comte de Sade), sī Hoat-kok ê bûn-ha̍k-ka, tiat-ha̍k-ka.
Johann Wolfgang von Goethe (1749 nî 8 go̍eh 28 ji̍t－1832 nî 3 go̍eh 22 ji̍t) sī Tek-kok si-jîn, kho-ha̍k-ka kap chèng-tī jîn-bu̍t.
Noah Webster (1758 nî 10 goe̍h 16 ji̍t - 1848 nî 5 goe̍h 28 ji̍t) sī Bí-kok ê kàu-io̍k-ka, chhut-pán-ka, jī-tián-ka.
George 4-sè sī Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok ê kok-ông, chāi-ûi kî-kan sī 1820 nî 1 goe̍h 29 ji̍t kàu 1830 nî 6 goe̍h 26 ji̍t.
Ludwig van Beethoven (Kok-chè Im-phiau: [ˈbeː.to.vən]. 1770 nî 12 goe̍h 17 sé-lé – 1827 nî 3 goe̍h 26) sī Tek-kok ê chok-khek-ka kiam kǹg-khîm-ka.
Simón José Antonio de la Santísima Trinidad Bolívar Palacios Ponte y Blanco (1783 nî 7 goe̍h 24 ji̍t - 1830 nî 12 goe̍h 17 ji̍t) sī Venezuela ê tōa-chiong-kun.
Victor-Marie Hugo sī Hoat-kok lô-bān-chú-gī si-jîn, siáu-soat-ka, ke̍k-chok-ka, té-bûn chok-ka, iū-koh sī sī-kak gē-su̍t-ka, chèng-tī-ka, jîn-koân ūn-tōng-chiá.

column2: ['frédéric chopin', 'fryderyk chopin', 'fryderyk franciszek chopin', 'frédéric françois chopin']
column3: Frédéric François Chopin (Pho-lân-bûn: Fryderyk Franciszek Chopin. 1810 nî 3 goe̍h 1 ji̍t – 1849 nî 10 goe̍h 17 ji̍t) sī Pho-lân ê chok-khek-ka kiam kǹg-khîm-ka.
Wilhelm Richard Wagner (1813 nî 5 goe̍h 22 ji̍t - 1883 nî 2 goe̍h 13 ji̍t) sī Tek-kok ê chok-khek-ka ia̍h chí-hui-ka.
George Boole sī chi̍t ūi Eng-kok ê sò͘-ha̍k-ka.

Otto von Bismarck (1815 nî 4 goe̍h 1 ji̍t - 1898 nî 7 goe̍h 30 ji̍t), Tek-gí choân-miâ Otto Eduard Leopold von Bismarck, sī Lauenburg ê kong-chiok kiam Preußen Ông-kok kah Deutsches Tè-kok ê siú-siòng.
Louis Pasteur sī tī Hoat-kok Dole chhut-sì ê kho-ha̍k-ka, bî-seng-bu̍t-ha̍k ê khai-ki-chó͘.
Dante Gabriel Rossetti (1828 nî 5 goe̍h 12 ji̍t - 1882 nî 4 goe̍h 9 ji̍t) sī Eng-tē ê si-jîn kiam oē-ka.
Johannes Brahms (1833 nî 5 goe̍h 7 ji̍t - 1897 nî 4 goe̍h 3 ji̍t) sī Tek-kok ê chok-khek-ka, kǹg-khîm-ka kap chí-hui-ka, sī lōng-bān sî-kî chú-iàu ê im-ga̍k-ka chi it.
Andrew Carnegie sī Scot-tē chhut-sì ê Bí-kok seng-lí-lâng, si̍t-gia̍p-ka, mā sī chû-siàn-ka.
Émile Zola (1840 nî 4 goe̍h 2 ji̍t - 1902 nî 9 goe̍h 29 ji̍t) sī Hoat-kok ê chok-ka.
Edward 7-sè sī Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok ê kok-ông, chāi-ûi kî-kan sī 1901 nî 1 goe̍h 22 ji̍t kàu 1910 nî 5 goe̍h 6 ji̍t.
Alexander Graham Bell sī tī Scotland chhut-sì ê kho-ha̍k-ka, hoat-bêng-ka kiam khì-gia̍p-ka.
Arthur Ignatius Conan Doyle (1859 nî 5 goe̍h 22 – 1930 nî 7 goe̍h 7) sī Scot-tē ê chok-ka kiam i-seng.
George 5-sè sī Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok ê kok-ông, chāi-ûi kî-kan sī 1922 nî kàu 1936 nî.

Gân-tì (Gujarati-gí: મોહનદાસ કરમચંદ ગાંધી, Hindi-gí: मोहनदास करमचंद गांधी, IAST: mohandās karamcand gāndhī, IPA: mohənd̪as kərəmtʃənd̪ gand̪ʱi) (1869 nî 10 goe̍h 2 – 1948 nî 1 goe̍h 30) sī Ìn-tō͘ to̍k-li̍p ūn-tōng tiōng-iàu ê chèng-tī kiam cheng-sîn léng-siū.

Valentin Louis Georges Eugène Marcel Proust (1871 nî 7 goe̍h 10 – 1922 nî 11 goe̍h 18) kán-chheng Marcel Proust (IPA: [maʀ'sɛl pʀust]), sī Hoat-kok ê tha̍k-chheh-lâng (intellectual), siáu-soat-ka, té-bûn chok-ka, kiam phêng-lūn-ka.
Sir Winston Leonard Spencer-Churchill sī Eng-kok ê chèng-tī-ka ia̍h chok-ka.
Erwin Rudolf Josef Alexander Schrödinger (1887 nî 8 goe̍h 12 ji̍t - 1961 nî 1 goe̍h 4 ji̍t) sī Tang-kok ê lí-lūn bu̍t-lí-ha̍k-ka, 1933 nî Nobel Bu̍t-lí-ha̍k Chióng ê ti̍t-chióng-jîn.

Adolf Hitler (1889 nî 4 goe̍h 20 ji̍t – 1945 nî 4 goe̍h 30 ji̍t) sī Ò-tē-lī chhut-sì ê Tek-kok chèng-tī-ka, sī Kok-ka-siā-hōe-chú-gī Tek-kok Lô-tōng-chiá-tóng (Nazi-tóng) ê léng-tō-jîn, Tek-kok Chóng-lí chham Tek-kok chóng-thóng (Führer).
Jawaharlal Nehru (Hindi-bûn: जवाहरलाल नेहरू. 1889 nî 11 goe̍h 14 ji̍t – 1964 nî 5 goe̍h 27 ji̍t) sī Ìn-tō͘ to̍k-li̍p liáu-āu ê tē-it jīm chóng-lí.
Edward 8-sè sī Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok ê kok-ông, chāi-ûi kî-kan sī 1936 nî.
George Herman "Babe" Ruth, Jr.
George 6-sè, pún-miâ Albert Frederick Arthur George.
William Cuthbert Faulkner sī Bí-kok ê bûn-ha̍k-ka, 1949 nî ê Nobel Bûn-ha̍k Chióng ê ti̍t-chióng-jîn.
Humphrey Bogart, 1899 nî 12 goe̍h 25 ji̍t chhut-sì, 1957 nî 1 goe̍h 14 ji̍t sí, sī Bí-kok ê ián-goân.
Epikouros (Ἐπίκουρος, chêng 341 nî - chêng 270 nî), Latin siá-hoat Epicurus, sī kó͘-tāi Hi-lia̍p ê tiat-ha̍k-ka, khoài-lo̍k-chú-gī (hedonism) ê su-sióng-chiá.

column2: ['alexandros tāi-ông', 'a-le̍k-san-tāi 3-sè', 'a-le̍k-san-tāi saⁿ-sè', 'alexander the great', 'alexander tāi-tè', 'alexandros taite', 'alexandros tāi-tè']
column3: Macedonia ê Alexandros 3-sè, mā hō Alexandros Tāi-ông, sī kó͘-chá Macedonia kiam Hi-lia̍p ê ông-kun.
Attila (iok 406 nî – 453 nî) sī Hun-cho̍k ê léng-tō-chiá, Hun Tè-kok thâu-lâng.
Muḥammad (A-lá-peh-gí: محمّد. IPA: [mʊħɑmmæd̪]. 570 nî - 632 nî 6 goe̍h 8 ji̍t) sī I-su-lân-kàu ê sian-ti, Allah kà-sī ê thôan-tō-chiá.
Publius Vergilius Maro (kong-goân-chêng 70 nî 10 goe̍h 15 – kong-goân-chêng 19 nî 9 goe̍h 21) ia̍h Vergili sī kó͘-chá Lô-má ê si-jîn.
Thian-hông sī Ji̍t-pún ê kun-chú.

Tâu-chhiú (Hàn-jī: 投手. Eng-gí: pitcher. sok-siá tāi-bé: P. kì-lo̍k tāi-bé: 1) sī iá-kiû he̍k-chiá lúi-kiû pí-sài tiong, hông-siú hong hū-chek tâu-kiû, thê-kiong chìn-kong hong táⁿ-kek-chiá táⁿ-kek ê kiû-oân soán-chhiú.
It-lúi-chhiú (Hàn-jī: 一壘手. Eng-gí: first baseman. sok-siá tāi-bé: 1B. kì-lo̍k tāi-bé: 3) sī iá-kiû pí-sài tiong, hū-chek hông-siú it-lúi ê kiû-oân.
Jī-lúi-chhiú (Hàn-jī: 二壘手. Eng-gí: second baseman. sok-siá tāi-bé: 2B. kì-lo̍k tāi-bé: 4) sī tī iá-kiû pí-sài tiong, hū-chek hông-siú jī-lúi ê kiû-oân.
Sam-lúi-chhiú (Hàn-jī: 三壘手. Eng-gí: third baseman. sok-siá tāi-bé: 3B. kì-lo̍k tāi-bé: 5) sī tī iá-kiû pí-sài tiong, hū-chek hông-siú sam-lúi ê kiû-oân.
Koan-im (Hàn-jī: 觀音), mā hō-chòe Koan-sè-im Phô͘-sat (觀世音菩薩), khah thong-sio̍k-ê kóng-hoat sī Koan-im-má (觀音媽).
Zarathuštra sī Sian-kàu ê chhòng-sí-jîn.
Marshal sī chi̍t jī Eng-gí tan-jī, ēng chò chē khoán bô-kâng ki-koan ê tiúⁿ-koaⁿ hâm-thâu.
Imam sī chi̍t khoán Islam ê thâu-lâng-ūi.
A-tong (Hi-pek-lâi-gí: אָדָם‎ ādām) sī Hi-pek-lâi Sèng-keng lāi Chhòng-sè-kí ê jîn-bu̍t.

Chin-khún, ia̍h sī khún-lūi, ko͘-lūi, sī ko͘ chham chi̍t-kóa seng-bu̍t ê chóng-ha̍p, sio̍k tī chin-he̍k seng-bu̍t, iā-chiū-sī Latin-miâ hō chò Fungi ê 1 ê kài, in tī sin-thé goā-khaú siau-hoà chia̍h-mi̍h, chiah koh kā êng-ióng-sò͘ (nutrient) ê hun-chú khip-siu ji̍p-khì sè-pau--nih.
Tiān-hā sī tùi chhin-ông ê ê kèng-chheng.
James Knox Polk sī Bí-kok tē-11-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-15-kài, 1845 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1849 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
Zachary Taylor sī Bí-kok tē-12-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-16-kài, 1849 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1850 nî 7 goe̍h 9 ji̍t sià-jīm.
Christophorus Columbus (1451 nî - 1506 nî 5 goe̍h 20 ji̍t) sī Genova ê hâng-hái-ka ia̍h thàm-hiám-ka, si̍t-bîn-chiá.
Leonardo di ser Piero da Vinci (Vinci ê Leonardo, Piero ê Hāu-seⁿ, 1452 nî 4 goe̍h 15 – 1519 nî 5 goe̍h 2) , Italia Bûn-gē Ho̍k-heng sî-tāi ê gâu-lâng.
Franklin Pierce sī Bí-kok tē-14-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-17-kài, 1853 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1857 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
Francis Bacon (1561 nî 1 goe̍h 22 ji̍t - 1626 nî 4 goe̍h 9 ji̍t) sī Eng-lân ê tiat-ha̍k-ka, chèng-tī-ka.
William Shakespeare sī Eng-tē ê si-jîn kap ke̍k-chok-ka.
René Descartes sī Hoat-kok chhut-sin ê tiat-ha̍k-ka, phok-bu̍t-ha̍k-ka.
Oliver Cromwell (1599 nî 4 goe̍h 25 ji̍t – 1658 nî 9 goe̍h 3 ji̍t) sī Eng-kok ê chi̍t ê chèng-tī jîn-bu̍t kap to̍k-chhâi-chiá.
James Buchanan, Jr sī Bí-kok tē-15-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-18-kài, 1857 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1861 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
Rembrandt Harmenszoon van Rijn (1606 nî 7 goe̍h 15 – 1669 nî 10 goe̍h 4) sī éng-koè Kē-tē-kok ê oē-ka kiam kā-pán-ka (etcher).
John Locke (1632 nî 8 goe̍h 29 ji̍t - 1704 nî 10 goe̍h 28 ji̍t) sī Eng-kok ê tiat-ha̍k-ka kap khé-bông ūn-tōng chhòng-tō-chiá, mā sī keng-giām-chú-gī, chū-iû-chú-gī ê khí-chō-chiá.

Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz, Leibnitz, ia̍h von Leibniz (1646 nî 7 goe̍h 1– 1716 nî 11 goe̍h 14) sī kó͘-chá Tek-kok (Sachsen Soán-tè-hô·-kok, 選帝侯) ê thong-châi (polymath), chú-thé ēng Latin-gí kap Hoat-gí lâi siá-chok.
Abraham Lincoln (1809 nî 2 goe̍h 12 ji̍t – 1865 nî 4 goe̍h 15 ji̍t) sī Bí-kok tē-16-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-19 chham tē-20-kài, 1861 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1865 nî 4 goe̍h 15 ji̍t sià-jīm.
Carl Linnaeus (Latin miâ: Carolus Linnaeus. hôa-cho̍k miâ: Carl von Linné. 1707 nî 5 goe̍h 23 – 1778 nî 1 goe̍h 10), Sverige si̍t-bu̍t-ha̍k-ka. khí-chō hiān-tāi seng-bu̍t hun-lūi-ha̍k ê tē-ki.
Jean-Jacques Rousseau sī Genève chhut-sin ê chok-ka, tiat-ha̍k-ka kiam im-ga̍k-ka.
Ekaterina 2-sè, pún miâ Ekaterina Alekseevna sī Lō͘-se-a ê hông-tè, tī i-ê léng-tō hā, chéng-lí Lō͘-se-a ê koán-lí, khok-tiong liáu tè-kok léng-thó͘.

Joseph Haydn (1732 nî 3 goe̍h 31 – 1809 nî 5 goe̍h 31) sī Au-chiu gē-su̍t im-ga̍k Kó͘-tián sî-kî siāng chhut-chèng ê 1 ê chok-khek-ka, lâng kiò i "Kau-hiáng-khek ê Pē" kap "Hiân-ga̍k Sù-tiông-chàu ê Pē".
Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart (1756 nî 1 goe̍h 27 – 1791 nî 12 goe̍h 5) sī Au-chiu Kó͘-tián sî-kî ê chok-khek-ka.

Napoléon Bonaparte (1769 nî 8 goe̍h 15 ji̍t – 1821 nî 5 goe̍h 5 ji̍t) iā-hō Napoléon 1-sè, sī Hoat-kok ê kun-sū kap chèng-tī léng-tō-jîn, sī Hoat-kok kek-bēng sî-tāi ê chiòng-léng, kiōng-hô sî-tāi ê Siú-se̍k Chip-chèng (Premier Consul), āu-lâi ê Hoat-kok hông-tè.

Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770 nî 8 goe̍h 27 ji̍t - 1831 nî 11 goe̍h 14 ji̍t) sī Tek-kok ê tiat-ha̍k-ka, i tī Stuttgart chhut-sì, tùi lô-chip, hêng-siōng-ha̍k, jīn-sek-lūn, chèng-tī-ha̍k, le̍k-sú tiat-ha̍k, bí-ha̍k kap chong-kàu téng-téng lóng-ū gián-kiù, éng-hióng chin-chōe āu-sì ê ha̍k-chiá, chhin-chhiūⁿ Bertrand Russell, Karl Marx kap Friedrich Nietzsche téng-téng.
Samuel Taylor Coleridge (1772 nî 10 goe̍h 21 ji̍t - 1834 nî 7 goe̍h 25 ji̍t) sī England ê si-jîn, England lōng-bān-chú-gī ê khí-thâu-chiá.

column2: ['carl friedrich gauß', 'carl friedrich gauss', 'gauss', 'karl friedrich gauss']
column3: Johann Carl Friedrich Gauß sī Tek-kok ê sò͘-ha̍k-ka, thian-bûn-ha̍k-ka, ia̍h bu̍t-lí-ha̍k-ka.
Andrew Johnson sī Bí-kok tē-17-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-20-kài, 1865 nî 4 goe̍h 15 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1869 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
Florence Nightingale sī Í-tāi-lī chhut-sì ê Eng-lân hō͘-sū, thóng-kè-ha̍k-ka kiam siā-hōe kái-kek-chiá.
William James (1842 nî 1 goe̍h 11 - 1910 nî 8 goe̍h 26) sī Bí-kok ê sim-lí-ha̍k-ka, seng-lí-ha̍k-ka, tiat-ha̍k-ka.
Vincent van Gogh (Hô-lân-bûn: Vincent Willem van Gogh. [ˈvɪnsɛnt fɑn ˈxɔx]?. 1853 nî 3 goe̍h 30 ji̍t – 1890 nî 7 goe̍h 29 ji̍t) sī Kē-tē-kok āu-ìn-siōng-phài ê gē-su̍t-ka, ōe-ka.

Sigmund Freud (1856 nî 5 goe̍h 6 ji̍t - 1939 nî 9 goe̍h 23 ji̍t), chhut-sì-miâ Sigismund Schlomo Freud, sī Tang-kok ê cheng-sîn-pēⁿ-ha̍k-ka, sī sim-lí-ha̍k ê cheng-sîn-hun-sek ha̍k-phài chhòng-sí-jîn.
George Bernard Shaw (1856 nî 7 goe̍h 26 – 1950 nî 11 goe̍h 2), Éire chok-ka, i ê hì-ke̍k chhiau-koè 60 chhut, phêng-lūn pau-hâm im-ga̍k, bí-su̍t, bûn-ha̍k.
John Dewey sī Bí-kok ê tiat-ha̍k-ka, sim-lí-ha̍k-ka, kàu-io̍k lí-lūn-ka.
Henry Ford (1863 nî 7 goe̍h 30 – 1947 nî 4 goe̍h 7) sī Ford Chū-tōng-chhia Kong-si ê khí-chō-jîn.
Joseph Rudyard Kipling sī Eng-kok ê bûn-ha̍k-ka, 1907 nî ê Nobel Bûn-ha̍k Chióng ê ti̍t-chióng-jîn.
William Butler Yeats (1865 nî 6 goe̍h 13 – 1939 nî 1 goe̍h 28) ia̍h W. B. Yeats sī Éire ê si-jîn, ke̍k-chok-ka.
Bertrand William Russell, Tē 3 ê Earl Russell, OM, FRS (1872 nî 5 goe̍h 18 – 1970 nî 2 goe̍h 2), Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok tiat-ha̍k-ka, lô-chek-ha̍k-ka, sò͘-ha̍k-ka, chok-ka.
Carl Gustav Jung (1875 nî 7 goe̍h 26 ji̍t – 1961 nî 6 goe̍h 6 ji̍t) sī Sūi-se ê cheng-sîn-pēⁿ-ha̍k-ka, sī hun-sek sim-lí-ha̍k ê khí-thâu-jîn.
Pablo Picasso (1881 nî 10 goe̍h 25 – 1973 nî 4 goe̍h 8) sī Se-pan-gâ ê oē-ka kiam tiau-khek-ka.
Franz Kafka (IPA: [ˈfranʦ ˈkafka]. 1883 nî 7 goe̍h 3 – 1924 nî 6 goe̍h 3) sī 20 sè-kí ēng Tek-gí siá siáu-soat ê tiōng-iàu kak-sek.
Ludwig Josef Johann Wittgenstein (1889 nî 4 goe̍h 26 ji̍t - 1951 nî 4 goe̍h 29 ji̍t) sī Ò-tē-lī ê tiat-ha̍k-ka.
Ulysses S. Grant (1822 nî 4 goe̍h 27 ji̍t - 1885 nî 7 goe̍h 23 ji̍t) sī Bí-kok tē-18-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-21 chham tē-22-kài, 1869 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1877 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
Burrhus Frederic Skinner (1904 nî 3 goe̍h 20 ji̍t - 1990 nî 8 goe̍h 18 ji̍t) sī Bí-kok ê sim-lí-ha̍k-ka.

Malcolm X (1925 nî 5 goe̍h 19–1965 nî 2 goe̍h 21), pún-miâ Malcolm Little, āu--lâi mā hō-chò El-Hajj Malik El-Shabazz, Omowale, sī 1-ūi Bí-kok o·-lâng bîn-cho̍k ūn-tōng ê thâu-lâng, 1965 nî 2 goe̍h hông chhèng-sat sí-bông.

column2: ['elizabeth 2-sè', 'elizabeth ii', 'elizabeth ii-sè', 'elizabeth jī-sè', 'eng-kok i-lī-sa-pe̍k jī-sè', 'liân-ha̍p ông-kok ê elizabeth 2-sè', 'liân-ha̍p ông-kok ê elizabeth ii', 'liân-ha̍p ông-kok ê elizabeth jī-sè', 'liân-ha̍p ông-kok ê tē ii ê elizabeth']
column3: Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok ê Elizabeth 2-sè (Eng-gí: Queen Elizabeth II of the United Kingdom. 1926 nî 4 goe̍h 21 ji̍t chhut-sì ), pún-miâ Elizabeth Alexandra Mary Windsor, sī Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok tùi 1952 nî 2 goe̍h 6 ji̍t kàu taⁿ ê Lú-ông.
Rutherford Birchard Hayes sī Bí-kok tē-19-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-23-kài, 1877 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1881 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
George Washington sī Bí-kok tē-1-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-1 chham tē-2-kài, 1789 nî 4 goe̍h 30 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1797 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
James Abram Garfield sī Bí-kok tē-20-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-24-kài, 1881 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm.
Stephen Grover Cleveland sī Bí-kok ê tē-22-jīm kap tē-24-jīm chóng-thóng, tē-1-pái sī 1885 nî kàu 1889 nî, tē-2-pái sī 1893 nî kàu 1897 nî.
Benjamin Harrison sī Bí-kok tē-23-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-26-kài, 1889 nî 3 goe̍h 30 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1893 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
William McKinley, Jr.

Theodore Roosevelt (1858 nî 10 goe̍h 27 ji̍t - 1919 nî 1 goe̍h 6 ji̍t) sī Bí-kok tē-26-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-29 chham tē-30-kài, 1901 nî 9 goe̍h 14 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1909 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
William Howard Taft sī Bí-kok tē-27-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-31-kài, 1909 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1913 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
Thomas Woodrow Wilson sī Bí-kok tē-28-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-32 chham tē-33-kài, 1913 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1921 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
Warren Gamaliel Harding sī Bí-kok tē-29-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-34-kài, 1921 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1923 nî 8 goe̍h 2 ji̍t sià-jīm.
John Adams sī Bí-kok tē-2-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-3-kài, 1797 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1801 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
Herbert Clark Hoover sī Bí-kok tē-31-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-36-kài, 1929 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1933 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
Franklin Delano Roosevelt sī Bí-kok tē-32-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-37, tē-38, tē-39 chham tē-40-kài, 1933 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1945 nî 4 goe̍h 12 ji̍t sià-jīm.

John Fitzgerald "Jack" Kennedy (1917 nî 5 goe̍h 29 ji̍t - 1963 nî 11 goe̍h 22 ji̍t) sī Bí-kok tē-35-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-44-kài, 1961 nî 1 goe̍h 20 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1963 nî 11 goe̍h 22 ji̍t hong àm-sat.
Lyndon Baines Johnson sī Bí-kok tē-36-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-44 chham tē-45-kài, 1963 nî 11 goe̍h 22 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1969 nî 1 goe̍h 20 ji̍t sià-jīm.
Gerald Rudolph Ford, Jr.
James Earl Carter, Jr (1924 nî 10 go̍eh chhe 1 chhut-sì) it-poaⁿ lóng kiò ī Jimmy Carter.
Thomas Jefferson sī Bí-kok tē-3-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-4 chham tē-5-kài, 1801 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1809 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
Ronald Wilson Reagan sī Bí-kok tē-40-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-49 chham tē-50-kài, 1981 nî 1 goe̍h 20 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1989 nî 1 goe̍h 20 ji̍t sià-jīm.
William Jefferson Clinton (1946 nî 8 go̍eh 19 chhut-sì) it-poaⁿ lóng kiò ī Bill Clinton.
James Madison, Jr.
Khu-pia̍t: Kāng-miâ ê chheh, chhiáⁿ khoàⁿ Lâm-hôa-keng
James Monroe sī Bí-kok tē-5-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-8 chham tē-9-kài, 1817 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1825 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.

Augustus (BCE 63 nî 9 goe̍h 23 ji̍t - 14 nî 8 goe̍h 19 ji̍t) chhut-siⁿ-miâ Gaius Octavius Thurinus, sī Iulius Caesar ê ióng-chú, sī Roma Tē-kok tē-it-ê hông-tè, chāi-jīm kî-kan sī BCE 27 nî kàu AD 14 nî.
John Quincy Adams sī Bí-kok tē-6-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-10-kài, 1825 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1829 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
Andrew Jackson sī Bí-kok tē-7-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-11 chham tē-12-kài, 1829 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1837 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
Martin Van Buren sī Bí-kok tē-8-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-13-kài, 1837 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1841 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
William Henry Harrison sī Bí-kok tē-9-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-14-kài, 1841 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1841 nî 4 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
Thó-chia̍h sī hiòng pa̍t-lâng kiû-thó chia̍h-mi̍h kap chîⁿ-châi téng-téng bu̍t-chit ê hêng-ûi.
Seng-lí-lâng sī tī kiong-èng-hong kap su-kiû-hong tiong-kan the̍h-tio̍h lī-sûn ê lâng.

column2: ['pó-lô', '保祿', '保禄', '保罗', '保羅', 'paolo', 'paul the apostle', 'paulos', 'pó-lo̍k']
column3: Paulos, Hàn-gí hō-chò Pó-lô ia̍h Pó-lo̍k, sī siāng kó͘-chá ê Ki-tok-kàu thôan-tō-jîn chi it.
H.C. Andersen (IPA: [hɔse ˈɑnɐsn̩]) ia̍h Hans Christian Andersen (IPA: [ˈhanˀs ˈkʰʁæʂd̥jan ˈɑnɐsn̩]) (1805 nî 4 goe̍h 2 – 1875 nî 4 goe̍h 4) sī Tan-be̍h ê chok-ka kiam si-jîn.
Tāi-sài (大使) sī kok-ka goân-siú hiòng gōa-kok goân-siú phài-chhut ê siōng ko-kai-chân ê gōa-kau-koaⁿ.
Queer sī kóng tī sèng-sū hong-bīn chiàm chió-sò͘ ê lâng, pâu-hâm tông-sèng-loân, siang-sèng-loân, he̍k-chiá bô-ài jīn-tông í-siong lūi-pia̍t ê lâng, ia̍h sī bô-ài hun sèng-piat ê lâng téng-téng.
Siù-i-su, iū hō-chò siù-i, sī choan-bûn thê-kiong tōng-bu̍t i-liâu ho̍k-bū ê i-su.
Pē-bú (爸母) sī seⁿ-chhut sin kò-thé ê seng-bu̍t, hun-sêng lāu-pē kah lāu-bú.
Eng-gí ê prince, kap kî-tha Se-iûⁿ giân-gí tùi-tâng ê iōng-gí, sī chi̍t khoán cha-po͘ thóng-tī-chiá, he̍k-chiá sī kun-chú ka-cho̍k ê sêng-oân.
Lú-ông sī cha-bó͘ ê kun-chú ia̍h-sī kok-ông.
Charles Pierre Baudelaire sī Hoat-kok tôe-hùi-phài si-jîn, i ê chok-phín ū Les Fleurs du mal, Le Spleen de Paris téng.
Io̍h-su (藥師), iū hō-chò io̍h-che-su (藥劑師), sī choan-bûn hū-chek thê-kiong io̍h-phín tì-sek kap i-io̍h ho̍k-bū ê choan-gia̍p jîn-oân.

Cheng-î Tāi-chiong-kun (征夷大将軍 / せいいたいしょうぐん / Seii Taishōgun) tī Ji̍t-pún le̍k-sú siōng, goân-pún sī Tāi-hô ông-khoân uī-tio̍h beh tùi-khòng Emisi só͘ siat-tì ê lîm-sî ko-kip kun-koaⁿ chit-uī, tī chiàn-cheng kiat-sok liáu-āu kái-tû.
Kò-jîn sī tan-to̍k ê jîn-lūi kò-thé, hām tāi-piáu to-sò͘ jîn-lūi kò-thé ê jîn-bîn tùi-èng.
Gín-á/gín-á-lâng su-bīn-gí siá-chò jî-tông, sī chí hoat-lu̍t siōng iáu-bē sêng-liân, ia̍h-sī seng-lí siōng iáu-bē tńg-tōa-lâng ê lâng.
Chheh-tiàm (冊店) sī siau-siū chheh ê lêng-siū-siong.
Ha̍k-seng (學生) sī siū-tio̍h kok-ka ia̍h-sī chèng-hú jīm-khó ê ha̍k-hāu ia̍h-sī ha̍k-īⁿ ê ha̍k-si̍p-chiá.
I-su sī
Eng-gí ê prince, kap kî-tha Se-iûⁿ giân-gí tùi-tâng ê iōng-gí, sī chi̍t khoán cha-po͘ thóng-tī-chiá, he̍k-chiá sī kun-chú ka-cho̍k ê sêng-oân.
Sa-hông (Lō͘-se-a-gí: царь. Lô-má-jī: car') sī Au-chiu Slav lâng, phì-jû Lō͘-se-a ê kun-ông.
Pē (爸), bûn-giân: hū(父) sī pē-bú tiong ê cha-po͘ sī-toā, chiū sī seng-io̍k ka-kī ê cha-po͘-lâng.
SMAP sī Ji̍t-pún 1-ê liû-hêng ga̍k-thoân, chū 1991 nî cho·-thoân kàu taⁿ bat sak-chhut chē-chē tè sî-kiâⁿ ê tan-khek.
Iû-chhai (Hàn-jī: 郵差) sī chi̍t-ê chit-gia̍p, choan-bûn hū-chek kā phoe ia̍h-sī pau-kó sàng hō͘ siu-kiāⁿ-jîn.
Ang sī tī hun-in koan-hē lāi-bīn tùi cha-po͘ ê chheng-ho͘, kah bó͘ tùi-èng.
Bó sī tī hun-in koan-hē lāi-bīn tùi cha-bó͘ ê chheng-ho͘, kah ang tùi-èng.
Kelt-lâng (Celt-) sī tùi Chio̍h-khì Sî-tāi chiū tī Au-chiu oa̍h-tāng ê chi̍t kûn lâng.
Sioux (Eng-gí hoat-im: /suː/) sī Bí-kok kap Canada ê gôan-chū-bîn, ū saⁿ-ê toā hun-chi, pau-hâm Isanti, Ihanktowan-Ihanktowana chham Teton (mā-hō͘ Tetonwan ia̍h Lakota).
Kazakh-cho̍k sī A-chiu ê chi̍t-ê bîn-cho̍k.
Roma-lâng, iah-sī Jí-pu-sih, sī chi̍t khoán tùi Ìn-tō͘ pak-pêng lâi--ê, tī Au-chiu téng-tē phiau-lōng--ê bîn-cho̍k.
Iû-bo̍k bîn-cho̍k (遊牧民族) sī kheng-hiòng ùi chi̍t ê só͘-chāi poaⁿ-soá kàu lēng-goā chi̍t ê só͘-chāi ê bîn-cho̍k kûn-thé.
Tiān-chú chó͘-khòng mā kán-chheng chò chó͘-khòng sī ēng lâi tō͘ khoàⁿ chó͘-tòng chiàⁿ-hiân tiān-liû ê le̍k-liōng ū joā kiông.
Kéng-chhat-koaⁿ, it-poaⁿ mā kiò kéng-chhat, sī kéng-chhat ki-koan ê chit-goân.
Kodagu sī Ìn-tō͘ Karnataka pang ê chi̍t ê koān.
Delaware Kūn (Eng-gí: Delaware County) sī Bí-kok Pennsylvania chiu ê kūn (county), ū jîn-kháu 561973.
Maya bûn-bêng sī Mesoamerica ê chi̍t ê bûn-bêng, sī Maya-lâng hoat-tián chhut-lâi ê.

Hō͘-hiān-tāi-chú-gī piáu-bīn ê ì-sù sī "hiān-tāi kòe āu", ū chin-chōe bô-kāng-khóan ê tēng-gī, chú-iàu sī gē-su̍t kap thiat-ha̍k siōng ê khài-liām, chá-kî sī tùi hiān-tāi-chú-gī ê hóan-èng kap hóan-khòng, hoâi-gî kho-ha̍k kap lí-sèng.
Cherokee, hō ka-tī sī Ani-Yunwiya (ᎠᏂᏴᏫᏯ), sī Bí-kok ê goân-chū-bîn pō͘-cho̍k, chú-iàu tòa tī lâm-pō͘ ê Georgia, Tennessee, North Carolina kap South Carolina téng chiu-hūn.
Sauk-lâng (Sac, Sauk) sī Bí-kok ê goân-chū-bîn chi̍t kûn.
Tatar-cho̍k sī A-chiu ê chi̍t-ê bîn-cho̍k.
Aztec sī Mexico tiōng-pō͘ ê Bí-chiu bûn-bêng, chú-iàu kóng Nahuatl-gí, tī 14 sè-kí kàu 16 sè-kí chi-phoè toā-hūn ê Mesoamerica tē-khu.
Bông-kó͘-cho̍k sī A-chiu ê chi̍t-ê bîn-cho̍k.
Bí-chiu ê goân-chū-bîn sī chêng-Columbus sî-tāi chio̍h tī Lâm Pak Bí-chiu seng-oa̍h ê cho̍k-kûn kap in ê āu-tāi.
Gí-tah-chhiú sī ián-chàu gí-tah ê im-ga̍k-ka, i-ê ga̍k-khì khó-lêng sī kó͘-tián gí-tah, goân-seng gí-tah, tiān-chú gí-tah kap bass gí-tah.
Iâ-hô-hoa sī Hi-pek-lâi Sèng-keng lāi-bīn Sîn ê chheng-ho͘.
Anglo-Saxon lâng sī chêng 5 sè-kí hit chūn tō khiā tī Eng-lân ê jîn-kûn.
1970 nî-tāi sī 1970 nî kàu 1979 nî ê 10-tang.
Tiâu-sián-cho̍k sī A-chiu ê chi̍t-ê bîn-cho̍k.
So͘-kat-lân-lâng sī So͘-kat-lân ê chāi-tē bîn-cho̍k.
Sierra Leone Kiōng-hô-kok (Eng-gí: Republic of Sierra Leone) sī tiàm-tī Se Hui-chiu Tāi-se-iûⁿ hái-hoāⁿ ê kok-ka.
Tâi-oân-lâng (Hàn-jī:臺灣儂. Eng-gí: Taiwanese People) tī hia̍p-gī ê tēng-gī siōng, sī toà tī Tâi-oân (pau-hâm Tâi-oân-tó, Phêⁿ-ô͘ Kûn-tó, Le̍k-tó, Lân-sū kap Liû-kiû-sū) ê só͘-ū jîn-bîn.
Tâi-oân Kheh-ka-gí (臺灣客家語) sī Kheh-ka-gí tī Tâi-oân ê hong-giân, mā sī Tiong-hoâ Bîn-kok hoat-tēng ê tāi-chiòng kau-thong kang-kū pò͘-im gí-giân chi-chi̍t.
Bû-tóng-che̍k (無黨籍) ia̍h sī kiò choè Bû-só͘-sio̍k (無所屬), sī chí bô ka-ji̍p jīm-hô chi̍t ê chèng-tóng ê, chham-ka soán-kí ê hāu-soán-jîn.
Baron sī Ìn-tō͘-nî-se-a Tang Jawa Séng Nganjuk Koān ê chi̍t ê hiong.
Henrik Johan Ibsen (1828 nî 3 goe̍h 20 – 1906 nî 5 goe̍h 23) sī Norge ê ke̍k-chok-ka, hiān-tāi siá-si̍t-chú-gī (realism) ê khai-ki-chiá.
Chèng-tī jîn-bu̍t (Hàn-jī: 政治人物. Eng-bûn: politician) sī kā chèng-tī tòng-chòe chit-gia̍p ê lâng.

Yehudi (‘Ivrit: יְהוּדִי, Yehudi, יְהוּדִים, Yehudim. Ladino: ג׳ודיו, Djudio, ג׳ודיוס, Djudios. Yiddish: ייִד, Yid, ייִדן, Yidn) ia̍h Iû-thài, Iû-thài-lâng sī kóng sian-chó͘ sī kó͘ Tiong-tang (ancient Middle East) Yisraʾel (Í-sek-lia̍t-lâng, Israelites) ia̍h ʿIvrim (Hi-pek-lâi-lâng, Hebrews) ê lâng, he̍k-chiá sī sìn-gióng Iû-thài-kàu (Yehudah) ê lâng.
Anglo-Saxon lâng sī chêng 5 sè-kí hit chūn tō khiā tī Eng-lân ê jîn-kûn.
Thài-khong-jîn (太空人) sī chiap-siū khong-kan hui-hêng hùn-liān liáu-āu, chí-hui, chhau-chhiòng ia̍h-sī sêng-tah thài-khong-chûn chìn-ji̍p ú-tiū ê kang-chok jîn-oân.
Siáu-thiú-á sī chi̍t khoán choan-bûn tī chhiò-khoe tōng-chok ê piáu-ián-chiá.
Kang, ia̍h sī kóng kang--ê, kho-ha̍k-siōng ū kóng hiông-sèng, hêng-sèng, sī seng-bu̍t ê sèng-piat, sī nn̄g khoán phó͘-phiàn ê sèng-pia̍t chi it, sio tò-pêng ê sèng-pia̍t sī bó--ê.
Phok-sū (Hàn: 博士. Eng: doctor) sī tāi-ha̍k kàu-io̍k siōng-koân chân-kip ê ha̍k-ūi.
Le̍k-sú-ha̍k-ka sī teh gián-kiù le̍k-sú ê lâng.

column2: ['choh-sit-lâng', '作田人', '作穡人', '农夫', '農民', 'choh sit lâng', 'chohsitlâng', 'chò-sit-lâng', 'farmer', 'lông-bîn']
column3: Choh-sit-lâng sī í lông-gia̍p chò chit-gia̍p ê lâng, pau-hâm chiông-sū choh-sit, thiok-bo̍k, lîm-gia̍p téng-téng chū-jiân keng-chè sán-gia̍p ê lâng.
Siau-hùi-chiá sī kóng sú-ēng siong-phín ia̍h ho̍k-bū ê lâng.
Gē-su̍t-ka sī lī-ēng chhòng-chok châi-lêng chò gē-su̍t seng-sán ê lâng.
Kho-ha̍k-ka (科學家) sī sú-iōng hē-thóng-hòa ê hêng-ûi lâi hoat-hiān sin tì-sek ê lâng.
O͘-lâng sī lâng lāi-bīn chi̍t kóa phôe-hu khah àm-sek ê chéng-cho̍k ia̍h cho̍k-kûn.
Thian-bûn-ha̍k-ka sī gián-kiù thian-bûn-ha̍k ê kho-ha̍k-ka.
Cheng-thàm (偵探) sī hū-chek tiau-cha àn-chêng ê chit-gia̍p tiau-cha-goân, pau-hâm hêng-kéng kah teng-sìn-siā.
Pún-bûn hoán-èng Ki-tok chong-kàu--ê koan-tiám.
Ki-tok sī tùi Hi-lia̍p-gí Khristós (Χριστός) ê hoan-e̍k, goân ì-sù sī "siū boah-iû chiá", tī Hi-pek-lâi-gí kóng Māšîaḥ (מָשִׁיחַ), nā Hō-ló-oē chiàu im hoan "Bí-sài-a".
Hoat-koaⁿ sī tī hoat-īⁿ chiàu hoat-lu̍t phoàn àn-kiāⁿ ê koaⁿ-oân.
Ông-tāi-hui (王大妃) sī Tiâu-sián Poàn-tó kap Ji̍t-pún tùi cha-bó͘ ông-cho̍k ê chi̍t chióng chheng-hō. sio̍k-î tāi-hui ê chi̍t chióng.
Marcus Tullius Cicero sī Lô-má ê chèng-tī-chiá kiam lu̍t-su.

Lev Nikolayevich Tolstoy (1828 nî 9 goe̍h 9 – 1910 nî 11 goe̍h 20) (Lō͘-se-a-gí: Лев Никола́евич Толсто́й, IPA: [lʲɛv nʲɪkʌˈlajɪvʲɪtɕ tʌlˈstoj] Tolstoy?) ia̍h Leo Tolstoy sī Lō͘-se-a ê siáu-soat-ka, tiat-ha̍k-ka, hô-pêng-chú-gī-chiá, kàu-io̍k-kái-kek-chiá.
Ián-oân (ián-goân) ia̍h hì-kioh, sī tī hì-kio̍k lāi piáu-ián, chiâⁿ chò lāi-té ê kak-sek ê lâng.
Walter Adolf Georg Gropius sī Tek-kok ê kiàn-tio̍k-su.
Tī chia ê chit-ê sû lâu-chúi sī kóng hái-chúi ê khí-lo̍h só͘ ín-khí--ê hái-tiong chúi-lâu.
Chú-hū, iā hō-chò ka-têng chú-hū, sī tī chhù-lāi choan-chit chiàu-kò͘ ka-têng ê í-hun cha-bó͘-lâng.
Lú-cheng sī lú-sèng ê sîn-chit-chiá, tī bô-kâng chong-kàu ū bô-kâng ê chheng-ho͘, pí-lūn Hu̍t-kàu ū kiò lî-ko͘, Thian-chú-kàu ū kiò siu-lú.
Sán-pô, Ún-pô, Khioh-kiáⁿ-pô téng-téng sī choan-bûn chiap-siⁿ âng-eⁿ-á ê lâng.
A-bú, a-bó, sī siang-chhin lāi-té cha-bó͘ hit-ê.

Model (má-to͘h) sī chi̍t khoán chit-gia̍p, sī choan-bûn lī-ēng in ê goā-piáu, piáu-ián, táⁿ-pān kap chhēng-chhah, lâi chham-ú sî-siōng siat-kè, gē-su̍t chhòng-chok, ia̍h kok khoán soan-thoân oa̍h-tāng ê lâng.
Hāu-seⁿ sī ka-têng lāi ê sêng-goân, iû pē-bú ê cha-po͘ kiáⁿ-jî.
Thomas Edison (1847 nî 2 goe̍h 11 ji̍t - 1931 nî 10 goe̍h 18 ji̍t) sī Bí-kok ê hoat-bêng-ka ia̍h si̍t-gia̍p-ka, sī si̍t-iōng ê tiān-hóe-pho, liû-siaⁿ-ki téng-téng khì-khū ê hoat-bêng-lâng.
Cha-bó͘ sī sèng-piat sio̍k bó ê jîn-lūi, ū-sî kóng lú-chú, mā ū kóng lú-sèng.
Cha-po͘ sī kang ê jîn-lūi, ū-sî kóng lâm-chú, mā ū kóng lâm-sèng.

Conquistador (ho͘-im: [koŋkistaˈðor]) tī Se-pan-gâ-gí kap Phû-tô-gâ-gí sī "cheng-ho̍k-chia" ê í-sù, chí Se-pan-gâ tī 15 sè-kí kàu 19 sè-kí ê si̍t-bîn sî-tāi khai-hoat Bí-chiu ê kun-jîn ia̍h-sī thàm-hiám-chiá.
Amisch (Eng-gí: Amish) sī 1 tīn chài-chìm-lé-phài ê Ki-tok-tô͘, chú-iàu khiā tī Bí-kok kap Canada Ontario Séng.

Hui-chiu-hē Bí-kok-lâng, mā kiò Bí-kok O͘-lâng, sī pún-sin he̍k-chiá sī chó͘-sian tùi Hui-chiu sóa kòe Bí-kok ê cho̍k-kûn, pún jī iû-kî sī teh kóng í-chá keng-kòe lô͘-lē bō͘-e̍k sàng kòe Bí-kok ê o͘-lâng cho̍k-kûn kap in-ê āu-sè, chia-ê lâng tōa-hūn lâi-goân sī Se Hui-chiu.
Ernest Miller Hemingway (1899 nî 7 goe̍h 21 – 1961 nî 7 goe̍h 2 ji̍t) sī Bí-kok ê siáu-soat-ka, té-phiⁿ-kó͘ chok-ka, kiam kì-chiá.
Aristophanes (Hi-lia̍p-gí: Ἀριστοφάνης, Kong-goân-chêng 446 nî – Kong-goân-chêng 388 nî) sī kó͘-chá Hi-lia̍p ê chok-ka, hí-chhut ê khai-ki-chiá.
Samuel Barclay Beckett (1906 nî 4 goe̍h 13 – 1989 nî 12 goe̍h 22), Éire-kok ê hì-ke̍k-ka, siáu-soat-ka, si-jîn.
Tiâu-chiú-sai (Hàn-jī: 調酒師) sī chi̍t chióng tī chiú-pa lāi-bīn choan-bûn hū-chek tiâu-chè ke-bóe-chiú ê chit-gia̍p.
Lān-bîn sī î-bîn ê chi̍t chióng, tān-sī sī in-ūi chiàn-cheng ia̍h-sī chū-jiân chai-hāi téng-téng in-sò͘ lâi poaⁿ-soá kàu sin ê só͘-chāi.
Sami lâng sī tòa tī Nô͘-ui, Sūi-tián, Hun-lân pak-pêng, kiam Lō͘-se-a ê Kola Poàn-tó ê chi̍t-ê cho̍k-kûn.

Dante Alighieri, Durante Degli Alighieri, ia̍h Dante (1265 – 1321) sī Italia Firenze ê si-jîn, i ê chok-phín Sîn-sèng ê Hí-kio̍k (Divina Commedia, iū-koh hoan chò Sîn-khek) sī sè-kài bûn-ha̍k ê keng-tián.
Francesco Petrarca (1313 nî 7 goe̍h 20 ji̍t - 1375 nî 7 goe̍h 18 ji̍t) sī Bûn-gē-ho̍k-heng sî-tāi ê Italia chok-ka ia̍h si-jîn, Canzoniere sī i-ê tāi-piáu-chok.

Chit phiⁿ bûn-chiuⁿ chí chi̍t khoán lô͘-kang, iú-koan Tâi-oân Kong-sī--ê iáⁿ-chi̍p, chhiáⁿ-khoàⁿ Ku-lí Ku-lí iah-sī kho͘-lo̍h, sī 19 sè-kí kàu 20 sè-kí, ìn-tō͘ iah-sī tiong-kok lâi--ê lô͘-kang, thong-siông chò cho͘-tāng--ê khang-khòe, pí-jû bé-thâu poaⁿ-ūn-kang téng.
Koaⁿ-liâu, kán-chheng koaⁿ, tī Tang-a kóng-ê sī thoân-thóng ióng-iú phín-tia̍t ê koaⁿ-goân.
Sokrates sī Hi-lia̍p kó͘-tián sî-tāi ê tiat-ha̍k-ka.
Slav Lâng (Slavs) sī Au-chiu jîn-sò͘ siōng-chē ê cho̍k-kûn, jîn-sò͘ tāi-iok ū 3.4 ek lâng.
Iroquois, hō ka-tī sī Haudenosaunee, sī chi̍t-kóa Bí-chiu gôan-chū-bîn chó͘-sêng ê chi̍p-thôan, khí-thâu ū Mohawk, Oneida, Onondaga, Cayuga, kap Seneca gō͘-ê pō͘-lo̍k.
Viking-lâng (Kó͘-Norse-oē: vikingr) sī 8 sè-kí boé-kî kàu 11 sè-kí chi-kan teh kiâⁿ-chûn thàm-hiám, kau-chiàn, chò seng-lí ê hit-koá Pak-au lâng.
Kun-koaⁿ (軍官) sī kok-ka siū-khôan káu kun-tiong koán-lí kun-tūi ê koaⁿ-goân.
Sîn-bêng ia̍h-sī sîn, sī jîn-lūi siā-hōe koan-liām lāi-bīn chi̍t chióng chhiau-o̍at lâng ê cheng-sîn ia̍h sī khu-thé, sī chin chōe sìn-gióng ê chú-thé.

Dwight David "Ike" Eisenhower (1890 nî 10 goe̍h 14 ji̍t - 1969 nî 3 goe̍h 28 ji̍t) sī Bí-kok tē-34-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-42 chham tē-43-kài, 1953 nî 1 goe̍h 20 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1961 nî 1 goe̍h 20 ji̍t sià-jīm.
Phô͘-sat (菩薩) tī Hu̍t-kàu lāi-té chi ū kak-ngō͘ (覺悟) ê ū-chêng (有情) chiòng-seng (眾生).
Dalai Lama (Chōng-gí: ཏཱ་ལའི་བླ་མ་) sī Se-chōng Hu̍t-kàu Gelug-phài--ê 1--ê choán-sè thoân-sêng--ê tulku (hoa̍t-hu̍t).

column2: ['mô͘ te̍k-tong', 'mao zedong', 'mo· te̍k-tong', 'mô͘ te̍k tong', 'mô͘ te̍ktong']
column3: Mô͘ Te̍k-tong, iā pī hō-chò Mô͘ Chú-se̍k, sī Tiong-kok ū-miâ ê chèng-tī-ka, chiàn-lio̍k-ka, sù-sióng-ka, su-hoat-ka kap si-jîn.
Ló Chú (老子, iā ē-sái tha̍k Nó͘-chú) sī Tiong-kok Chhun-chhiu bóe-kî ê su-sióng-ka kah tiat-ha̍k-ka.
Fernão de Magalhães sī Phû-tô-gâ ê thám-hiám-ka.

Chok-khek-ka sī ūi lâng chhòng-chok sin im-ga̍k ê lâng, iû-kî kí iōng ga̍k-phó͘ (chhiūⁿ kòng-thûi-phó͘) kì-chài hō͘ lâng ián-chàu ê im-ga̍k-ka, hām sûi-sî chhòng-chok (improvisation) ia̍h tha̍k phó͘ chàu-ga̍k ê ga̍k-su bô siâng-khoán.

Gaius Julius Caesar (Latin-gí IPA: [ˈgaːius ˈjuːlius ˈkaɪsar]. BC 100 nî 7 goe̍h 13 ji̍t – BC 44 nî 3 goe̍h 15 ji̍t) sī Lô-má Kiōng-hô ê kun-sū chham chèng-tī léng-tō-chiá, sī Lô-má tùi kiōng-hô-kok chóan-piàn sêng Lô-má Té-kok ê koan-kiān jîn-bu̍t.
Pí-tek, ia̍h Pek-to-lo̍k, sī Ia-so͘ ê tē-it tāi mn̂g-tô Cha̍p-jī Sù-tô͘ chi it, sī Ki-tok-kàu chá-kî ê kàu-hōe léng-tō-chiá.
Chester Alan Arthur sī Bí-kok tē-21-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-24-kài, 1881 nî 9 goe̍h 19 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1885 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
John Tyler, Jr.
Millard Fillmore sī Bí-kok tē-13-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-16-kài, 1850 nî 7 goe̍h 9 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1853 nî 3 goe̍h 4 ji̍t sià-jīm.
John Calvin Coolidge, Jr.
Harry S. Truman sī Bí-kok tē-33-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-40 chham tē-41-kài, 1945 nî 4 goe̍h 12 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1953 nî 1 goe̍h 20 ji̍t sià-jīm.
Lewis Carroll sī Charles Lutwidge Dodgson (1832 nî 1 goe̍h 27 ji̍t - 1898 nî 1 goe̍h 14 ji̍t) ê pit-miâ.
John Dalton (1766 nî 9 goe̍h 6 ji̍t - 1844 nî 7 goe̍h 27 ji̍t) sī Eng-tē ê hoà-ha̍k-ka kiam bu̍t-lí-ha̍k-ka.

John Maynard Keynes (1883 nî 6 goe̍h 5 – 1946 nî 4 goe̍h 21) sī Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok ê keng-chè-ha̍k-ka, i ê lí-lūn hō chò Keyne keng-chè-ha̍k, tùi hiān-chú-sî chin chē chèng-hú ê châi-bū chèng-chhek kap keng-chè chham chèng-tī lí-lūn lóng ū toā éng-hióng.
Isaac Newton FRS (1643 nî 1 goe̍h 4 – 1727 nî 3 goe̍h 31) sī Eng-tē ê bu̍t-lí-ha̍k-ka, sò͘-ha̍k-ka, thian-bûn-ha̍k-ka, chū-jiân tiat-ha̍k-ka, liān-kim-su̍t-ka (alchemist).
Charles Robert Darwin (1809 nî 2 goe̍h 12 – 1882 nî 4 goe̍h 19), Eng-tē chū-jiân-ha̍k-ka.
O͘-kúi, tī Eng-gí hō-chò "Nigger", sī tùi O͘-lâng--ê bú-jio̍k-sû.

column2: ['sek-khia-mô͘-nî', '佛', '佛祖', '佛陀', '释迦', '释迦佛', '释迦牟尼', '释迦牟尼佛', '釋迦', '釋迦佛', '釋迦牟尼', '釋迦牟尼佛', 'gautama buddha', 'sek-khia-bô͘-nî', 'sek-khia-mô·-n', 'sek-kia-hu̍t', 'śākyamuni']
column3: Sek-khia-mô͘-nî (Hàn-jī: 釋迦牟尼. Hôan-bûn:शाक्यमुनि, Śākyamuni), he̍k-chiá kiò Sek-khia-mô͘-nî-hu̍t, Sek-khia-hu̍t, gôan-miâ Siddhārtha Gautama (सिद्धार्थ गौतम), sī Hu̍t-kàu ê chhòng-sí-jîn.

Karl Marx he̍k-chiá Khá-ní Má-khek-su (卡爾·馬克思) (1818 nî 5 goe̍h 5–1883 nî 3 goe̍h 14) sī 1 ūi put-chí-á ū miâ-siaⁿ ê chèng-tī tiat-ha̍k-ka kap siā-hōe lí-lūn-ka, mā sī chôan sè-kài Marx-chú-gī ê gôan-sí-sian-chun.
Kublai (Bông-kó͘-gí: ᠬᠦᠪᠢᠯᠠᠢ / Хубилай, 1215 nî 9 goe̍h 23 ji̍t – 1294 nî 2 goe̍h 18 ji̍t), Bông-kó͘-gí chun-hō hō choè Setsen Khan (ᠰᠡᠴᠡᠨ

Gregor Johann Mendel (1822 nî 7 goe̍h 20 – 1884 nî 1 goe̍h 6 hō) sī Ò-tē-lī Tè-kok ê sîn-hū kap kho-ha̍k-ka, I gián-kiù hôe-liân-tāu (Pisum sativum) ê cha̍p-chéng, chéng-lí chhut kok-chióng sèng-chit (trait) ê ûi-thôan kui-lu̍t, kiàn-li̍p liáu āu-lâi lâng hoat-tián hiān-tāi ûi-thôan-ha̍k ê ki-chhó͘.
Blaise Pascal sī Hoat-kok ê sò͘-ha̍k-ka, bu̍t-lí-ha̍k-ka kiam tiat-ha̍k-ka.

Jean-Baptiste Pierre Antoine de Monet, chevalier de Lamarck (1744 nî 8 goe̍h 1 ji̍t - 1829 nî 12 goe̍h 18 ji̍t) sī Hoat-kok ê phok-bu̍t-ha̍k-ka, i tùi si̍t-bu̍t-ha̍k kap tōng-bu̍t-ha̍k lóng-ū gián-kiù, sī chá-kî thê-chhut lí-lūn lâi kái-soeh seng-bu̍t ián-hòa ê lâng.
Honoré de Balzac sī Hoat-kok ê siáu-soat-ka kiam kio̍k-chok-ka.
Jean Calvin sī chong-kàu kái-kek tiong-kan ê 1 ê Hoat-kok Sin-kàu Sîn-ha̍k-ka.
Johannes Kepler (1571 nî 12 goe̍h 27 ji̍t - 1630 nî 11 goe̍h 15 ji̍t) sī Tek-kok ê sò͘-ha̍k-ka, thian-bûn-ha̍k-ka ia̍h chiam-chhiⁿ-ka, sī 17 sè-kí Kho-ha̍k Kek-bēng ê tāi-piáu jîn-bu̍t chit it.
Immanuel Kant (1724 nî 4 goe̍h 22 ji̍t - 1804 nî 2 goe̍h 12 ji̍t) sī Tek-kok ê thiat-ha̍k-ka.
Martin Luther (1483 nî 11 goe̍h 10 ji̍t - 1546 nî 2 goe̍h 18 ji̍t) sī Chong-kàu Kái-kek ê khí-thâu-chiá.
Homeros (Hi-lia̍p-gí: Ὅμηρος) sī kó͘-chá Hi-lia̍p sū-sū-si Ilias kap Odusseia ê chok-chiá, m̄-koh kiù-chin, hoān-sè bô-iáⁿ ū chit ê lâng.
Eukleides sī Hi-lia̍p ê sò͘-ha̍k-ka, tiāⁿ hông bat chò sī "kúi-hô-ha̍k ê khai-ki-chó͘".

Phín-chéng (-chióng), ū-sî kóng chéng, sī ka-thiok lāi-té gōa-piáu, hêng-ûi kap kî-tha sèng-chit kâng-khoán, jî-chhiá ê-tàng kap m̄ sio̍k pún phín-chéng ê kî-tha kâng bu̍t-chéng tōng-bu̍t ū it-tēng ê khu-pia̍t ê chi̍t kûn tōng-bu̍t.
Tommaso d'Aquino sī Italia ê sîn-hū, sîn-ha̍k-ka, tiat-ha̍k-ka.
Galileo Galilei (1564 nî 2 goe̍h 15 ji̍t Julius - 1642 nî 1 goe̍h 8 ji̍t Gregorius) sī Italia Toscana ê bu̍t-lí-ha̍k-ka, sò͘-ha̍k-ka ia̍h thian-bûn-ha̍k-ka.
Evangelista Torricelli (1608 nî 10 goe̍h 15 ji̍t - 1647 nî 10 goe̍h 25 ji̍t) sī Italia ê bu̍t-lí-ha̍k-ka kiam sò͘-ha̍k-ka, i sī khì-ap-kì ê hoat-bêng-chiá.
Chinggis Khaan (1662 nî – 1227 nî 8 goe̍h 18 ji̍t. Bông-kó͘-gí: ᠴᠢᠩᠭᠢᠰ
Timur sī Tu̍t-koat/Bông-kó͘ hē ê cheng-ho̍k-chiá, kiàn-li̍p liáu thóng-tī Pho-su kap Tiong-a tē-khu ê Timur Tè-kok.
Allāh sī A-la-pek-gí tùi Sîn ê choan-iú kiò-hoat, sī koàn-sû al- kap ʾilāh ê cho͘-ha̍p, goân-chhe ê ì-sù sī "Hit-ê Sîn".
Aristotélēs (Kó͘ Hi-lia̍p-gí: Ἀριστοτέλης. kong-goân chêng 384 nî – 322 nî 3 goe̍h 7), kó͘-chá ê Hi-lia̍p tiat-ha̍k-ka, Plato ê ha̍k-seng, Alexandros Tāi-tè ê sin-seⁿ.
Moro sī tiong-sè-kí sî-tāi tòa tī Iberia Poàn-tó (Se-pan-gâ kap Phû-tô-gâ), Sicilia, Malta, Maghreb kap Se-hui-chiu ê Muslim ki-bîn.
Albert Einstein he̍k-chiá A-ní-pek-te̍k Ài-in-su-thán (阿爾伯特·愛因斯坦) (1879 nî 3 goe̍h 14 – 1955 nî 4 goe̍h 18) sī Tek-kok chhut-sì ê lí-lūn bu̍t-lí-ha̍k-ka.

Georg Friedrich Bernhard Riemann (1826 nî 9 goe̍h 17 – 1866 nî 7 goe̍h 20) sī éng-koè Tek-kok ê sò͘-ha̍k-ka, tùi hun-sek-ha̍k kap bî-hun kí-hô-ha̍k ū toā kòng-hiàn, mā thè it-poaⁿ siong-tùi-lūn pho͘ hó lō͘.
Nicolaus Copernicus (1473 nî 2 goe̍h 19 – 1543 nî 5 goe̍h 24) sī Au-chiu thian-bûn-ha̍k-ka. i chhoā-thâu thê-chhut ji̍t-thâu chò tiong-sim ê kho-ha̍k ú-tiū-lūn.

column2: ['elizabeth 1-sè', 'elizabeth i', 'elizabeth i of england', 'england ê elizabeth 1-sè', 'liân-ha̍p ông-kok ê tē i ê elizabeth']
column3: Elizabeth 1-sè sī 1558 nî 11 goe̍h 17 ji̍t kàu i koè-sin ê Eng-lân Kok-ông kap Ài-jú-lân Kok-ông, i sī Tudor ông-tiâu ê tē-5-ê kap siāng bóe ê chi̍t-ê kun-chú.
Dmitrij Ivanovič Mendeleev sī Tobolsk chhut-sì ê Lō͘-se-a hòa-ha̍k-ka, sī tē-it-ê hoat-bêng hòa-ha̍k gôan-sò͘ ê chiu-kî-piáu ê lâng.

Anton Pavlovich Chekhov (Lō͘-se-a-gí: Анто́н Па́влович Че́хов, IPA: [ʌnˈton ˈpavləvʲɪtɕ ˈtɕɛxəf], 1860 nî 1 goe̍h 29 ji̍t – 1904 nî 7 goe̍h 15 ji̍t) sī Lō͘-se-a ê té-phiⁿ siáu-soat (short story) chok-ka kiam ke̍k-chok-ka.

Lenin (Lō͘-se-a-gí: Ленин, 1870 nî 4 goe̍h 22 ji̍t – 1924 nî 1 goe̍h 21 ji̍t), pún-miâ Vladimir Ilyich Ulyanov (Владимир Ильич Ульянов), sī Lō͘-se-a ê kek-bēng-ka kap chèng-tī-ka, Cha̍p-goe̍h Kek-bēng ê chí-tō-jîn.
Fyodor Mikhailovich Dostoevsky sī sè-kài bûn-ha̍k kap Lō͘-se-a bûn-ha̍k chin tiōng-iàu ê 1 ê chok-ka.

Ivan Petrović Pavlov (Lō͘-se-a-gí: Иван Петрович Павлов. 1849 nî 9 goe̍h 14 – 1936 nî 2 goe̍h 27) sī Lō͘-se-a ê seng-lí-ha̍k-ka, sim-lí-ha̍k-ka kap i-ha̍k-ka, in-ūi tùi siau-hòa hē-thóng ê gián-kiù, tī 1904 nî tit-tio̍h Nobel Seng-lí-ha̍k I-ha̍k Chióng.

Iosif Vissarionovich Stalin (Lō͘-se-a-gí: Ио́сиф Виссарио́нович Ста́лин. Gruzia-gí: იოსებ ბესრიონის სტალინი. 1878 nî 12 goe̍h 18 ji̍t – 1953 nî 3 goe̍h 5 ji̍t), pún-miâ Iosif Vissarionovich Dzhugashvili (Gruzia-gí: იოსებ ბესარიონის ძე ჯუღაშვილი), sī 1922 nî kàu 1953 nî ê So͘-liân Kiōng-sán-tóng Tiong-iong Úi-ôan-hōe Chóng-su-kì, sī So͘-liân Kiōng-sán-tóng chham So͘-liân ê léng-tō-jîn.
Chú-hū, iā hō-chò ka-têng chú-hū, sī tī chhù-lāi choan-chit chiàu-kò͘ ka-têng ê í-hun cha-bó͘-lâng.
Thoân-thóng ê thoân-kàu-sū sī 1 ūi soan-thoân chong-kàu kàu-gī ê lâng, le̍k-sú-siōng chú-iàu iû cha-po͘-lâng lâi tam-jīm.

Tâu-chu-chiá kā chu-kim chò-ûi chhun-ê siā-hōe chu-goân, thàu-kòe tâu-chu-chiá tâu-chu, kā chu-kim hōe-chi̍p kàu siā-hōe tiōng-iàu sán-gia̍p khoân-chiat tiong, chhòng-chō châi-hù mā hun-tam hong-hiám kap siu-ek.
Kiàn-tio̍k-su sī choan-bûn teh siat-kè kiàn-tio̍k-bu̍t pêng-bīn-tô͘ ê choan-gia̍p jîn-sū.
Hui-hêng-oân (Hàn-jī: 飛行員. pe̍h-ōe: poe-hêng-oân) sī chi̍t khoán choan-bûn teh kà-sú hâng-khong-ki ê chit-gia̍p jîn-oân.
Hōe-kè-su (hàn-jī: 會計師) sī choan-bûn teh chhú-lí châi-bū, hōe-kè, sêng-pún, sím-kè, sòe-bū, tâu-chu kap koán-lí téng-téng sū-bū ê chit-gia̍p.
Wright sī chi̍t ê jī-sèⁿ.
Im-ga̍k-ka (音樂家) sī chi̍t ê kóng-hoat ê bêng-sû, chiū-sī choan-bûn tī im-ga̍k léng-he̍k kang-chok ê chi̍t khóan gē-su̍t-ka.
Gay sī tùi Eng-gí khí-goân ê tan-jī, chí tông-sèng-loân-chiá he̍k-chiá sī ū tông-sèng-loân sèng-chit ê lâng.
Kun-jîn (Hàn-jī: 軍人) sī chi̍t chióng tī kok-ka kun-tūi ho̍k-ia̍h ê chit-gia̍p. pau-hâm kun-koaⁿ kap peng-á.
Thong-e̍k-khì sī kóng ē-tàng ti̍t-chia̍p chip-hêng iōng bó͘ khoán thêng-sek giân-gí ia̍h kha-pún giân-gí siá--ê chí-lēng ê chi̍t khoán tiān-náu thêng-sek.
Kang-lâng sī chiông-sū bó͘ chióng chit-gia̍p ê lô-tōng-chiá.
Sió-soat-ka, mā tha̍k-chò siáu-soat-ka, sī siá-chok sió-soat ê lâng.
Kio̍k-chok-ka sī choan-bûn chiông-sū hì-kio̍k bûn-ha̍k siá-chok ê chok-ka.

column2: ['sîn-sèng lô-má hông-tè', 'lô-má-lâng ê hông-tè', 'sîn sèng lô má hông tè', 'sînsèng lômá hôngtè']
column3: Sîn-sèng Lô-má Hông-tè, goân La-teng-gí kóng Romanorum Imperator, ì-sù sī "Lô-má-lâng ê Hông-tè".
Miguel de Cervantes y Saavedra (IPA: [miˈɣel ðe θerˈβantes saˈβeðra], 1547 nî 9 goe̍h 29 – 1616 nî 4 goe̍h 23) sī Se-pan-gâ ê siáu-soat-ka, si-jîn kiam ke̍k-chok-ka (playwright).
Herodotos
Mí-le̍k-hu̍t tī Hu̍t-kàu lāi-té sī Sek-khia-mô͘-nî-hu̍t ê kè-jīm--chiá.
Chóng-thóng (Eng-gí: President) sī kiōng-hô-kok kok-ka ê thâu-lâng, it-poaⁿ-tek lâi-kóng chóng-thóng sī soán-kí sán-seng--ê.
Kong-lo̍k-sī sī Tiong-kok kó͘-chá sî-tāi teh chiáng-koán chia̍h-mi̍h ê koaⁿ-liâu ki-kò͘.
Khalifah sī I-su-lân-kàu kok-ka thâu-lâng ê 1 chióng chheng-hō.
Michael Faraday (1791 nî 9 goe̍h 22 ji̍t - 1867 nî 8 goe̍h 25 ji̍t) sī Eng-kok ê hòa-ha̍k-ka ia̍h bu̍t-lí-ha̍k-ka (hit-tong-sî bu̍t-lí-ha̍k hō-chòe "chū-jiân thiat-ha̍k").
Neil Alden Armstrong sī Bí-kok ê hûi-hêng-ka kiam thài-khong-jîn.
Ti-sū (Hàn-jī: 知事) sī chi̍t-chióng tē-hng siú-tiúⁿ ê chheng-ho͘.
Kàu-hông ia̍h Kàu-chong, Latin-gí hō chòe papa, sī Lô-má Thian-chú-kàu ê léng-tō, mā-sī Vaticano ê gôan-siú.
Mô͘-se (Hi-pek-lâi-gí: מֹשֶׁה‎/Moše. Hi-lia̍p-gí: Mωϋσῆς/Mōüsēs) sī Hi-pek-lâi Sèng-keng só͘ kì ê chong-kàu léng-siù.
Sin-pū (新婦) sī kiáⁿ ê bó͘.
Panchen Lama (Chōng-gí: པན་ཆེན་བླ་མ) sī Se-chōng Hu̍t-kàu Gelug-phài--ê 1--ê choán-sè thoân-sêng--ê tulku (hoa̍t-hu̍t).

column2: ['goân-siú', 'kok-ka ê thâu-lâng', 'goân siú', 'goânsiú', 'head of state', 'kok-ka siú-náu']
column3: Goân-siú (元首, Eng-gí: head of state) sī kok-ka ê hiàn-hoat kui-tēng ê, iā-sī gōa-kok chèng-hú gōa-kau-te̍k sêng-jīn ê, tāi-piáu kok-ka ê thâu 1 ê lâng.
Sèng-tàn Lāu-lâng (Ló-jîn) sī ùi Se-hng khai-sí liû-thôan ê 1-ê thôan-soat jîn-bu̍t, kóng i ta̍k-nî ē sì-kè sàng lé-mi̍h hō· gín-á, it-poaⁿ sī tī Sèng-tàn-cheh hit-chām-á.
Hông-tè sī chi̍t khoán kun-chú, it-poaⁿ sī siāng koân ūi ê thóng-tī-chiá.
Iú-koan kî-tha hō-chò "Má-lī-a" ê jîn-bu̍t, chhiáⁿ chham-khó Má-lī-a.
Bí-kok chóng-thóng sī Bí-kok ê chóng-thóng, mā sī Bí-kok ê kok-ka goân-siú, chèng-hú siú-náu kap pō͘-tūi choè ko chú-soè.

column2: ['siú-siòng', '总理', '總理', '首相', 'chhoā-thâu ê pō·-tiúⁿ', 'chhoā-thâu ê pō͘-tiúⁿ', 'chhōa-thâu ê pō·-tiúⁿ', 'chhōa-thâu ê pō͘-tiúⁿ', 'chóng-lí', 'niá-thâu ê pō·-tiúⁿ', 'siú-siōng']
column3: Tī ū lōe-koh (cabinet) ê chèng-hú, chhoā-thâu ê pō͘-tiúⁿ kiò-chò chóng-lí. nā-sī kok-ka ê thâu-lâng sī ông (ū hiàn-hoat ê ông-kok. m̄-sī kiōng-hô-kok), mā ū kā chóng-lí kiò siú-siòng.
Tiong-kian-chhiú (Hàn-jī: 中堅手. Eng-gí: center fielder. sok-siá tāi-bé: CF. kì-lo̍k tāi-bé: 8), iā hō-chò tiong gōa-iá-chhiú (中外野手), sī tī iá-kiû pí-sài tiong, hū-chek hông-siú tiong-gōa-iá ê kiû-oân.
Chó-e̍k-chhiú (Hàn-jī: 左翼手. Eng-gí: left fielder. sok-siá tāi-bé: LF. kì-lo̍k tāi-bé: 7), iā hō-chò chó gōa-iá-chhiú (左外野手), sī tī iá-kiû pí-sài tiong, hū-chek hông-siú chó-gōa-iá ê kiû-oân.
Iū-e̍k-chhiú (Hàn-jī: 右翼手. Eng-gí: right fielder. sok-siá tāi-bé: RF. kì-lo̍k tāi-bé: 9), iā hō-chò iū gōa-iá-chhiú (右外野手), sī tī iá-kiû pí-sài tiong, hū-chek hông-siú iū-gōa-iá ê kiû-oân.
Khu-pia̍t: Ông sī chi̍t-ê hàn-jī sèⁿ.
Kun-chú, ia̍h sī kun-ông, sī kun-chú-chè ê kok-ka léng-siù, ū chin chē bô kâng ê chheng-hō, chhan-chhiūⁿ ông, kong, hông-tè téng-téng.
Siōng-tè choán-lâi chia, kî-tha ì-sù chhiáⁿ chham-khó "Siōng-tè (khu-pia̍t-ia̍h)".
Vishnu sī Ìn-tō͘-kàu ê 3-tōa sîn-bêng chi it, sī pó-hō͘-chiá, kî-tiong Vishnu-phài sìn i sī siāng koân ūi ê Sîn.

Pharaoh (Sèng-keng Hi-pek-lâi-gí: פרעה par‘ōh. Hi-lia̍p-gí: φαραώ pharaō) he̍k-chiá hoan-e̍k chò Hoat-ló (法老) ia̍h-sī Hoat-ló-ông (法老王), sī Kó͘ Ai-ki̍p ê kok-ông hâm-thâu, it-tī sú-iōng kàu Hi-lia̍p-hòa sî-tâi chìn-chêng.

Sam-it (Latin-gí: Trinitas, Eng-gí: Trinity), Sam-it-sîn, he̍k-chiá kóng Sam-ūi It-thé, sī Ki-tok-kàu ê kài-liām, jīn-ûi Sîn (he̍k-chiá kóng Siōng-tè) ū saⁿ khoán sin-hūn he̍k-chiá piáu-hiān, iā-chiū-sī Pē, Kiáⁿ (Ia-so͘) kap Sèng-lêng.
Sin-pū (新婦) sī kiáⁿ ê bó͘.
Thomas Hunt Morgan (1866 nî 9 goe̍h 25 ji̍t - 1945 nî 12 goe̍h 4 ji̍t) sī Bí-kok ê seng-bu̍t-ha̍k-ka.
John von Neumann sī Hông-gâ-lī chhut-sin ê bí-kok sò͘-ha̍k-ka.
Marco Polo sī Italia ê seng-lí-lâng, lú-hêng-ká.
Richard Milhous Nixon sī Bí-kok tē-37-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-46 chham tē-47-kài, 1969 nî 1 goe̍h 20 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1974 nî 8 goe̍h 9 ji̍t sià-jīm.
George Herbert Walker Bush sī Bí-kok tē-41-ê chóng-thóng, jīm-kî sī tē-51-kài, 1989 nî 1 goe̍h 20 ji̍t chiūⁿ-jīm, 1993 nî 1 goe̍h 20 ji̍t sià-jīm.
Chok-ka (Hàn-jī: 作家) sī kā siá-chok tòng-chòe chit-gia̍p ê lâng.
Friedrich Engels sī Tek-kok ê siā-hōe-ha̍k-ka kap thiat-ha̍k-ka, i chham Karl Marx sī kiōng-sán-chú-gī lí-lūn ê chhòng-sí-jîn, chò-hóe hoat-piáu Kiōng-sán-tóng Soan-giân.
Pîⁿ-bīn (Hàn-jī: 平面. Eng-bûn: Plane)
Tōa-îⁿ (Hàn-jī: 大圓), tōa-îⁿ-kho·-á (Hàn-jī: 大圓箍仔) sī kiû-thé piáu-bīn ê 1-chióng te̍k-sû ê îⁿ.
Chiàⁿ lio̍k-biān-thé (正六面體. hexahedron) sī iû 6-ê chiàⁿ-hong-hêng pêng-bīn só͘ chó͘-sêng ê chiàⁿ to-biān-thé.

Ti̍t-chōa he̍k-chiá kóng ti̍t-soàⁿ, tī sò͘-ha̍k kap kúi-hô-ha̍k tang-tiong ê ì-sù, sī pêng-bīn ia̍h khong-kan lāi-té tùi nn̄g-ê tiám tēng-gī chhut--lâi ê bô oan-khiau ê chōa, in bô tn̂g-tō͘ kap khoah-tō͘ ê sèng-chi̍t.
Ke̍k-khian (極圈. Eng-bûn: polar circle) sī lâm-pak-hūi ê 66.5° hūi-soàⁿ.
Soaⁿ-niā, iā thang kóng pun-chúi, sī hun-kheh kīn-oá liû-he̍k ê tē-lí ê chū-jiân kài-soàⁿ.

Ti̍t-chōa he̍k-chiá kóng ti̍t-soàⁿ, tī sò͘-ha̍k kap kúi-hô-ha̍k tang-tiong ê ì-sù, sī pêng-bīn ia̍h khong-kan lāi-té tùi nn̄g-ê tiám tēng-gī chhut--lâi ê bô oan-khiau ê chōa, in bô tn̂g-tō͘ kap khoah-tō͘ ê sèng-chi̍t.
Chhàu-oân he̍k-chiá chiuⁿ-ló-oân sī chi̍t-khoán iōng-lâi pó-chûn saⁿ-á-khò͘ ê hòa-ha̍k siong-phín.
Kiû-bīn sī chi̍t khóan tùi-chheng ê kí-hô hêng-thé.
To-biān-thé (多面體. polyhedron) sī tī sam-chhù-goân tiong, iû pêng-biān kap ti̍t-soàⁿ lâi cho͘-sêng ê kí-hô hêng-thé.
Sûi-ti̍t (垂直. perpendicular) sī chi̍t ê kí-hô-ha̍k ê su̍t-gú.
Chú-ngó͘-sòaⁿ (子午線. Eng-bûn: meridian), iā hō-chò keng-sòaⁿ (經線), sī liân-kiat tē-kiû lióng-ke̍k ê ká-sióng sòaⁿ. tô͘-tiong ē kap chhiah-tō iáu-ū hūi-sòaⁿ ti̍t-kak sio-chhé.
Chhiah-tō sī 1 tiâu sióng-siōng ê îⁿ-kèng-soàⁿ, kho· tī 1 lia̍p hêng-seng ê lâm-pak-ke̍k ê tiong-ng ūi-tī. hit tah ê tē-bīn kap tńg-se̍h ê te̍k-sim (axis of rotation) pêng-hêng.
Kiû-bīn sī chi̍t khóan tùi-chheng ê kí-hô hêng-thé.

Chiàⁿ to-biān-thé (正多面體), iā hō-chò Plato li̍p-thé, sī ta̍k-ê pêng-biān lóng sī choân-téng ê chiàⁿ to-pian-hêng jî-chhiáⁿ múi-chi̍t ê téng-tiám só͘ chiap ê pêng-biān ê sò͘-liōng iā lóng pêⁿ chē ê tu̍t to-biān-thé.
Thài-khong sī ú-tiū tiong thian-thé tāi-khì-chân goā-kháu ê khong-kan.

column2: ['kīn-ji̍t-tiám kap oán-ji̍t-tiám', 'kīn-ji̍t-tiám', 'kīn ji̍t tiám kap oán ji̍t tiám', 'kīnji̍ttiám kap oánji̍ttiám', 'oán-ji̍t-tiám']
column3: Kīn-ji̍t-tiám kap oán-ji̍t-tiám siong-tùi, hun-pia̍t sī he̍k-chheⁿ, sió-he̍k-chheⁿ, tn̂g-bóe-chheⁿ téng-téng thian-thé tī kok-chū ê kúi-tō téng, lī tiong-sim ê Thài-iông siāng-kīn kap siāng-hn̄g ê 2-ê tiám.
Pak-ke̍k sī he̍k-chheⁿ siōng pak ê tiám.
Tē-kiû téng ê Lâm-ke̍k hun Chû-tiûⁿ Lâm-ke̍k kap Tē-lí Lâm-ke̍k, ū-sî "Lâm-ke̍k" mā chí Lâm-ke̍k-chiu.
Pirineo Soaⁿ-lêng, tiàm tī Au-chiu tāi-lio̍k sai-lâm ê soaⁿ-lêng, sī Hoat-kok kap Se-pan-gâ ê thian-jiân piⁿ-kài, mā sī Iberia Poàn-tó sio-chiap tāi-lio̍k chú-thé ê só͘-chāi.
Tē-lí-ha̍k kap tē-kiû kho-ha̍k lāi-té kóng ê koân-phiâⁿ, sī 1-tè khah-koân--khí-lâi ê khu-he̍k, chit-ê khu-he̍k ê téng-kôan, khah khui-khoah mā khah pêⁿ-tháⁿ.
Soaⁿ sī pí sì-chiu-ûi khah koân ê tē-hêng, pēng-chhiá ài ū it-tēng ê kôaⁿ-tō͘ kha ē hong hō chò soaⁿ, chóng-sī bô it-tēng piau-chún.
Peng-soaⁿ sī pû tī chúi-bīn-siōng ê peng, it-poaⁿ sī tùi peng-hô ia̍h-sī peng-pêⁿ hun-lia̍t chō-sêng
Alpes sī Au-chiu ê chi̍t-ê soaⁿ-khu, hoān-ûi tùi tang-pêng ê Tang-kok kap Slovenia, koè Italia, Sūi-se, Liechtenstein kap Tek-kok, kàu se-pêng ê Hoat-kok.
Gibraltar (IPA: dʒɨˈbrɒltər) sī Liân-ha̍p Ông-kok ê 1-tè hái-gōa léng-thó͘, tiàm-tī Europa sai-lâm, sio-tú Se-pan-gâ ê lâm hái-hōaⁿ.
Rushmore Soaⁿ
Chomolangma Hong (Qomolangma Hong) sī Tē-kiû téng-koân siōng koân ê soaⁿ, soaⁿ-niā lâm-pêng sī Nepal, pak-pêng sī Tibet.
K2 Hong sī Tē-kiû téng-koân tē 2 koân ê soaⁿ, ū 8,611 m koân, kan-taⁿ su hō͘ Chomolangma Hong.
Logan Soaⁿ (Eng-gí: Mount Logan) sī Canada thōng koân ê soaⁿ, koân-tō· 5959 kong-chhioh.
Himalaya soaⁿ-lêng ūi tī Ìn-tō͘ chhù-tāi-lio̍k, keh khui liáu Ìn-tō͘-hô Hêng-hô Pêng-goân kap Se-chōng Ko-goân.
Adirondack Soaⁿ-lêng sī Bí-kok New York Chiu tang-pak-pō͘ ê chi̍t lia̍p soaⁿ-lêng. it-poaⁿ lóng kā i khoàⁿ chò sī Appalachia Soaⁿ-lêng ê chi̍t pō͘-hūn.

Appalachia Soaⁿ-lêng (Eng-gí: Appalachian Mountains ia̍h the Appalachians. Hoat-gí: les Appalaches) só͘-chāi tī Pak Bí-chiu ê tang-pō͘, tōa-pō͘-hūn sio̍k tī Bí-kok, oa̍h pak sió hūn tī Canada kok-lāi.
Saint Elias Soaⁿ-lêng sī Pak Bí-chiu ê chi̍t-ê soaⁿ-lêng, tiàm tī Alaska tang-lâm-pō· ê Wrangell-St.
Catskill Soaⁿ sī Bí-kok New York Chiu se-lâm-bīn ê chi̍t phìⁿ koân-phiâⁿ só͘-chāi.
San-ô͘-chiau sī 1 khoán seng-bu̍t khí-chō ê àm-chiau, tī jia̍t-tài tē-khu ê hái-chúi-té ū-tè-chhōe.
Soa-lūn sī chi̍t khoán soa tui--chhut-lâi ê sió-soaⁿ (lūn), sán-seng ê in-sò͘ ū khó-lêng sī chúi-liû he̍k-chiá hong-chhoe.
Soaⁿ-me̍h ia̍h soaⁿ-lêng, soaⁿ-hē, sī tē-lí-ha̍k-siōng chi̍t khoán soaⁿ-hong sio-liâm ê tē-khu.
Peng-hô sī ē siông-sî sóa-tāng ê ba̍t-cha̍t ê peng-thé, sán-seng tī lo̍h-seh chek kah chhiau-kòe in seng-hoa kap iûⁿ-hòa sok-tō͘ ê só͘-chāi, kòe-têng tiāⁿ-tiāⁿ su-iàu kúi--a pah tang.
Kàiⁿ-hioh-chôaⁿ (Eng-gí: geyser) sī chi̍t khoán chúi-chôaⁿ, in bí chi̍t chhù chhèng chúi kiam phùn ian liáu-āu, ài keh chi̍t tōaⁿ sî-kan chiah koh chhèng āu chi̍t pái.
Hái-po͘ (海埔) he̍k-chiá soa-po͘ (沙埔) sī iû hái-chúi poaⁿ-ūn tui-chek ê tui-chek-bu̍t, it-poaⁿ sī soa ia̍h-sī chio̍h, chòe-āu chiâⁿ-chò hái-kîⁿ ê chi̍t pō͘-hūn.
Khí-lông he̍k khí-thò, chèng-sek miâ-chheng sī kò·-tēng kio̍k-pō· ké-chhùi-khí (fixed partial denture), sī khí-kho-i siat-kè kap khí-bô· ki-su̍t-goân chè-chō ê ké-chhùi-khí.

Midway Khoân-chiau (Eng-gí: Midway Atoll, Midway Islands), tiàm-tī pak Thài-pêng-iûⁿ ê 1-ê khoân-chiau, téng-koân ū kúi-nā-ê soaⁿ-á-tó, kî-tiong siāng tōa--ê sī Soa-tó (Sand Island) kap Tang-tó (Eastern Island).
Thiⁿ-téng (天頂) ia̍h-sī thian-khong (天空), kán-tan hō-chò thian (天) kap thiⁿ (天), sī tāi-khì-chân kap thài-khong ē-ēng pī thian-thé pián-biān ê lâng koan-chhek tio̍h ê pō͘-hūn.
Thian-kiû sī ká-sióng ê chi̍t-ê kiû-bīn, tùi tē-kiû chòe tiong-sim, hiòng thian-khong koan-chhat khòaⁿ-kìⁿ ê thian-thé, lóng pâi-lia̍t tī thian-kiû ê piáu-biān.
Rocky Soaⁿ-lêng (Eng-gí: Rocky Mountains, Rockies) sī Pak Bí-chiu sai-pō· ê soaⁿ-lêng.
Grand Canyon sī Bí-kok Arizona chiu lāi Colorado Kang chhiat--chhut-lâi ê chi̍t-ê kiā-piah soaⁿ-phāng, ū 277 mai tn̂g, 18 mai khoah, chhiau-kòe 1 mai ê chhim.
Hái-kîⁿ, ia̍h-sī hái-hoāⁿ, sī lio̍k-tē chham hái ia̍h-sī hái-iûⁿ kau-chiap ê só͘-chāi.
Chhùi-koà (Latin-gí: Palatum) sī ko-téng chek-chui tōng-bu̍t chhùi-khiuⁿ ê téng-bīn koà, mā keh chhut phīⁿ-khiuⁿ khong-kan, tùi lâng kóng-oē kap chia̍h mi̍h-kiāⁿ chin tiōng-iàu.

Alzheimer pēⁿ, Hàn-bûn kiò A-chu-hái-be̍k-chèng, sī chi̍t chióng hoat-pēⁿ chìn-têng bān, sûi sî-kan put-toān ok-hòa ê sîn-keng thè-hòa chiòng-gāi. chit khoán pēⁿ chiàm sit-tì-chèng sêng-in ê 60% chì 70%.
It-hu-to-chhe-chè sī chi̍t ê cha-po͘-lâng ē-tàng tông-sî chhoā chhiau-kòe chi̍t ê bó͘ ê ka-cho̍k kap hun-in che-tō͘.
Siā-hōe tē-ūi (社會地位) tī siā-hōe-ha̍k kap jîn-lūi-ha̍k siōng, sī kóng chi̍t ê lâng tī i chûn-chāi ê siā-hōe siōng, in-ūi pún-sin ê siā-hōe kai-chân só͘ lâi tit-tio̍h ê bêng-ū kap seng-bōng.
Bû-bêng sī m̄-chai hêng-tōng-chiá ê hō-miâ ê chōng-hóng.
Thóng-kè-ha̍k sī 1 chióng sò͘-ha̍k ke-si, ēng lâi siu-chi̍p, hun-sek, kái-soeh, hām têng-hiān chu-liāu. kin-kì hun-sek ê kiat-kó, ē-tàng chò khah ha̍p-lí ê kiat-lūn hām koat-chhek.
Kho-ha̍k sī iōng kho-ha̍k-te̍k hoat-tō͘ lâi kiàn-li̍p ê chai-bat ê hē-thóng.
Sò͘-ha̍k tiāⁿ hông khoàⁿ-chò sī leh gián-kiù sò͘-liōng, kiat-kò͘, khong-kan kap piàn-tōng ê ha̍k-būn.
San Potito Ultra sī Italia Campania toā-khu Avellino Séng ê chi̍t ê comune.
Tē-chit-ha̍k sī gián-kiù tē-kiû ê chi̍t-ê ha̍k-kho, choan-bûn thàm-thó tē-kiû téng-bīn bu̍t-thé ê chó͘-sêng, kò͘-chō, tōng-thài, le̍k-sú kap kòe-têng.
Piān-chèng, ia̍h sī piān-chèng hoat, sī thám-thó būn-tê ê chi̍t khoán hong-hoat.
Chhiau-oa̍t-chú-gī (Eng-gí: transcendentalism) sī 19 sè-kí tī Bí-kok Sin England tē-tài hêng-sêng ê 1-ê chong-kàu tiat-ha̍k kiam bûn-ha̍k ūn-tōng.
Seng-bu̍t tē-lí-ha̍k (Eng-gí: biogeography) sī ián-kiù seng-bu̍t ê tē-lí hun-pò͘ kap soàⁿ-pò͘ koè-têng téng ha̍k-būn ê ha̍k-kho, sī seng-bu̍t-ha̍k ê hun-chi.
Khì-siōng-ha̍k (Hàn-jī: 氣象學) sī gián-kiù tāi-khì hiān-siōng pēng-chhiá ké-soeh kî-tiong goân-lí ê kho-ha̍k.

Chia sī kài-siāu tē-lí kho-ha̍k, nā koan-hē hong-súi ê ì-sù, khòaⁿ tē-lí .Tē-lí ia̍h sī tē-lí-ha̍k sī chi̍t mn̂g ha̍k-būn, choan-bûn gián-kiù Tē-kiû téng iû-kî tē-piáu ê sèng-chit, oa̍h-mi̍h ê khiā-khí chêng-hêng, ia̍h sī kok chióng ê hiān-siōng.
Liû-thé le̍k-ha̍k (Eng-bûn: Fluid mechanics) sī bu̍t-lí-ha̍k ê chi̍t-ê hun-chi, choan-bûn teh gián-kiù thàm-thó liû-thé (e̍k-thé, khì-thé, kap tiān-lî-thé) kap chok-iōng tī in téng-bīn ê la̍t.
Khó-kó͘-ha̍k sī gián-kiù kó͘-chá jîn-lūi oa̍h-tāng ê ha̍k-būn, chú-iàu hong-sek sī chhōe chhut jî-chhiá hun-sek kòe-khì jîn-kûn ê khì-bu̍t bûn-hòa kap khoân-kéng chu-liāu.
Kó͘-seng-bu̍t-ha̍k (古生物學. Eng-gú: paleontology) sī chi̍t mn̂g teh gián-kiù kó͘-chá tē-chit sî-tāi tiong ê seng-bu̍t kap in-ê hoat-tián ê seng-bu̍t-ha̍k hun-chi.
Seng-thài-ha̍k sī leh gián-kiù seng-thài-hē (ecosystem) ê kho-ha̍k, khiā kóng oa̍h-mi̍h kap i khiā-khí ê chū-jiân khoân-kéng chái-iūⁿ hō͘-tōng (interaction).
Tōng-bu̍t-ha̍k sī chi̍t-ê choan-bûn gián-kiù tōng-bu̍t seⁿ-sèng ê seng-bu̍t-ha̍k hun-ki, thàm-thó tōng-bu̍ ê kò͘-chō, ki-lêng, hêng-ûi, hun-lūi kap ián-hòa téng-téng.
Ûi-thoân-ha̍k sī seng-bu̍t-ha̍k ê ki-chhó͘ ha̍k-kho chi it, choân-bûn ián-kiù seng-bu̍t ê ûi-thoân-chú, ûi-thoân, koh ū oa̍h-mi̍h chi kan ê chha-piat.
Edward Wadie Said sī 1-ê chhut-miâ ê bûn-ha̍k lí-lūn ha̍k-chiá kiam phêng-lūn-ka.
Bî-seng-bu̍t-ha̍k (eng.
Si̍t-bu̍t-ha̍k sī chi̍t-ê choan-bûn gián-kiù si̍t-bu̍t seⁿ-sèng ê seng-bu̍t-ha̍k hun-ki, tû-liáu si̍t-bu̍t í-gōa, si̍t-bu̍t-ha̍k thôan-thóng-siōng ê gián-kiù tùi-siōng mā-ū khún-lūi kap chó-lūi.
Siā-hōe kho-ha̍k lāi-bīn mā-ū "cho͘-chit-ha̍k", ia̍h-tio̍h-sī cho͘-chit-lūn.
Hun-chú seng-bu̍t-ha̍k (molecular biology) sī tùi seng-bu̍t tī hun-chú chân-bīn ê gián-kiù, sī seng-bu̍t-ha̍k kap hòa-ha̍k ê khòa-ha̍k-kho ê kho-ha̍k.

Chin-khún-ha̍k (真菌學. Eng-gú: mycology) sī chi̍t mn̂g choan-bûn teh gián-kiù chin-khún ê seng-bu̍t-ha̍k hun-chi, thàm-thó chit lūi seng-bu̍t ê ûi-thoân-ha̍k, seng-hoà-ha̍k kap hun-lūi-ha̍k. lēng-goā iáu-koh ū chin-khún tùi jîn-lūi ê iōng-tô͘ kap gûi-hiám, chhin-chhiūⁿ hóe-chéng, io̍h-bu̍t, chia̍h-mi̍h, tiòng-to̍k kap kám-jiám téng-téng.

Bu̍t-lí hòa-ha̍k (物理化學. Eng-bûn: physical chemistry) sī chi̍t bûn lī-iōng bu̍t-lí-ha̍k ê hoat-chek kap kài-liām lâi gián-kiù hòa-ha̍k léng-he̍k ê hông-koan, goân-chú, a-goân-chú, iáu-ū lia̍p hiān-siōng ê ha̍k-kho.

Jîn-kang tì-lêng (Eng-gí: artificial intelligence) sī chí jîn-kang (artificial) ê mi̍h piáu-hiān--chhut-lâi ê tì-lêng (intelligence), tiāⁿ chiàu Eng-gí ê sok-siá siá chò AI. Tiān-náu kho-ha̍k, sim-lí-ha̍k kap kang-têng-ha̍k lóng ū leh gián-kiù AI, gián-kiù ki-khì chái-iūⁿ ha̍k-si̍p (learning), chái-iūⁿ sek-èng (adaptation), chái-iūⁿ piáu-hiān khiáu-khiáu ê hêng-ûi (behavior).

Hêng-hoa̍t-ha̍k (刑罰學) sī hoān-chōe-ha̍k kap hoat-lu̍t-ha̍k ê siong-koan ha̍k-būn, choan-bûn thàm-thó tùi hoān-chōe ê chhù-lí hong-sek kiam tùi kaⁿ-ga̍k siat-si ê koán-lí, pâu-hâm lí-lūn kap si̍t-hêng.
Gê-chiu-pēⁿ-ha̍k (Hàn-jī: 牙周病學, Eng-gí: Periodontology) sī gê-kho kho-ha̍k ê 1 mn̂g ha̍k-būn.
Bán-chhùi-khí (extraction) sī kā chhùi-khí ùi chhùi--nih î-tû--chhut-lâi.
Khí-go̍k kiáu-chèng-ha̍k (orthodontics) sī Gê-i-ha̍k 1-ê choan-kho, gián-kiù kap tī-liâu chhùi-khí pâi-lia̍t bô-chiàⁿ ê būn-tê.

Tiān-náu kho-ha̍k (Eng-gí: computer science) ia̍h kè-sǹg-ki kho-ha̍k, sī leh gián-kiù chu-sìn (information) kap kè-sǹg (computation) ê lí-lūn ki-chhó͘, khoàⁿ tiàm tī tiān-náu hē-thóng téng-koân beh chái-iūⁿ lâi si̍t-hiān kap èng-iōng chiah-ê lí-lūn.
Huà-ha̍k kang-tîng (kán-tshing Huà-kang) sī kang-tîng ha̍k-būn ê tsi̍t ê hun-tsi.
Pán-khoài kò͘-chō (板塊構造. plate tectonics) sī ūi-tio̍h beh kái-soeh tāi-lio̍k sóa-tāng hiān-siōng só͘ hoat-tián chhut-lâi ê chi̍t ê tē-chit-ha̍k lí-lūn.
Hoé-soaⁿ-ha̍k sī chi̍t bûn choan-bûn gián-kiù hoé-soaⁿ, iông-gâm, gâm-chiuⁿ kap siong-koan tē-chit hiān-siōng ê kho-ha̍k ha̍k-būn.
Pang-bô͘:Kûn-lūn Tī sò͘-ha̍k, kûn-lūn (group theory) sī thiu-siōng tāi-sò͘ ê 1 ki hun-ki, choan-tô͘ leh gián-kiù kûn (group).
Ùi tāī-sò͘ ham kí-hô-ha̍k hoat-tián--lâi ê bî-chek-hun (微積分 ,calculus) sī sò͘-ha̍k chin tiōng-iàu ê 1 ê hun-ki.

Liû-hêng-pēⁿ-ha̍k (流行病學. Eng-gú: epidemiology) sī chi̍t mn̂g teh thàm-thó éng-hióng jîn-lūi kûn-thé kiān-khong kap chi̍t-pēⁿ ê ha̍k-būn, iā sī kong-kiōng ōe-seng kap ī-hông i-ha̍k ê ha̍k-būn hoân-chio̍h.
Sîn-keng-ha̍k (Eng-gí: neurology), he̍k-chiá sîn-keng-kho, sîn-keng-loē-kho, sī I-ha̍k ê hun-chi, choân-bûn chhú-lí sîn-keng hē-thóng ê i-ha̍k būn-tê.
Bián-e̍k-ha̍k (免疫學. Eng-gú: immunology) sī seng-bu̍t i-ha̍k ê chi̍t ê chú-iàu ê toā hun-chi.
Cheng-sîn-i-ha̍k sī i-ha̍k ê chi̍t kho, choan-bûn tui sim-lí-chi̍t-hoân chò chín-toàn, ū-hông, ián-kiù kap tī-liâu.
Gê-i-ha̍k (Hàn-jī:牙醫學, Eng-gí: Dentistry. khí-kho, gê-kho) sī gê-kho kho-ha̍k ê èng-iōng.
Siù-i-ha̍k sī choân-bûn tī-liâu tōng-bu̍t, iû-kî poê-phoāⁿ tōng-bu̍t, sán-gia̍p tōng-bu̍t, he̍k-chiá iá-seng tōng-bu̍t ê i-ha̍k.
Hū-kho-ha̍k sī chí choân bûn lú-sèng, iû-kî seⁿ-thoàⁿ hē-thóng ê i-ha̍k hun-chi.
Sîn-keng-ha̍k (Eng-gí: neurology), he̍k-chiá sîn-keng-kho, sîn-keng-loē-kho, sī I-ha̍k ê hun-chi, choân-bûn chhú-lí sîn-keng hē-thóng ê i-ha̍k būn-tê.

Seng-bu̍t ki-su̍t (Eng-gí: biotechnology) sī seng-bu̍t-ha̍k tī san-gia̍p-siōng ê èng-iōng, pí-lūn thoân-thóng lông-gia̍p ki-su̍t tio̍h sǹg sī seng-bu̍t ki-su̍t. m̄-koh hiān-sî nā kóng seng-bu̍t ki-su̍t, it-poaⁿ sī chí khah sin hoat-tián he̍k-chiá kang-gia̍p-hòa ê ki-su̍t, chhan-chhiūⁿ seng-bu̍t kang-têng, chè-io̍h, iā sī hoat-kàⁿ téng-téng.
Kái-phò-ha̍k (Eng-gí: anatomy. Hi-lia̍p-gí: ἀνατομία anatomia) sī i-ha̍k kap seng-bu̍t-ha̍k ê ha̍k-mn̂g, sī tùi seng-bu̍t-thé ê hêng-thé, kò͘-chō ê ián-kiù.
Bí-ha̍k sī gián-kiù "sím-mi̍h hō-chò súi" ê ha̍k-būn, chit-ê sû pún-sin mā the̍h lâi kóng 1-hāng mi̍h-kiāⁿ sī án-choáⁿ hō· lâng sán-seng hó ê kám-kak ê sèng-chit.
Lô-chek (logic) ē-tit kóng sī leh gián-kiù lūn-chèng (argument).
Tiān-chû-ha̍k (電磁學) sī bu̍t-lí-ha̍k ê chi̍t ê hun-chi, sī choan-bûn thàm-thó gián-kiù tiān kap chû kau-hō͘ koan-hē ê ha̍k-kho.
Tiān-chû-la̍t (electromagnetic force) sī tiān-chû-tiûⁿ tùi ū tiān-hō ê lia̍p-chú sán-seng ê 1 chióng la̍t.
Jia̍t-le̍k-ha̍k (熱力學) sī chi̍t chióng choan-bûn gián-kiù jia̍t hiān-siōng ê bu̍t-chit chōng-thài kah lêng-liōng chóan-ōaⁿ ê ha̍k-kho, Eng-bûn hō-chòe thermodynamics.

Thian-bûn-ha̍k sī leh gián-kiù Tē-kiû ê tāi-khì-chân goā-khaú-bīn ê chheⁿ-thé ham hiān-siōng ê kho-ha̍k, chhiūⁿ chheⁿ, he̍k-chheⁿ, tn̂g-boé-chheⁿ, gîn-hô, iah sī ke̍k-kng, ú-tiū bî-pho poē-kéng hok-siā, téng-téng.
Sò͘-lūn (Hàn: 數論. Eng: number theory) sī chi̍t ê sûn-chhùi sò͘-ha̍k ê hun-chi, chù-iàu sī teh gián-kiù chéng-sò͘ ê sèng-chit.
Chi̍p-ha̍p-lūn (set theory) sī leh gián-kiù chi̍p-ha̍p ê sò͘-ha̍k lí-lūn, ah chi̍p-ha̍p sī kā chi̍t-koá thiu-siōng ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ (object) khǹg taù-tīn ê 1 ê khài-liām.

Siā-hoē kho-ha̍k sī ha̍k-su̍t gián-kiù--ni̍h ê 1 ê toā hun-lūi, i só͘ khan-sia̍p--ê sī koan-hē jîn-lūi thoân-thé hām kò-jîn ê siā-hoē seng-oa̍h, chit lāi-té pau-koat jîn-lūi-ha̍k, ko͘-thong gián-kiù, keng-chè-ha̍k, jîn-bûn tē-lí-ha̍k, le̍k-sú-ha̍k, chèng-tī-ha̍k, sim-lí-ha̍k kap siā-hoē-ha̍k téng-téng ê ha̍k-kho.
Kiat-chiⁿ-ha̍k (Eng-gí: crystallography) sī chi̍t khoán si̍t-giām-sèng ê kho-ha̍k, gián-kiù goân-chú tī kiat-chiⁿ kò͘-thé lāi-té ê pâi-lia̍t chêng-hêng.
Keng-chè-ha̍k chit-ê sû sī tùi Ji̍t-gí khip-siu--lâi-ê.
Jîn-kháu-ha̍k sī chi̍t mn̂g ha̍k-būn, lī-ēng thóng-kè-ha̍k kap lí-lūn-sèng ê hong-hoa̍k, choân-bûn thàm-thó jîn-kháu hoat-tián kap kiat-kò͘ ê būn-tê.
Koan-hē lâng sū-gia̍p thàn-chîⁿ ê "seng-lí", chhiáⁿ khòaⁿ siong-gia̍p, kò͘-kheh kap lī-sûn téng bûn-chiong.Seng-lí-ha̍k sī tùi sèⁿ-miā hē-thóng it-poaⁿ kong-lêng ê kho-ha̍k gián-kiù.

Hoà-ha̍k (Hàn-jī: 化學. Eng-bûn: Chemistry) sī tiàm tī goân-chú ham hun-chú ê chân-chhù leh gián-kiù bu̍t-chit ê kho-ha̍k, goân-chú kiat-ha̍p chò-hoé pìⁿ--chhut-lâi ê hun-chú, kiat-chiⁿ, kim-sio̍k, téng-téng lóng sī hoà-ha̍k chùn-būn ê tùi-siōng.
Chiáu-lūi-ha̍k sī choan-bûn teh gián-kiù chiáu-luī ê tōng-bu̍t-ha̍k ha̍k-kho.
Khun-thiông-ha̍k (Eng-gí: Entomology) sī choan-bûn gián-kiù khun-thiông ê ha̍k-kho.
Hêng-ûi-ha̍k (Eng-gí: ethology), ha̍k-chiá tōng-bu̍t hêng-ûi (animal behaviour), sī choan-bûn ián-kiù tōng-bu̍t hêng-uî (iā ū kóng "hêng-tōng") ê tōng-bu̍t-ha̍k hak-kho.

Iú-ki hoà-ha̍k (organic chemistry) sī hoà-ha̍k ê 1 ki hun-ki, choan-tô͘ leh gián-kiù iú-ki hoà-ha̍p-bu̍t ê kiat-kò͘, sèng-chit, sêng-hūn, hoà-ha̍k hoán-èng, ham chái-iūⁿ ēng iú-ki ha̍p-sêng (organic synthesis) ia̍h pa̍t chióng pō͘-sò͘ lâi chè-chō.
Èng-iōng kho-ha̍k sī kā chū-jiân kho-ha̍k ê tì-sek èng-iōng kàu si̍t-chè būn-tê téng ê kho-ha̍k.

Kang-têng-ha̍k (工程學), mā hō-chòe Kang-ha̍k (工學), sī chioh-tioh gián-kiù kah si̍t-hêng èng-iōng sò͘-ha̍k, chū-jiân kho-ha̍k kah siā-hōe kho-ha̍k téng-téng ki-chhó͘ ha̍k-kho ê tì-sek, lâi tit-tio̍h kái-liông chúi-lī, thó͘-bo̍k kiàn-tio̍k, ki-hâi, hē-thóng kah châi-liāu téng-téng chè-chō ka-kang kòe-têng ê siat-kè kah èng-iōng hong-sek ê ha̍k-kho.

Kiàn-tio̍k, sī kí thê-kiong hō͘ lâng khiā-khí iah oa̍t-tōng, ū loē-pō͘ khong-kan ê kò͘-chō-bu̍t ê phah-tat, siat-kè, chō-chok it-ti̍t kah sú-iōng ê chèng-kô koè-têng, he̍k-chiá-sī chit-ê koè-têng-tiong ê chi̍t-pō͘-hūn.
Khòng-chè-lūn sī gián-kiù kok-chióng hē-thóng tiâu-chiat kah khòng-chè ê kho-ha̍k.
Tāi-sò͘ sī sò͘-ha̍k ê 1 ki hun-ki, choan-tô͘ leh gián-kiù thiu-siōng kiat-kò͘ (abstract structure), koan-liân (relation) kap sò͘-liōng (quantity).
Saⁿ-kak-hoat (trigonometry) sī sò͘-ha̍k ê 1 ki hun-ki, choan-tô͘ leh chhú-lí kak-tō͘ (angle), saⁿ-kak-hêng kap saⁿ-kak hâm-sò͘ (trigonometric function), chhiūⁿ kóng sin, cos ham tan.
Pún-thé-lūn sī tiat-ha̍k lāi-té hêng-jî-siōng-ha̍k kài ki-pún ê 1-ki.
Seng-hoà-ha̍k (biochemistry) sī leh gián-kiù oa̍h ê seng-bu̍t chái-iūⁿ chìn-hêng hoà-ha̍k hoán-èng kap chok-iōng.
Tī sò͘-ha̍k, bî-hun (derivative) sī 1 ê hâm-sò͘ chek-sî ê piàn-hoà-lu̍t.
Hêng-jî-siōng-ha̍k sī tiat-ha̍k lāi-té 1-ê tiōng-iàu ê hun-ki.
Lûn-lí-ha̍k sī tiat-ha̍k ê 1-ê hun-ki, lûn-lí-ha̍k gián-kiù ê bo̍k-tek sī beh liáu-kái tō-tek ê pún-chit, piān-pia̍t sím-mi̍h sī tio̍h, sím-mi̍h sī m̄-tio̍h--ê.
Jīn-sek-lūn sī tiat-ha̍k ê 1-ê hun-ki, mā ū lâng kóng-chò tì-sek-lūn.
Kí-hô-ha̍k sī sò͘-ha̍k ê 1 ki hun-ki, choan-tô͘ leh chhú-lí khong-kan koan-hē.

Tiat-ha̍k chit-ê sû sī tùi Ji̍t-pún Hàn-jī-sû 哲学 (てつがく) lâi--ê, lēng-goā Hi-lia̍p-gí ê φιλοσοφια sī "tùi tì-hūi ê ài" ê ì-sù, Hi-lia̍p-gí ê chit-ê jī sī Tek-gí ê Philosophie, Hoat-gí ê philosophie hām Eng-gí philosophy ê kiōng-tông lâi-goân.
Bu̍t-lí-ha̍k sī gián-kiù ùi quark kaù kah ú-tiū chéng-kô chū-jiân ê kho-ha̍k.
Sim-lí-ha̍k sī 1 mn̂g ha̍k-su̍t (academic) kap èng-iōng ê kho-ha̍k, choan-tô͘ leh gián-kiù jîn-lūi ê sim (mind), naú, kap hêng-ûi (behavior).
Io̍h-lí-ha̍k (Eng-gí: pharmacology) sī tùi io̍h-bu̍t chò-iōng ê gián-kiù, choan-tô͘ thàm-thó io̍h-bu̍t kap seng-bu̍t-thé chham kî-thaⁿ hòa-ha̍k bu̍t-chit ê hō͘-siong chò-iōng.
Sèⁿ-miā kho-ha̍k (性命科學. Eng-gú: life science) sī tùi só͘-ū seng-bu̍t-thé (pau-hâm bî-seng-bu̍t, si̍t-bu̍t, chin-khún kap tōng-bu̍t téng) chìn-hêng kho-ha̍k gián-kiù ê ha̍k-su̍t léng-he̍k.
Seng-bu̍t-ha̍k sī leh gián-kiù seng-bu̍t ham sìⁿ-miā (life) ê kho-ha̍k.

Chū-jiân kho-ha̍k sī kho-ha̍k ê chi̍t toā lūi, in thong-koè koan-chhat, niû-chhek, hun-sek, kap sò͘-ha̍k hong-hoat, lâi gián-kiù chū-jiân ê tōng-thài kiam hui-tōng-thài sèng-chit, hêng-ûi, kiàn-li̍p khí chiam-tùi chū-jiân ē-tàng siū ū-chhek ê kui-chek.
Hoān-choē-ha̍k sī tùi hoān-chōe ê sèng-chit, goân-in, khòng-chè téng gī-tê ê ián-kiù kap si̍t-bū, i sī hêng-ûi kho-ha̍k, siā-hōe-ha̍k kiam sim-lí-ha̍k téng léng-he̍k ê siōng-koan kho-bo̍k.
It-poaⁿ só· kóng ê giân-gú-ha̍k he̍k-chiá gí-giân-ha̍k, tō-sī ēng kho-ha̍k ê hong-sek, lâi gián-kiù jîn-lūi ê giân-gú ê ha̍k-kho / ha̍k-būn.
Lesaka sī tī Se-pan-gâ Navarra siā-lí ê chi̍t ê municipio.
Sîn-keng-kho-ha̍k sī choân-bûn ián-kiù sîn-keng hē-thóng ê ha̍k-kho.
Jîn-lūi-ha̍k kán-tan lâi kóng tō-sī gián-kiù jîn-lūi ê ha̍k-kho / ha̍k-būn.
Siā-hoē-ha̍k sī leh gián-kiù siā-hoē kap lâng tī siā-hoē ê kiâⁿ-pàng.
Bí-su̍t sī choan-bûn chò ū gē-su̍t kè-ta̍t ê oa̍h-tāng kap chok-phín ê hit-ê khài-liām.
Iu-seng-ha̍k sī chi̍t khóan kho-ha̍k ia̍h chèng-tī-siōng ê su-sióng kap ūn-tōng, tī 20 sè-kí ê chêng-pòaⁿ liû-hêng, sī hit-tong-sî chéng-cho̍k iu-o̍at ê lí-iû chi it.
Iông-e̍k (溶液. Eng-bûn: solution) sī iû nn̄g chióng í-siōng ê bu̍t-chit lâi cho͘-sêng ê chiâu-ûn jî-chhiáⁿ ún-tēng ê hun-sàn hūn-ha̍p-bu̍t.
Lo̍k-chhùi-chúi sī chhùi-khiuⁿ ūi-seng hú-chō· iōng-phín, ē-tàng sat-khún, siau-tû chhùi-chhàu, kap ī-hông chiù-khí.
Ak-pûi (沃肥) sī chi̍t chióng iú-ki pûi-liāu.
Tiān-kái-chit (電解質) sī ē-táng tī iông-e̍k lāi sán-seng lī-chú pēng-chhiáⁿ ín-tiān ê hòa-ha̍p-bu̍t.

Chheⁿ-tâng ia̍h chhiⁿ-tâng (bronze) sī chin chē tâng ê hūn-kim (copper alloys) ê thong-chheng, toā-hūn sī hūn siah (tin), ū-tang-sî-á sī hūn pa̍t chióng hoà-ha̍k goân-sò͘, chhiūⁿ kóng P, Mn, a-lú-mih, ia̍h Si.
N̂g-tâng (黃銅. Eng-bûn: brass) sī tâng hām a-iân ê n̂g-sek ha̍p-kim.
Kàⁿ-sò͘ (Eng-gí: enzyme. Hàn-jī: 酵素) sī oa̍h-mi̍h lāi-té chhú-lí mi̍h-kiāⁿ ê ko-chū-bu̍t, oa̍h-mi̍h ê sin-tîn-tāi-siā (chhin-chhiūⁿ siau-hoà, tióng-toā, sè-pau sí-bô) lóng su-iàu i.
Su-tén-lè-suh (ステンレス, stainless), mā thang kiò chò put-siù-kǹg (不鏽鋼)
Seng-thài-hē (Eng-gí: ecosystem), ia̍h sī kóng seng-thài-hē-thóng, sī chí chi̍t-ê só͘-chāi ê seng-bu̍t (oa̍h-mi̍h) kap seng-kèng (kî-tha bô sèⁿ-miā ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ) ê chi̍p-ha̍p.
Tiōng-siong-chú-gī (Eng-gí: mercantilism) sī chi̍t khoán keng-chè-ha̍k siat-sióng, chú-tiuⁿ chèng-hú chú-tō bō͘-e̍k oa̍h-tāng.
Chu-pún-chú-gī sī keng-chè ê 1 khoán kiat-kò͘ iah-sī kóng hē-thóng, chit-khoán kiat-kò͘ sī 1 chióng chhú chu-pún ê liû-tōng chò ki-pún goân-lí ê chè-tō͘.
Chiū hoat-lu̍t-tek lâi kóng, su-hoat he̍k-chiá-sī kóng su-hoat hē-thóng sī chí hoat-īⁿ tāi-piáu chú-koân iah kok-ka lâi chò kong-gī ê chú-chhâi.
Keng-chè sī seng-sán, kau-ōaⁿ, kau-e̍k, liû-thong, hun-phòe téng-téng siā-hōe hiān-siōng ê chong-ha̍p.
Hêng-ûi sī kóng lâng kap kî-tha tōng-bu̍t kò͘-thé, he̍k-chiá chi̍t-ê hē-thóng (chhan-chhiūⁿ lâng ê kûn-thé) goā-sin ê tōng-chok.
Ha̍p ê sò͘-ha̍k hû-hō sī Σ.
Kaczyn Stary sī Pho-lân Podlaskie séng Wysokomazowiecki kūn Czyżew chū-tī-thé ê chi̍t ê chng-thâu.
Kacze Bagno sī Pho-lân Warmińsko-mazurskie séng Nowomiejski kūn Kurzętnik chū-tī-thé ê chi̍t ê chng-thâu.
Kadzidłowo sī Pho-lân Warmińsko-mazurskie séng Piski kūn Ruciane-Nida chū-tī-thé ê chi̍t ê chng-thâu.
2005 nî sī San Francisco Giants tī Kok-ka Liân-bêng ê tē-123 ê kiû-kùi.
Tī seng-bu̍t ê hun-lūi, kho sī chú-iàu chân-kip chi it, siat tī ba̍k kap sio̍k chi kan.

Kong (Eng-gí: class, Latin-gí: classis) chāi seng-bu̍t hun-lūi-ha̍k sī chi̍t-ê hun-lūi téng-kip lāi-bīn ki-pún ê kî-tiong chi̍t kip. i mā ē-tàng chí pún téng-kip tiong ê chi̍t-ê hun-lūi tan-goân (taxon).
Á-chéng (Eng-gí: subspecies, kán-lio̍k: subsp.
Bo̍k (Lat: ordo. Eng: order) sī seng-bu̍t-ha̍k siōng tùi seng-bu̍t kho-ha̍k hun-lūi ê chi̍t chân, mā ēng-lâi chí kî-tiong kò-piat ê hun-lūi tan-oân.
Sio̍k (Latin-gí: genus, ho̍k-sò͘: genera) tī seng-bu̍t-ha̍k lāi-bīn sī kóng chi̍t khoán hun-lūi tan-gôan, sī tùi oa̍h-mi̍h ia̍h sī hoà-chio̍h ê kui-lūi.

Chéng ê kî-tha ì-sù, khòaⁿ chéng .Tī seng-bu̍t-ha̍k, chéng, ia̍h sī bu̍t-chéng, tû-liáu sī hun-lūi ê ki-pún téng-kip, mā ē-tàng ēng-lâi piáu-sī pâi tī chi̍t-ê téng-kip ê hun-lūi tan-oân, chhan-chhiūⁿ "lâng" tio̍h sī chi̍t-ê "chéng".
Mn̂g (Latin: phylum/divisio) sī seng-bu̍t hun-lūi ê chi̍t chân.
Môa-hông (Casuarinaceae)
Chhêng, siông (Hàn-jī: 松, Pinaceae) sī chhêng kho (松科) si̍t-but--ê thóng-chheng.
Phô-tô-kho
Soaⁿ-io̍h-chî (山藥, Eng-gí: yam) sī Dioscorea-sio̍k (薯蕷屬) ê si̍t-bu̍t , sio̍k-tī Dioscoreaceae-kho (薯蕷科).
Lietuva Kiōng-hô-kok sī tī Tang Au-chiu ê kok-ka, sī Pe̍h-kok 3-kok ê kî-tiong 1 kok.
Tāu-kho (Fabaceae) sī siang-chú-hio̍h si̍t-bu̍t, hun chò 3 ê a-kho.
Tī Tâi-oân, bông-ko sī hit-tah-á ê chang-sui-niau (phòng-boé-bâ).
Koan-hē a-phiàn-hun, chhiáⁿ khoàⁿ a-phiàn.
Tai-á-bí mā hō-chò káu-bú-tai, káu-boé-sé, káu-boé-tai, tì-á, sek-á he̍k-chiá-sī tai-á, te-á, tī bîn-kan ū chē-chē khóan miâ teh kiò.
Nńg-kut-hî, latin hō-miâ Chondrichthyes, sī hî-lūi tiong ê chi̍t toā lūi, tī hun-lūi-ha̍k siong sī 1-ê kong.
Chia̍h-bah-bo̍k (-ba̍k), La-teng hō-miâ Carnivora, sī thai-pôaⁿ tōng-bu̍t ē-kha ê chi̍t-ê bo̍k, lóng-chóng ū 17-ê kho, chhiau-kòe 260-ê bu̍t-chéng.
Niau-kho, La-teng-miâ Felidae, sī chi̍t lūi tōng-bu̍t, hun-lūi-siōng sī chi̍t kho, sio̍k tī chhī-leng tōng-bu̍t ē-kha ê Carnivora-ba̍k.
Chún-hêng-ba̍k (隼形目, La-teng-miâ: Falconiformes), sī chi̍t lūi chia̍h-chho ê chiáu-lūi, pau-koat bā-hio̍h.
Ka-choa̍h （蟉蠽、虼蚻） (Blattodea)
Kho̍k-hî iā go̍k-hî sī Crocodilia ba̍k ê toā-hêng pâ-thiông.
Iú-lân-bo̍k ia̍h ū khó-lêng sī chí lâ-lí, chi̍t khoán chhī-leng tōng-bu̍t.
Káu-kho (Canidae), Hàn-bûn it-poaⁿ kóng khián-kho (犬科), sī chia̍h-bah-ba̍k tōng-bu̍t ê chi̍t hūn.
Hún-chiáu sī sio̍k tī Columbidae kho, iok-liōng ū 300 chéng ê chiáu-á.
Niáu-chhí sī kúi khoán chhí-lūi tōng-bu̍t ê miâ, bô it-tēng ê hun-lūi tēng-gī.
Sió-hoe-tia̍p-kho tī ô·-tia̍p lāi-té sǹg-kóng-sī sè-lia̍p-chéng--ê, m̄-koh soah chiàm Tâi-oân boé-ia̍h-á chióng-lūi ê 25 % chó-iū.
Vulpes (Hô͘-lî-sio̍k) sī chhī-leng tōng-bu̍t Carnivora-ba̍k Canidae-kho ē-té-bīn ê 1 sio̍k.

Nńg-thé tōng-bu̍t sī sio̍k tī Mollusca chit ê toā kong ê tōng-bu̍t, sêng-oân pau-hâm chin chē chióng hái-sán kap goā-khak súi-súi ê tōng-bu̍t, ùi sè-sè-chiah ê lê-á, lâ-á kàu ba̍t-cha̍t (hoe-ki), jiû-hî, chiuⁿ-hî téng-téng lóng sī.
Hái-ku, Latin-miâ Cheloniidae, sī ku-lūi lāi-bīn seng-oa̍h tī hái-iûⁿ ê chi̍t lūi,
Thò͘-kho (Leporidae) sī chhī-leng tōng-bu̍t ē-kha ê chi̍t-kho, lāi-té ū 50 gōa chéng ê thò͘-á kap iá-thó͘ (Lepus).
Khòng-buh (コンブ) sī 1 chióng ē-sái chia̍h ê chó-lūi.
Allium
Pà-sio̍k, La-teng hō miâ Panthera, sī chi̍t lūi toā-hêng niau-kho tōng-bu̍t.
Cha̍p-kha-ba̍k (ha̍k-miâ: Decapoda), Malacostraca-kong ê kah-khak-lūi ba̍k, hūn-chú pau-koah chin chē thong lâng chai ê tōng-bu̍t, chhin-chhiuⁿ hē, hê-á, liông-hê.
Serranidae sī chéng-lūi siāng chē ê hî-lūi, tī hun-lūi-siōng sǹg chi̍t kho, ū tāi-kài 64 sio̍k, 450 chéng.
Chheng-kho, La-teng hō-miâ Scombridae, sī Lô͘-hêng-ba̍k ê chi̍t kho, chheng-hî, chhńg-á téng hî-lūi lóng sio̍k chit kho.
Lâng-kho, La-teng hō-miâ Hominidae, sī lêng-tióng-lūi chi̍t hūn, ki-tiong pâu-hâm 4-ê sio̍k: lâng (Homo), o͘-seng-seng (Pan), toā-seng-seng (Gorilla) kap âng-seng-seng (Pongo).
Soân-hoe-kho (旋花科. Convolvulaceae) ê si̍t-bu̍t, chhan-chhiūⁿ èng-chhài, han-chî, khan-gû-hoe, tāi-iok ū 60 ê sio̍k (genus), 1650 ê chéng (species).
Lân-si̍t-ba̍k sī chi̍t toā lūi ê khun-thiông, it-poaⁿ mā kiò ia̍h-á, lāi-bīn hâm ô͘-tia̍p kap ngô͘.
Lô͘-hêng-bo̍k, Latin hō-miâ Perciformes, sī chi̍t lūi hî.
Siang-khak-kong (hàn-jī: 雙殼綱, Latin-gí: Bivalvia) sī 1 lūi ū 2 sìⁿ khak ê nńg-thé tōng-bu̍t.
Khóng-chhiok it-poaⁿ lâi-kóng sī chí A-chiu khóng-chhiok, Seng-bu̍t-ha̍k ê hun-lūi sī Phasianidae-kho Pavo-sio̍k ê chiáu-á.
Ti-kho (Suidae) sī chhī-leng tōng-bu̍t kî-tiong ê 1 kho, ē-kha hun chò 5 sio̍k 16 chéng.
Pe̍h-lêng-si (Hàn-jī: 白翎鷥. ha̍k-miâ: Egretta) sī chiáu-á ê 1 ê sio̍k.
Pih sī Trionychidae kho ê pâ-thiông tōng-bu̍t, goā-hêng sêng hái-ku, m̄-koh sī nńg-khak--ê.
Ah-kho (Anatidae) sī chiáu-á ê 1 kho, ah, gān, gô, thian-gô téng-téng, lóng sio̍h chi̍t kho.
Kam-chià (ha̍k-miâ: Saccharum) sī pau-hâm 6~37 chióng chéng ê chháu-á (Poaceae), chū-pún seⁿ toà Kū Sè-kài khah sio-lo̍h ê un-tāi kap jia̍t-tāi tē-khu.
Bovinae: gû, lêng-iông, téng-téng.
Sōaiⁿ-á (Hàn-jī: 檨仔) pún-té chhut-sán tī Ìn-tō͘.
Gû-kho (Bovidae)
Hô͘-sîn (胡蠅, Muscidae) sī 1 chióng thâng-á.
Pek-ha̍p-sio̍k (-屬, ha̍k-miâ: Lilium) ia̍h sī kiò chò iú-lih (ゆり), sī si̍t-bu̍t (植物)--ê hun-lūi.
Columba sī seng-bu̍t hun-lūi tiong hún-chiáu-kho ē-kha ê chi̍t-ê sio̍k.
O͘-ah sī Corvidae-kho Corvus-sio̍k ē-kha ê toā-chiah chiáu.
Kim-koe, Cucurbita ê kóe-chí.
Pau-hî (Haliotis)
Niau-sio̍k (Felis) sī chhī-leng tōng-bu̍t niau-kho lāi-té ê chi̍t-ê sio̍k, ē-kha ū chin-chē chéng.
Lâ-lí, ia̍h sī kóng chhng-soaⁿ-kah (chhoan-san-), Latin hō-miâ Pholidota, sī chhī-leng tōng-bu̍t ē-kha ê chi̍t-ê bo̍k, mā ū hō iú-lân-bo̍k (有麟目) he̍k-chiá lân-kah-bo̍k.
Hóe-ke (Meleagris) sī Meleagridinae a-kho Meleagris sio̍k ê chiáu-á, ē-kha ū 2 chéng.
Chhek-sio̍k, La-teng-miâ Passer, sī Chhek-kho (Passeridae) ê 1 sio̍k, só͘ sio̍k chiáu-lūi it-poaⁿ hō-chò chhù-chiáu (-á), mā ū kiò chhek-chiáu (chhio̍k-).
Scomber sī chi̍t lūi hái-hî, chheng-kho ē-kha ê chi̍t sio̍k.
Khu-pia̍t: Chúi-ku ū kúi-nā-chióng ì-sù, chham-khó Chúi-ku.
Tiau-kho, La-teng hō-miâ Mustelidae, sī Chia̍h-bah-ba̍k chit lūi.
Sim, sī lâng ū--ê, ba̍k-chiu khoàⁿ-bē-tio̍h--ê, lán lâng ê lí-sèng ia̍h kám-chêng, sim-chêng kap ì-hiòng só· tī-leh ê 1-ê thiu-siōng ê só·-chāi.
Kàu-io̍k-ha̍k sī gián-kiù kàu-io̍k ê lí-lūn kiam si̍t-hêng ê ha̍k-būn.
Kà-ha̍k-hoat sī kàu-su niá ha̍k-seng ha̍k-si̍p beh o̍h ê tāi-chì ê chham-khó hong-hoat kap chi̍t kóa goân-chek.
Sîn-ha̍k sī hē-thóng-sèng lâi ián-kiù sìn-gióng, chong-kàu loē-iông ê ha̍k-kho, it-poaⁿ lâi kóng, sī choan-bûn chí Ki-tok-kàu loē-pō͘ tùi ka-tī ê ián-kiù.

column2: ['apollo kè-ōe', 'apollo kè-e̍k', 'apollo kè ōe', 'apollo kèōe', 'apollo program']
column3: Apollo kè-ōe sī Bí-kok NASA ūi tio̍h sàng jîn-lūi khì go̍eh-kiû, jî-chhiáⁿ chò gián-kiù ê thài-khong hui-hêng kè-ōe, tī 1961 nî chì 1975 nî kî-kan si̍t-si.

Sò͘-ha̍k-te̍k ê lô-chek (mathematical logic) sī sò͘-ha̍k ê 1 ki hun-ki, choan-tô͘ leh gián-kiù kap hêng-sek hē-thóng (formal system) ū tī-tāi ê koan-liām, khoàⁿ chit-koá ti̍t-kak ê khài-liām, khó-pí kóng chi̍p-ha̍p, sò͘-ba̍k, chèng-bêng, kè-sǹg (computation) téng-téng, beh chái-iūⁿ lâi piáu-ta̍t.
Thé-kak hē-thóng (Eng-gí: somatosensory system) sī 1 khoán ti-kak hē-thóng, pau-hâm phoê-hu kám-kak, chhim-pō͘ kám-kak, pak-lāi kám-kak.
Bat-jī (捌字. Eng-bûn: literacy) kóng-ê sī lâng beh oa̍t-tho̍k kap su-siá bûn-jī ê ki-pún lêng-le̍k. m̄ bat-jī ê lâng pī hō-chò chheⁿ-mê-gû.
Pak-chè sī chi̍t khoán chiong tōng-bu̍t gōa phôe pak--lo̍h-lâi chhù-lí liáu-āu têng-sin chè-chok hêng-thé ê kang-gē.
Chit phiⁿ bûn-chiong m̄-sī kài-siāu "lú-sèng" (cha-bó͘).
Sió-he̍k-chheⁿ-toà chú-iàu sī kí Thài-iông-hē lāi-té, Hoé-chheⁿ kap Bo̍k-chheⁿ tiong-ng ê só͘-chāi, hia ū chin chē sió-he̍k-chheⁿ mā leh se̍h Ji̍t-thaû.
Kám-kak sī seng-bu̍t kò-thé tī seng-lí-siōng kám siu chu-liāu hō͘ ti-kak chhù-lí ê lêng-le̍k.
Chio̍h-khì sî-tāi sī sú-chêng sî-kî tiong chú-iàu lī-ēng chio̍h-khì sêng-oa̍h ê chi̍t tōaⁿ sî-kan.
Thih-khì Sî-tāi sī jîn-lūi bûn-hòa hoat-tián ê chi̍t-ê kai-tōaⁿ.

column2: ['7 goe̍h 1 ji̍t', '7-goe̍h 1-hō', '7-goe̍h 1-ji̍t', '7 goe̍h 1', '7 goe̍h 1 hō', '7 go̍eh 1 hō', '7 go̍eh 1 ji̍t', '7月1', '7月1日', '7月1號']
