Keng-sin-sè sī chi̍t tōaⁿ tē-chit-ha̍k siōng ê epoch, sî-kan tùi 2,588,000 kàu 11,700 nî chêng.
Jura-kì, Hàn-bûn sī Chu-lô-kì (侏羅紀), sī chi̍t toāⁿ tē-chit sî-tāi, sî-kan sī tāi-iok 199.6 kàu 145.5 Ma (pah-bān nî-chêng), sī Tiong-seng-tāi ê tiong toāⁿ.
Trias-kì, Hàn-bûn sī Sam-tia̍p-kì (三疊紀), sī chi̍t toāⁿ tē-chit sî-tāi, sî-kan sī tāi-iok 250 kàu 200 Ma (pah-bān nî-chêng), sī Tiong-seng-tāi ê khui-thâu.
Tē-saⁿ-kí (Tertiary period) sī chi̍t tōaⁿ tē-chit sî-tāi, sio̍k-í kū-sek ê hun toāⁿ hong-sek, sî-kan sī 66 kàu 2.58 pah-bān-nî chêng.
Perm-kì, Hàn-bûn sī Jī-tia̍p-kì (二疊紀), sī chi̍t toāⁿ tē-chit sî-tāi, sî-kan sī tāi-iok 299 kàu 251 Ma (pah-bān nî-chêng), sī Kó͘-seng-tāi ê siāng boé kì.
Kó͘-seng-tāi sī chi̍t toāⁿ tē-chit sî-tāi, sî-kan sī 542 Ma (pah-bān nî chêng) kàu 251 Ma chó-iū.
Chio̍h-thoàⁿ-kì sī Kó͘-seng-tāi lāi-té thâu-chi̍t-ê tē-chit sî-tāi.
Devon-kí, Hàn-bûn kóng Nî-phûn-kí (泥盆紀), sī Kó͘-seng-tāi (Paleozoic) lāi-té thâu-chi̍t-ê tē-chit sî-tāi, sî-kan tùi 416 ± 2.8 Ma (pah-bān nî chêng) kàu 359.2 ± 2.5 Ma.
Silures-kì, Hàn-bûn kóng Chì-liû-kì, sī Kó͘-seng-tāi lāi-té thâu-chi̍t-ê tē-chit sî-tāi.
Ordovices-kì, Hàn-bûn kóng Ò-tô-kì (奧陶紀), sī Kó͘-seng-tāi (Paleozoic) lāi-té thâu-chi̍t-ê tē-chit sî-tāi, sî-kan tùi 485.4 ± 1.9 Ma (pah-bān nî chêng) kàu 443.4 ± 1.5 Ma.
Cambria-kì, Hàn-bûn kóng Hân-bú-kì (寒武紀), sī Kó͘-seng-tāi (Paleozoic) lāi-té thâu-chi̍t-ê tē-chit sî-tāi, sî-kan tùi 542 ± 0.3 Ma (pah-bān nî chêng) kàu 488.3 ± 1.7 Ma.
Creta-kí (Eng-gí: Cretaceous period), Hàn-jī hoan Pe̍h-ok-kí (白堊紀), sī chi̍t toāⁿ tē-chit sî-tāi, sî-kan sī tāi-iok 145.5 kàu 65.5 Ma (pah-bān nî-chêng), sī Tiong-seng-tāi ê boé toāⁿ.
Tiong-seng-tāi sī chi̍t toāⁿ tē-chit sî-tāi, sî-kan sī 250 Ma (pah-bān nî chêng) kàu 65 Ma chó-iū.
UTC (Eng-gí: Coordinated Universal Time) sī 1-khoán Thong-iōng Sî-kan (UT) ê phiau-chún.

Chhun (春) sī sù-kùi tong-tiong ê tē 1 ê kùi-chiat.
Chhiu sī sù-kùi tong-tiong ê tē 3 ê kùi-chiat.
Pài-it sī chi̍t-ê lé-pài tang-tiong ê chi̍t ji̍t, gia̍p tī lé-pài-ji̍t kap pài-jī chi kan.
Pài-la̍k sī chi̍t-ê lé-pài tang-tiong ê chi̍t ji̍t, gia̍p tī pài-gō͘ kap lé-pài-ji̍t tiong-ng.
Pài-gō͘ sī chi̍t-ê lé-pài tang-tiong ê chi̍t ji̍t, gia̍p tī pài-sì kap pài-la̍k tiong-ng.
Pài-jī sī chi̍t-ê lé-pài tang-tiong ê chi̍t ji̍t, gia̍p tī pài-it kap pài-saⁿ tiong-ng.
Àm-sî sī ji̍t-thâu oân-choân lo̍h-soaⁿ liáu-āu ê kî-kan.
1 ê Ji̍t-thaû nî (tropical year) tō sī lán ùi Tē-kiû khoàⁿ Ji̍t-thaû se̍h n̂g-tō 1 lìn khai ê sî-kan.
Thàu-chá sī chi̍t kang ê khai-sí, Hàn-bûn kóng It-ji̍t chi kè, chāi-û sîn.

Poàn-kiám-kî (半減期. half-life) he̍k-chiá poàn-soe-kî (半衰期) sī chi̍t chióng bu̍t-chit ùi goân-pún ê sò͘-liōng khai-sí kiám-chió kàu chhun goân-pún sò͘-liōng ê chi̍t-pòaⁿ ê chit tōaⁿ kî-kan ê sî-kan tn̂g-té.
Kòe-khì sī í-keng keng-kòe ê sî-kan he̍k-chiá sî-tāi.
Bī-lâi, mā kóng chiong-lâi, āu-sì, sī hiān-chāi ê kòe-āu ê sî-kan he̍k-chiá sî-tāi.
Joa̍h-lâng (熱儂) sī chi̍t-ê kùi-chiat, chiap-sio̍k tī chhun-thiⁿ ê āu-piah, chhiu-thiⁿ ê thâu-chêng.
Êng-kang sī lâng khai tī ki-pún tō͘ saⁿ-tǹg kap chò khang-khòe, chiap-siū kàu-io̍k í-goā ê sî-kan.

Joa̍h-tang sî-kan ia̍h hā-lēng sî-kan mā hō chò ji̍t-thaû-kng khiām-iok sî-kan (daylight saving time), sī tī Ji̍t-thaû khah chá chhut--lâi hit kúi goe̍h kā chāi-tē ê piau-chún sî-kan tiâu chìn-chêng, pí-lūn kóng kā sî-kè tiâu kín 1 tiám-chéng.

column2: ['1 goe̍h 6 ji̍t', '1-goe̍h 6-hō', '1-goe̍h 6-ji̍t', '1 goe̍h 6', '1 goe̍h 6 hō', '1 go̍eh 6 hō', '1 go̍eh 6 ji̍t', '1月6', '1月6日', '1月6號']
column3: 1 goe̍h 6 ji̍t, iā sī kóng 1 goe̍h 6 hō, chiàu Gregorius Le̍k-hoat lâi-kóng sī 1 goe̍h ê tē 6 ji̍t, mā sī 1 tang ê tē 6 ji̍t.

Dalton hoat-chek (Eng-gí: Dalton's law), he̍k-chiá Dalton hun-ap hoat-chek (Dalton's law of partial pressures), sī chi̍t ê iû John Dalton tī 1801 nî thê-chhut, the̍h-lâi biâu-su̍t lí-sióng khì-thé ê bu̍t-lí hòa-ha̍k hoat-chek.

Siong-tùi-lūn sī siong-tùi-sèng lí-lūn (theory of relativity) ê kán-chheng, i pau-hâm 3 chióng lí-lūn: Galileo Galilei ê siong-tùi-sèng goân-lí (principle of relativity), kap Albert Einstein ê te̍k-sû siong-tùi-lūn (special relativity) ham it-poaⁿ siong-tùi-lūn (general relativity).
Ká-soat (Hàn-jī: 假說. Eng-gí: hypothesis. Hi-lia̍p-gí: ὑπόθεσις) sī chiam-tùi hiān-siōng só͘ thê-chhut ê kái-soeh.

column2: ['it-poaⁿ siong-tùi-sèng lí-lūn', '一般相对性理论', '一般相对论', '一般相對性理論', '一般相對論']
column3: It-poaⁿ siong-tùi-sèng lí-lūn, he̍k-chiá it-poaⁿ song-tùi-lūn, sī chiam-tùi tiōng-le̍k ê kúi-hô-ha̍k lí-lūn, sī 1915 nî Albert Einstein hoat-piáu, tī kīn-tāi bu̍t-lí-ha̍k lāi-té ēng lâi biâu-su̍t tiōng-le̍k ê hiān-siōng.

column2: ['pauli bô-chò-hoé goân-lí', 'pauli bô-chó-hóe goân-lí', 'pauli lia̍h-goā goân-lí']
column3: Pauli bô-chò-hoé goân-lí (Pauli exclusion principle) sī liōng-chú la̍t-ha̍k (quantum mechanics) ê 1 ê goân-lí, i kóng 2 lia̍p sio-siâng ê fermion ê liōng-chú-thài (quantum state) kāng-sî-chūn tiāⁿ-tio̍h ē bô kâng.
Keynes-chú-gī, he̍k-chiá kóng Keynes keng-chè-ha̍k, sī chi̍t khoán í Eng-kok ha̍k-chiá John Maynard Keynes ê ián-kiù chò ki-chó͘ ê chóng-thé-keng-chè-ha̍k lí-lūn.
